atk-s0402a:15_2: Diṭṭhadhammikanti diṭṭheva dhamme imasmiṃyeva attabhāve uppannaphalaṃ.
atk-s0402a:15_5: Rājāno gahetvā vividhā kammakāraṇā kārenteti coraṃ gahetvā vividhā kammakāraṇā rājapurisā karonti,
atk-s0402a:15_7: Taṃ coraṃ evaṃ kammakāraṇā kāriyamānaṃ esa passati.
atk-s0402a:15_9: “passati coraṃ āgucāriṃ rājāno gahetvā vividhā kammakāraṇā kārente”ti.
atk-s0402a:15_11: pahārasādhanatthaṃ vā catuhatthadaṇḍaṃ dvedhā chetvā gahitadaṇḍakehi.
atk-s0402a:15_13: Taṃ karontā sīsakaṭāhaṃ uppāṭetvā tattaṃ ayoguḷaṃ saṇḍāsena gahetvā tattha pakkhipanti,
atk-s0402a:15_16: Taṃ karontā uttaroṭṭhaubhatokaṇṇacūḷikagalavāṭakaparicchedena cammaṃ chinditvā sabbakese ekato gaṇṭhiṃ katvā daṇḍakena veṭhetvā uppāṭenti,
atk-s0402a:15_18: Tato sīsakaṭāhaṃ thūlasakkharāhi ghaṃsitvā dhovantā saṅkhavaṇṇaṃ karonti.
atk-s0402a:15_20: Taṃ karontā saṅkunā mukhaṃ vivaritvā antomukhe dīpaṃ jālenti,
atk-s0402a:15_21: kaṇṇacūḷikāhi vā paṭṭhāya mukhaṃ nikhādanena khananti,
atk-s0402a:16_1: Hatthapajjotikanti hatthe telapilotikāya veṭhetvā dīpaṃ viya pajjālenti.
atk-s0402a:16_3: Taṃ karontā heṭṭhāgīvato paṭṭhāya cammavaṭṭe kantitvā gopphake ṭhapenti,
atk-s0402a:16_5: So attano cammavaṭṭe akkamitvā akkamitvā patati.
atk-s0402a:16_7: Taṃ karontā tatheva cammavaṭṭe kantitvā kaṭiyaṃ ṭhapenti,
atk-s0402a:16_11: Taṃ karontā ubhosu kapparesu ca ubhosu jāṇukesu ca ayavalayāni datvā ayasūlāni koṭṭenti.
atk-s0402a:16_15: Taṃ kālena kālaṃ sūlāni apanetvā catūhi aṭṭhikoṭīhiyeva ṭhapenti.
atk-s0402a:17_0: Baḷisamaṃsikanti ubhatomukhehi baḷisehi paharitvā cammamaṃsanhārūni uppāṭenti.
atk-s0402a:17_1: Kahāpaṇikanti sakalasarīraṃ tiṇhāhi vāsīhi koṭito paṭṭhāya kahāpaṇamattaṃ,
atk-s0402a:17_3: Khārāpatacchikanti sarīraṃ tattha tattha āvudhehi paharitvā kocchehi khāraṃ ghaṃsanti,
atk-s0402a:17_5: Palighaparivattikanti ekena passena nipajjāpetvā kaṇṇacchiddena ayasūlaṃ koṭṭetvā pathaviyā ekābaddhaṃ karonti.
atk-s0402a:17_7: Palālapīṭhakanti cheko kāraṇiko chavicammaṃ acchinditvā nisadapotehi aṭṭhīni bhinditvā kesesu gahetvā ukkhipati,
atk-s0402a:17_11: Sunakhehipīti katipayāni divasāni āhāraṃ adatvā chātakasunakhehi khādāpenti.
atk-s0402a:18_0: Na paresaṃ pābhataṃ vilumpanto caratīti paresaṃ santakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ parammukhaṃ ābhataṃ antamaso antaravīthiyaṃ
atk-s0402a:18_1: patitaṃ sahassabhaṇḍikampi disvā “iminā jīvissāmī”ti vilumpanto na vicarati,
atk-s0402a:18_2: ko iminā atthoti piṭṭhipādena vā pavaṭṭetvā gacchati.
atk-s0402a:19_2: Kiñca tanti kiṃ nāma taṃ kāraṇaṃ bhaveyya.
atk-s0402a:19_10: Suddhaṃ attānaṃ pariharatīti ettha duvidhā suddhi –
atk-s0402a:19_12: Saraṇagamanena hi pariyāyena suddhaṃ attānaṃ pariharati nāma.
atk-s0402a:19_20: arahattamaggena pariyāyena suddhaṃ attānaṃ pariharati nāma.
atk-s0402a:19_21: Arahattaphale patiṭṭhito pana khīṇāsavo chinnamūlake pañcakkhandhe nhāpentopi khādāpentopi bhuñjāpentopi
atk-s0402a:19_22: nisīdāpentopi nipajjāpentopi nippariyāyeneva suddhaṃ nimmalaṃ attānaṃ pariharati paṭijaggatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0402a:20_7: kāraṇavacanaṃ vā yena kāraṇena parimuccissati sabbavajjehi.
atk-s0402a:20_12: Kiṃ pana khīṇāsavassa akusalaṃ na vipaccatīti?
atk-s0402a:20_16: samparāye panassa kammaphalaṃ nāma natthīti. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0402a:22_2: Vīriyañhi padahitabbato padhānabhāvakaraṇato vā padhānanti vuccati.
atk-s0402a:22_7: paccayānaṃ anuppadānatthāya padhānaṃ nāma durabhisambhavanti dasseti.
atk-s0402a:22_11: telasappinavanītādīsu vā appamattakampi bhesajjaṃ paresaṃ dethāti vattumpi nīharitvā dātumpi dukkaraṃ ubhatobyūḷhasaṅgāmappavesanasadisaṃ.
atk-s0402a:27_0: Agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitānanti gehato nikkhamitvā agārassa gharāvāsassa hitāvahehi kasigorakkhādīhi virahitaṃ anagāriyaṃ pabbajjaṃ upagatānaṃ.
atk-s0402a:27_2: upadhīnaṃ paṭinissaggasaṅkhātassa nibbānassa atthāya vipassanāya ceva maggena ca sahajātavīriyaṃ.
atk-s0402a:27_3: Tasmāti yasmā imāni dve padhānāni durabhisambhavāni, tasmā. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0402a:29_1: Tatiye tapanīyāti idha ceva samparāye ca tapantīti tapanīyā.
atk-s0402a:29_2: Tappatīti cittasantāpena tappati anusocati kāyaduccaritaṃ katvā nandayakkho viya nandamāṇavo viya nandagoghātako
atk-s0402a:29_3: viya devadatto viya dvebhātikā viya ca.
atk-s0402a:29_4: Te kira gāvaṃ vadhitvā maṃsaṃ dve koṭṭhāse akaṃsu.
atk-s0402a:29_8: Atha naṃ so “sabbaṃ maṃsaṃ dvedhā vibhattaṃ,
atk-s0402a:29_9: puna kiṃ maggasī”ti paharitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesi.
atk-s0402a:29_10: Nivattitvā ca naṃ olokento mataṃ disvā “bhāriyaṃ me kammaṃ kata”nti cittaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0402a:29_12: So ṭhitaṭṭhānepi nisinnaṭṭhānepi tadeva kammaṃ āvajjeti,
atk-s0402a:29_19: atthi nu kho te kiñci tapanīyakamma”nti? So “āma,
atk-s0402a:29_21: Atha naṃ thero “bhāriyaṃ te upāsaka kammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0402a:29_23: So teneva kammena kālaṃ katvā niraye nibbatto.
atk-s0402a:31_4: Idāni te dhamme dassento yā ca asantuṭṭhitātiādimāha.
atk-s0402a:31_5: Imañhi dhammadvayaṃ nissāya satthā sabbaññutaṃ patto,
atk-s0402a:31_7: Tattha asantuṭṭhitā kusalesu dhammesūti iminā imaṃ dīpeti –
atk-s0402a:31_8: “ahaṃ jhānamattakena vā obhāsanimittamattakena vā asantuṭṭho hutvā arahattamaggameva uppādesiṃ.
atk-s0402a:31_11: Padhānasmiṃ ca anukkaṇṭhito hutvā anosakkanāya ṭhatvāyeva padhānakiriyaṃ akāsi”nti imamatthaṃ dassento yā ca appaṭivānitātiādimāha.
atk-s0402a:31_17: anosakkanāyaṃ ṭhito bodhisattakāle sabbaññutaṃ patthento padhānamakāsinti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0402a:32_0: Idāni yathā tena taṃ padhānaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0402a:32_2: Tattha pattabbanti iminā pattabbaṃ guṇajātaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0402a:32_3: Purisathāmenātiādinā purisassa ñāṇathāmo ñāṇavīriyaṃ ñāṇaparakkamo ca kathito.
atk-s0402a:32_6: Ettāvatā tena caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ vīriyādhiṭṭhānaṃ nāma kathitaṃ.
atk-s0402a:32_7: Ettha hi kāmaṃ taco cāti ekaṃ aṅgaṃ,
atk-s0402a:32_13: Iti purimehi catūhi aṅgehi samannāgatena hutvā evaṃ adhiṭṭhitaṃ vīriyaṃ caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ vīriyādhiṭṭhānaṃ nāmāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a:32_14: Ettāvatā tena bodhipallaṅke attano āgamanīyapaṭipadā kathitā.
atk-s0402a:33_0: Idāni tāya paṭipadāya paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ kathetuṃ tassa mayhaṃ,
atk-s0402a:33_5: Na hi sakkā etaṃ suttappamattena adhigantunti. Tenāha –
atk-s0402a:34_0: Idāni attanā paṭiladdhaguṇesu bhikkhusaṅghaṃ samādapento tumhe cepi bhikkhavetiādimāha.
atk-s0402a:34_5: Abhiññā sacchikatvāti abhiññāya uttamapaññāya paccakkhaṃ katvā.
atk-s0402a:34_7: Tasmāti yasmā appaṭivānapadhānaṃ nāmetaṃ bahūpakāraṃ uttamatthasādhakaṃ, tasmā. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0402a:36_1: Chaṭṭhe saṃyojaniyesu dhammesūti dasannaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ paccayabhūtesu tebhūmakadhammesu.
atk-s0402a:38_4: Na hi tesaṃ uppattiyā cittaṃ pabhassaraṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a:40_4: Tesaṃ hi uppattiyā cittaṃ pabhassaraṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a:40_5: Hirī ca ottappañcāti ettha pāpato jigucchanalakkhaṇā hirī,
atk-s0402a:42_1: Navame lokaṃ pālentīti lokaṃ sandhārenti ṭhapenti rakkhanti.
atk-s0402a:42_2: Nayidha paññāyetha mātāti imasmiṃ loke janikā mātā “ayaṃ me mātā”ti garucittīkāravasena na paññāyetha.
atk-s0402a:42_5: Yathā ajeḷakātiādīsu ete hi sattā “ayaṃ me mātā”ti vā “mātucchā”ti vā garucittīkāravasena na jānanti.
atk-s0402a:44_4: Bhagavatā hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ vīsati vassāni vassūpanāyikā appaññattā ahosi.
atk-s0402a:44_5: Bhikkhū anibaddhavāsā vassepi utuvassepi yathāsukhaṃ vicariṃsu.
atk-s0402a:44_6: Te disvā manussā “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā hemantampi gimhampi vassampi cārikaṃ carissanti haritāni
atk-s0402a:44_7: tiṇāni sammaddantā ekindriyaṃ jīvaṃ viheṭhentā bahū khuddake pāṇe saṅghātaṃ āpādentā.
atk-s0402a:44_8: Ime hi nāma aññatitthiyā durakkhātadhammā vassāvāsaṃ allīyissanti saṃkasāyissanti,
atk-s0402a:44_9: ime nāma sakuṇā rukkhaggesu kulāvakāni katvā vassāvāsaṃ allīyissanti saṃkasāyissantī”tiādīni vatvā ujjhāyiṃsu.
atk-s0402a:44_11: Bhagavā taṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā imaṃ suttaṃ desento paṭhamaṃ tāva “anujānāmi,
atk-s0402a:44_14: Atha bhikkhūnaṃ “kadā nu kho vassaṃ upagantabba”nti uppannaṃ vitakkaṃ sutvā “anujānāmi,
atk-s0402a:44_20: Taṃ sutvā sakalampi idaṃ suttaṃ desento dvemā,
atk-s0402a:44_23: Purimikāti aparajjugatāya āsāḷhiyā upagantabbā purimakattikapuṇṇamipariyosānā paṭhamā temāsī.
atk-s0402a:44_24: Pacchimikāti māsagatāya āsāḷhiyā upagantabbā pacchimakattikapariyosānā pacchimā temāsīti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0402a:49_6: Suddhaṃ attānanti idaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a:49_12: balaṃ āgammāti sattannaṃ sekhānaṃ ñāṇabalaṃ ārabbha sandhāya paṭicca.
atk-s0402a:49_16: Yasmā panetāni dvepi vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0402a:50_1: Dutiye satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāvetītiādīsu ayaṃ heṭṭhā anāgatānaṃ padānaṃ vasena atthavaṇṇanā –
atk-s0402a:50_12: Tathā hi satisambojjhaṅgabhāvanānuyutto yogī vipassanākkhaṇe kiccato tadaṅgavivekanissitaṃ,
atk-s0402a:50_17: Te hi na kevalaṃ balavavipassanāmaggaphalakkhaṇesuyeva bojjhaṅge uddharanti,
atk-s0402a:50_20: Tasmā tesaṃ matena etesaṃ jhānānaṃ pavattikkhaṇe kiccato eva vikkhambhanavivekanissitaṃ.
atk-s0402a:51_0: Kevalaṃ hettha vossaggo duvidho pariccāgavossaggo ca pakkhandanavossaggo cāti.
atk-s0402a:51_6: Tathā hi ayaṃ satisambojjhaṅgo yathāvuttena pakārena kilese pariccajati,
atk-s0402a:51_8: Vossaggapariṇāminti iminā pana sakalena vacanena vossaggatthaṃ pariṇamantaṃ pariṇatañca,
atk-s0402a:51_10: Ayañhi bojjhaṅgabhāvanānuyutto bhikkhu yathā satisambojjhaṅgo kilesapariccāgavossaggatthaṃ nibbānapakkhandanavossaggatthañca paripaccati,
atk-s0402a:52_0: Idha pana nibbānaṃyeva sabbasaṅkhatehi vivittattā viveko,
atk-s0402a:52_4: tasmā satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattiyā vivekanissitaṃ,
atk-s0402a:52_6: Tañca kho ariyamaggakkhaṇuppattiyā kilesānaṃ samucchedato pariccāgabhāvena ca nibbānapakkhandanabhāvena
atk-s0402a:52_7: ca pariṇataṃ paripakkanti ayameva attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0402a:52_9: Iti ime satta bojjhaṅgā lokiyalokuttaramissakā kathitā.
atk-s0402a:52_10: Imesupi dvīsu balesu etadaggabhāvo vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0402a:53_1: Tatiye vivicceva kāmehītiādīnaṃ catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ pāḷiattho ca bhāvanānayo ca sabbo sabbākārena visuddhimagge vitthāritoyeva.
atk-s0402a:53_2: Imāni pana cattāri jhānāni eko bhikkhu cittekaggatthāya bhāveti,
atk-s0402a:53_8: Ayaṃ hi bhikkhu imāni jhānāni samāpajjitvā samāpattito vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre sammasitvā hetupaccayapariggahaṃ
atk-s0402a:53_9: katvā sappaccayaṃ nāmarūpañca vavatthapetvā indriyabalabojjhaṅgāni samodhānetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0402a:54_1: Catutthe saṃkhittena ca vitthārena cāti saṃkhittadhammadesanā vitthāradhammadesanā cāti dveyeva dhammadesanāti dasseti.
atk-s0402a:54_2: Tattha mātikaṃ uddisitvā kathitā desanā saṃkhittadesanā nāma.
atk-s0402a:54_3: Tameva mātikaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā vitthāradesanā nāma.
atk-s0402a:54_4: Mātikaṃ vā ṭhapetvāpi aṭṭhapetvāpi vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā vitthāradesanā nāma.
atk-s0402a:54_5: Tāsu saṃkhittadesanā nāma mahāpaññassa puggalassa vasena kathitā,
atk-s0402a:54_7: Mahāpaññassa hi vitthāradesanā atipapañco viya hoti.
atk-s0402a:54_8: Mandapaññassa saṅkhepadesanā sasakassa uppatanaṃ viya hoti,
atk-s0402a:54_9: neva antaṃ na koṭiṃ pāpuṇituṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0402a:54_12: Sakalampi hi tepiṭakaṃ saṅkhepadesanā vitthāradesanāti ettheva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0402a:55_6: kiccādhikaraṇanti imesaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ yasmiṃ adhikaraṇe.
atk-s0402a:55_7: Āpanno ca bhikkhūti āpattiṃ āpanno bhikkhu ca.
atk-s0402a:55_13: Bhikkhū ca na phāsuṃ viharissantīti aññamaññaṃ vivādāpanne bhikkhusaṅghe yepi uddesaṃ vā paripucchaṃ vā gahetukāmā padhānaṃ vā anuyuñjitukāmā,
atk-s0402a:55_15: Bhikkhusaṅghasmiṃ hi uposathapavāraṇāya ṭhitāya uddesādīhi atthikā uddesādīni gahetuṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0402a:55_18: Evaṃ bhikkhū ca na phāsuṃ viharissanti.
atk-s0402a:56_2: Akusalaṃ āpannoti ettha akusalanti āpatti adhippetā,
atk-s0402a:56_5: āpattiyā pana kañcideva desaṃ aññataraṃ āpattinti attho.
atk-s0402a:56_11: Accayo accagamāti aparādho atikkamitvā madditvā gato,
atk-s0402a:56_13: Suṅkadāyakaṃva bhaṇḍasminti yathā suṅkaṭṭhānaṃ pariharitvā nīte bhaṇḍasmiṃ suṅkadāyakaṃ aparādho abhibhavati,
atk-s0402a:57_1: yo hi raññā ṭhapitaṃ suṅkaṭṭhānaṃ pariharitvā bhaṇḍaṃ harati,
atk-s0402a:57_2: taṃ saha bhaṇḍasakaṭena ānetvā rañño dassenti.
atk-s0402a:57_6: evamevaṃ yaṃ so bhikkhu āpattiṃ āpanno,
atk-s0402a:57_9: Tīhi pana kāraṇehi tasseva bhikkhuno doso.
atk-s0402a:57_13: Codakassa pana yaṃ so taṃ āpattiṃ āpajjantaṃ addasa,
atk-s0402a:57_16: Tampi amanasikaritvā ayaṃ bhikkhu attanova dosaṃ paccavekkhanto “iti mameva tattha accayo accagamā suṅkadāyakaṃva
atk-s0402a:57_18: Dutiyavāre codakassa anattamanatā ca anattamanatāya coditabhāvo cāti dve dosā,
atk-s0402a:57_19: tesaṃ vasena “accayo accagamā”ti ettha yojanā kātabbā.
atk-s0402a:58_2: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti yenāti bhummatthe karaṇavacanaṃ.
atk-s0402a:58_5: Yena vā kāraṇena bhagavā devamanussehi upasaṅkamitabbo,
atk-s0402a:58_6: tena kāraṇena upasaṅkamīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0402a:58_12: Atha vā evaṃ gato tato āsannataraṃ ṭhānaṃ bhagavato samīpasaṅkhātaṃ gantvātipi vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a:59_0: Bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodīti yathā ca khamanīyādīni pucchanto bhagavā tena,
atk-s0402a:59_1: evaṃ sopi bhagavatā saddhiṃ samappavattamodo ahosi,
atk-s0402a:59_2: sītodakaṃ viya uṇhodakena sammoditaṃ ekībhāvaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0402a:59_7: kacci bhoto gotamassa ca sāvakānañca appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāro”tiādikāya kathāya sammodi,
atk-s0402a:59_8: taṃ pītipāmojjasaṅkhātassa sammodassa jananato sammodituṃ yuttabhāvato ca sammodanīyaṃ,
atk-s0402a:59_9: atthabyañjanamadhuratāya sucirampi kālaṃ sāretuṃ nirantaraṃ pavattetuṃ araharūpato saritabbabhāvato ca sāraṇīyaṃ.
atk-s0402a:59_13: atthaparisuddhatāya sāraṇīyanti evaṃ anekehi pariyāyehi sammodanīyaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ kathaṃ vītisāretvā pariyosāpetvā niṭṭhapetvā yenatthena āgato,
atk-s0402a:60_1: Tasmā yathā nisinno ekamantaṃ nisinno hoti,
atk-s0402a:60_5: Paṇḍitā hi purisā garuṭṭhānīyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā āsanakusalatāya ekamantaṃ nisīdanti.

atk-s0402a:147_4: Akatavedīti kataṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā na jānāti.
atk-s0402a:147_7: Akataññutā akataveditāti parena katassa upakārassa ajānanañceva pākaṭaṃ katvā ajānanañca.
atk-s0402a:148_1: Dutiye mātu ca pitu cāti janakamātu ca janakapitu ca. Ekena,
atk-s0402a:148_3: aṃsena mātaraṃ parihareyyāti ekasmiṃ aṃsakūṭe ṭhapetvā mātaraṃ paṭijaggeyya.
atk-s0402a:148_4: Ekena aṃsena pitaraṃ parihareyyāti ekasmiṃ aṃsakūṭe ṭhapetvā pitaraṃ paṭijaggeyya.
atk-s0402a:148_5: Vassasatāyuko vassasatajīvīti vassasatāyukakāle jāto sakalaṃ vassasataṃ jīvanto.
atk-s0402a:148_7: sace putto nāma “mātāpitūnaṃ paṭikarissāmī”ti uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya dakkhiṇe aṃsakūṭe mātaraṃ,
atk-s0402a:148_8: vāme pitaraṃ ṭhapetvā vassasatāyuko sakalampi vassasataṃ jīvamāno parihareyya.
atk-s0402a:148_9: So ca nesaṃ ucchādanaparimaddananhāpanasambāhanenāti so ca putto nesaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ aṃsakūṭesu ṭhitānaṃyeva
atk-s0402a:148_14: Te ca tatthevāti te ca mātāpitaro tattheva tassa aṃsakūṭesu nisinnāva muttakarīsaṃ cajeyyuṃ. Natveva,
atk-s0402a:148_17: evampi natveva mātāpitūnaṃ kataṃ vā hoti paṭikataṃ vā.
atk-s0402a:149_2: Puttā hi mātāpitūhi vaḍḍhitā ceva anupālitā ca.
atk-s0402a:149_3: Posakāti hatthapāde vaḍḍhetvā hadayalohitaṃ pāyetvā posakā.
atk-s0402a:149_4: Puttā hi mātāpitūhi puṭṭhā bhatā annapānādīhi paṭijaggitā.
atk-s0402a:149_5: Imassa lokassa dassetāroti sace hi mātāpitaro jātadivaseyeva puttaṃ pāde gahetvā araññe vā nadiyaṃ vā papāte vā khipeyyuṃ,
atk-s0402a:149_7: Evaṃ akatvā āpāditattā positattā esa imasmiṃ loke iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇaṃ mātāpitaro nissāya passatīti tyāssa imassa lokassa dassetāro nāma honti.
atk-s0402a:149_10: Dhammasenāpatisāriputtattherasadisova bhikkhu tesu patiṭṭhāpeti nāmāti veditabbo.
atk-s0402a:150_1: Tatiye tenupasaṅkamīti so hi brāhmaṇo “samaṇo kira gotamo kathitaṃ vissajjeti,
atk-s0402a:150_3: Ahamassa virajjhanapañhaṃ abhisaṅkharissāmī”ti paṇītabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā gabbhadvāraṃ pidahitvā nisinno cintetuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0402a:150_7: bhūmigharaṃ kāressāmī”ti bhūmigharaṃ kāretvā tattha pavisitvā –
atk-s0402a:150_9: evaṃ puṭṭho evaṃ kathessatī”ti ekaṃ gaṇhitvā ekaṃ vissajjento sakaladivasaṃ kiñci passituṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0402a:150_10: Tassa imināva nīhārena cattāro māsā vītivattā.
atk-s0402a:150_11: So catunnaṃ māsānaṃ accayena ubhatokoṭikaṃ pañhaṃ nāma addasa.
atk-s0402a:150_15: ‘sabbākusalānaṃ nāma tumhe kiriyaṃ vadethā’ti naṃ niggaṇhissāmi.
atk-s0402a:150_17: ‘kusaladhammānaṃ nāma tumhe akiriyaṃ vadethā’ti naṃ niggaṇhissāmi.
atk-s0402a:150_18: Idañhi ubhatokoṭikaṃ pañhaṃ puṭṭho neva uggilituṃ sakkhissati na niggilituṃ.
atk-s0402a:150_20: samaṇassa gotamassa parājayo”ti uṭṭhāya apphoṭetvā bhūmigharā nikkhamma “evarūpaṃ pañhaṃ pucchantena
atk-s0402a:150_21: na ekakena gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti nagare ghosanaṃ kāretvā sakalanāgarehi parivuto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0402a:150_23: Kimakkhāyīti kiṃ nāma sāvakānaṃ paṭipadaṃ akkhāyīti pucchi.
atk-s0402a:150_24: Athassa bhagavā catūhi māsehi pañhaṃ abhisaṅkharitvā “diṭṭho me samaṇassa gotamassa parājayapañho”ti
atk-s0402a:150_25: mānaṃ paggayha āgatabhāvaṃ ñatvā ekapadeneva taṃ pañhaṃ bhindanto kiriyavādī cāhaṃ,
atk-s0402a:150_27: Atha brāhmaṇo attano mānaṃ apanetvā bhagavantaṃ āyācanto yathākathaṃ panātiādimāha.
atk-s0402a:151_5: Āhuneyyā yajamānānaṃ hontīti dānaṃ dadantānaṃ āhunassa arahā dānapaṭiggāhakā nāma hontīti attho.
atk-s0402a:152_4: sabbajeṭṭhakassa puttassa ayyakaseṭṭhinova samānanāmakattāpi migāramātāti vuccati.
atk-s0402a:152_5: Tāya kārito sahassagabbho pāsādo migāramātupāsādo nāma.
atk-s0402a:152_7: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputtoti tasmiṃ pāsāde viharanto dhammasenāpatisāriputtatthero.
atk-s0402a:153_1: Kānici hi suttāni purebhatte bhāsitāni atthi,
atk-s0402a:154_4: Tathāgato hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ vīsati vassāni anibaddhavāso hutvā yattha yattha phāsukaṃ hoti,
atk-s0402a:154_6: Paṭhamaṃ antovassañhi isipatane dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvā aṭṭhārasa mahābrahmakoṭiyo amatapānaṃ pāyetvā bārāṇasiṃ upanissāya isipatane vasi.
atk-s0402a:154_9: pañcamaṃ antovassaṃ vesāliṃ upanissāya mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ,
atk-s0402a:154_20: soḷasamaṃ āḷavakaṃ dametvā caturāsītipāṇasahassāni amatapānaṃ pāyetvā āḷaviyaṃ,
atk-s0402a:154_24: vīsatimaṃ pana antovassaṃ rājagahaṃyeva upanissāya vasi.
atk-s0402a:154_25: Evaṃ vīsati vassāni anibaddhavāso hutvā yattha yattha phāsukaṃ hoti,
atk-s0402a:155_0: Tato paṭṭhāya pana dve senāsanāni dhuvaparibhogāni akāsi.
atk-s0402a:155_4: Anāthapiṇḍikassa hi visākhāya ca guṇaṃ sandhāya guṇaṃ paṭicca satthā tāni senāsanāni dhuvaparibhogena paribhuñji.
atk-s0402a:155_5: Utuvassaṃ cārikaṃ caritvāpi hi antovasse dvīsuyeva senāsanesu vasati.
atk-s0402a:155_6: Evaṃ vasanto pana jetavane rattiṃ vasitvā punadivase bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto dakkhiṇadvārena sāvatthiṃ
atk-s0402a:155_7: piṇḍāya pavisitvā pācīnadvārena nikkhamitvā pubbārāme divāvihāraṃ karoti.
atk-s0402a:155_8: Pubbārāme rattiṃ vasitvā punadivase pācīnadvārena sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā dakkhiṇadvārena nikkhamitvā jetavane divāvihāraṃ karoti.
atk-s0402a:155_9: Tasmiṃ pana divase sammāsambuddho jetavaneyeva vasi.
atk-s0402a:155_10: Yattha katthaci vasantassa cassa pañcavidhakiccaṃ avijahitameva hoti.
atk-s0402a:155_12: Tesu kiccesu pacchimayāmakiccakāle bhagavā lokaṃ olokento sāvatthivāsīnañca samantā ca sāvatthiyā gāvutaaḍḍhayojanayojanaparame
atk-s0402a:156_0: Tato “kasmiṃ nu kho kāle abhisamayo bhavissatī”ti olokento “sāyanhasamaye”ti disvā “mayi nu kho kathente abhisamayo bhavissati,
atk-s0402a:156_1: sāvake kathente bhavissatī”ti “sāriputtatthere kathente bhavissatī”ti addasa.
atk-s0402a:156_2: Tato “kattha nisīditvā kathente bhavissatī”ti olokento “visākhāya ratanapāsāde nisīditvā”ti disvā “buddhānaṃ nāma tayo sāvakasannipātā honti,
atk-s0402a:156_4: Tesu ajja dhammasenāpatisāriputtattherassa sāvakasannipāto bhavissatī”ti addasa.
atk-s0402a:156_5: Disvā pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā nivatthanivāsano sugatacīvaraṃ pārupitvā selamayapattaṃ ādāya bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto
atk-s0402a:156_6: dakkhiṇadvārena nagaraṃ pavisitvā piṇḍāya caranto bhikkhusaṅghassa sulabhapiṇḍapātaṃ katvā vātappahatā
atk-s0402a:156_7: viya nāvā paṭinivattitvā dakkhiṇadvārena nikkhamitvā bahidvāre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0402a:156_8: Tato asīti mahāsāvakā bhikkhuniparisā upāsakaparisā upāsikāparisāti catasso parisā satthāraṃ parivārayiṃsu.
atk-s0402a:157_4: bhante”ti thero attano parivārehi pañcahi bhikkhusatehi parivuto pubbārāmaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0402a:157_5: Eteneva niyāmena asīti mahāsāvake pubbārāmameva pesetvā sayaṃ ekena ānandatthereneva saddhiṃ jetavanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0402a:157_6: Ānandattheropi vihāre satthu vattaṃ katvā vanditvā “pubbārāmaṃ gacchāmi,
atk-s0402a:158_0: Taṃ divasañhi catasso parisā therasseva dhammakathaṃ sotukāmā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0402a:158_3: Visākhā pana mahāupāsikā dvīhi jaṅghasahassehi parivuto agamāsi.
atk-s0402a:158_4: Sattapaṇṇāsāya kulasatasahassānaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne sāvatthinagare gehapālakadārake ṭhapetvā sesajano gandhacuṇṇamālādīni gahetvā pubbārāmameva agamāsi.
atk-s0402a:158_5: Catūsu dvāragāmesu gāvutaaḍḍhayojanayojanaparamaṭṭhāne sabbeyeva manussā gandhacuṇṇamālādihatthā pubbārāmameva agamaṃsu.
atk-s0402a:159_0: Dhammasenāpatisāriputtattheropi kho vihāraṃ gantvā vihārapariveṇe aṅgaṇaṭṭhāne aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0402a:159_2: Thero tattha nisīditvā upaṭṭhākattherena vatte kate bhikkhusaṅghassa ovādaṃ katvā gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā samāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdi.
atk-s0402a:159_3: So paricchinnakālavasena samāpattito vuṭṭhāya aciravatiṃ gantvā rajojallaṃ pavāhetvā paṭippassaddhadaratho
atk-s0402a:159_4: otiṇṇatittheneva uttaritvā nivatthanivāsano saṅghāṭiṃ pārupitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0402a:159_5: Bhikkhusaṅghopi sammukhasammukhaṭṭhānena otaritvā sarīre rajojallaṃ pavāhetvā paccuttaritvā theraṃ parivārayiṃsu.
atk-s0402a:159_7: Catassopi parisā attano attano okāsaṃ ñatvā maggaṃ ṭhapetvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0402a:159_8: Sāriputtattheropi pañcabhikkhusataparivāro dhammasabhaṃ āgantvā sīhamatthakappatiṭṭhite samussitasetacchatte
atk-s0402a:159_13: kataradhammadesanā nu kho anucchavikā bhavissatī”ti tīṇi piṭakāni āvajjamāno imaṃ saṃyojanapariyāya dhammadesanaṃ addasa.
atk-s0402a:160_0: Evaṃ desanaṃ sallakkhetvā taṃ desetukāmo bhikkhū āmantesi āvuso,
atk-s0402a:160_4: ayaṃ panāyasmā “dasabalena samānaṃ ālapanaṃ na karissāmī”ti satthu gāravavasena sāvakālāpaṃ karonto,
atk-s0402a:161_0: Tasmiṃ pana ratanapāsāde adhivattho eko sotāpanno devaputto atthi,
atk-s0402a:161_1: so buddhehi vā sāvakehi vā desanāya āraddhamattāyayeva jānāti –
atk-s0402a:161_8: So tasmimpi divase therena desanāya āraddhamattāya evaṃ aññāsi –
atk-s0402a:161_9: “yena nīhārena mayhaṃ ayyena dhammasenāpatinā sāriputtattherena desanā āraddhā,
atk-s0402a:161_13: sotāpannādīnaṃ pana devamanussānaṃ paricchedo na bhavissati.
atk-s0402a:161_14: Desanāya anucchavikaṃ katvā mayhaṃ ayyassa sādhukāraṃ dassāmī”ti devānubhāvena mahantaṃ saddaṃ katvā –
atk-s0402a:162_0: Devarājena sādhukāre dinne parivārakapāsādasahasse adhivatthā devatā sabbāva sādhukāraṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0402a:162_6: Tāsaṃ sādhukārasaddena pathaviṭṭhakanāgā ca ākāsaṭṭhakadevatā ca.
atk-s0402a:162_32: akaniṭṭhā devatāti asaññe ca arūpāvacarasatte ca ṭhapetvā sotāyatanapavattiṭṭhāne sabbā devatā sādhukāramadaṃsu.
atk-s0402a:163_3: kimatthaṃ nu kho eso”ti āvajjento “dhammasenāpatisāriputtatthero pubbārāme visākhāya ratanapāsāde nisīditvā saṃyojanapariyāyadhammadesanamārabhi,
atk-s0402a:163_4: amhehipi tattha kāyasakkhīhi bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā tattha agamaṃsu.
atk-s0402a:163_7: yojananti sakalacakkavāḷaṃ heṭṭhā pathavitalena tiriyaṃ cakkavāḷapariyantena paricchinnaṃ dasahi cakkavāḷasahassehi
atk-s0402a:163_9: āragganitudanamatte ṭhāne uparimakoṭiyā saṭṭhi devatā sukhumattabhāve māpetvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0402a:164_1: kiṃ nu kho eta”nti āvajjento dasasahassacakkavāḷe ṭhitānaṃ devatānaṃ ekacakkavāḷe sannipatitabhāvaṃ addasa.
atk-s0402a:164_5: Tasmā thero samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā samāpattito vuṭṭhāya mahaggatacittena adhiṭṭhāsi –
atk-s0402a:164_8: Adhiṭṭhitakālato paṭṭhāya dakkhiṇajāṇupasse ca cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyañca nisīditvā “dhammasenāpatisāriputtatthero
atk-s0402a:164_9: nāma kīdiso dīgho rasso sāmo odāto”ti vattabbakāraṇaṃ nāhosi,
atk-s0402a:164_12: Dhammaṃ desentassāpissa dakkhiṇajāṇupasse ca cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyañca nisinnā sabbe ekakaṃseneva saddaṃ suṇiṃsu.
atk-s0402a:165_4: Kiñcāpi hi sattā kāmabhave appaṃ kālaṃ vasanti kappassa catutthameva koṭṭhāsaṃ,
atk-s0402a:165_5: itaresu tīsu koṭṭhāsesu kāmabhavo suñño hoti tuccho,
atk-s0402a:165_7: tathāpi tesaṃ yasmā kāmabhave cutipaṭisandhiyo bahukā honti,
atk-s0402a:165_10: tattha ālayopi patthanāpi abhilāsopi bahu hoti.
atk-s0402a:165_15: Iti ajjhattasaṅkhāte kāmabhave chandarāgo ajjhattasaṃyojanaṃ nāma,
atk-s0402a:165_17: Orambhāgiyāni vā pañca saṃyojanāni ajjhattasaṃyojanaṃ nāma,
atk-s0402a:165_21: tattha upapattinipphādanato taṃ oraṃ bhajantīti orambhāgiyāni.
atk-s0402a:165_23: tattha upapattinipphādanato taṃ uddhaṃ bhajantīti uddhambhāgiyāni.
atk-s0402a:166_0: Evaṃ vuttappabhedena ajjhattasaṃyojanena saṃyutto puggalo ajjhattasaṃyojano,
atk-s0402a:166_2: Ubhayampi cetaṃ na lokiyassa vaṭṭanissitamahājanassa nāmaṃ.
atk-s0402a:166_5: Yathā hi mahāaraññe khadiravanasālavanādīni thambho tulāsaṅghāṭoti nāmaṃ na labhanti,
atk-s0402a:166_7: Yadā pana tato rukkhā tiṇhāya kuṭhāriyā chinditvā thambhādisaṇṭhānena tacchitā honti,
atk-s0402a:166_9: Evamevaṃ aparicchinnabhavo bahalakileso puthujjano etaṃ nāmaṃ na labhati,
atk-s0402a:166_10: bhavaṃ paricchinditvā kilese tanuke katvā ṭhitā sotāpannādayova labhanti.
atk-s0402a:167_0: Imassa ca panatthassa vibhāvanatthaṃ idaṃ vacchakasālopamaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a:167_1: Vacchakasālaṃ hi katvā anto khāṇuke koṭṭetvā vacchake yottehi bandhitvā tesu upanibandhanti,
atk-s0402a:167_2: yottesu appahontesu kaṇṇesupi gahetvā tattha vacchake pavesenti,
atk-s0402a:167_3: antosālāya okāse appahonte bahi khāṇuke koṭṭetvāpi evameva karonti.
atk-s0402a:167_4: Tattha koci antobaddho vacchako bahinipanno hoti,
atk-s0402a:167_10: Tattha antobaddhassa bahinipannassa bandhanaṃ dīghaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a:167_11: So hi uṇhādipīḷito nikkhamitvā bahi vacchakānaṃ abbhantare nipajjati.
atk-s0402a:167_16: Ubhopi hi te divasampi khāṇukaṃ anuparigantvā tattheva sayanti.
atk-s0402a:167_17: Yo pana anto abaddho tattheva vacchakānaṃ antare vicarati.
atk-s0402a:167_18: Ayaṃ sīlavā vacchako kaṇṇe gahetvā vacchakānaṃ antare vissaṭṭho divasampi aññattha agantvā tattheva carati.
atk-s0402a:167_19: Bahi abaddhe tattheva vicarantepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a:168_0: Tattha vacchakasālā viya tayo bhavā veditabbā.
atk-s0402a:168_23: Saṃyojanesu pana sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbataparāmāsoti imāni tīṇi gacchantaṃ nivārenti,
atk-s0402a:168_25: Kāmacchando byāpādoti imāni pana dve saṃyojanāni samāpattiyā vā avikkhambhetvā maggena vā asamucchinditvā rūpārūpabhave nibbattituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0402a:169_0: Katamo cāvusoti idaṃ thero yathā nāma puriso dve ratanapeḷā passe ṭhapetvā sampattaparisāya dve hatthe pūretvā sattavidhaṃ ratanaṃ bhājetvā dadeyya,
atk-s0402a:169_1: evaṃ paṭhamaṃ ratanapeḷaṃ datvā dutiyampi tatheva dadeyya.
atk-s0402a:169_3: puggalaṃ desessāmi bahiddhāsaṃyojanañcā”ti imāni dve padāni mātikāvasena ṭhapetvā idāni aṭṭhavidhāya parisāya bhājetvā dassetuṃ vitthārakathaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0402a:170_2: Iti thero ettāvatā ca kira catupārisuddhisīlaṃ uddisitvā “pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto”ti iminā tattha jeṭṭhakasīlaṃ
atk-s0402a:170_7: itarāni pana tīṇi sīlanti vuttaṭṭhānaṃ nāma atthī”ti ananujānanto uttari āha –
atk-s0402a:170_13: ayaṃ chinnasīso viya puriso hatthapāde sesāni rakkhissatīti na vattabbo.
atk-s0402a:170_15: ayaṃ acchinnasīso viya puriso jīvitaṃ sesāni puna pākatikāni katvā rakkhituṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0402a:170_16: Tasmā sīlavāti iminā pātimokkhasaṃvaraṃ uddisitvā taṃ vitthārento “pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto”tiādimāhāti.
atk-s0402a:171_1: Ācāragocarasampannoti ācārena ca gocarena ca sampanno.
atk-s0402a:171_6: Sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti taṃ taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ samādiyitvā sikkhati.
atk-s0402a:171_7: Apica samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti yaṃkiñci sikkhāpadesu sikkhākoṭṭhāsesu sikkhitabbaṃ kāyikaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vā,
atk-s0402a:171_10: vitthārato pana sabbānetāni pātimokkhasaṃvarādīni padāni visuddhimagge vuttāni,
atk-s0402a:171_12: Aññataraṃ devanikāyanti chasu kāmāvacaradevaghaṭāsu aññataraṃ devaghaṭaṃ.
atk-s0402a:171_14: Āgantā itthattanti itthattaṃ mānusakapañcakkhandhabhāvameva āgantā hoti.
atk-s0402a:171_15: Tatrūpapattiko vā uparūpapattiko vā na hoti,
atk-s0402a:171_17: Iminā aṅgena sukkhavipassakassa dhātukammaṭṭhānikabhikkhuno heṭṭhimaṃ maggadvayañceva phaladvayañca kathitaṃ.
atk-s0402a:172_0: Aññataraṃ santaṃ cetovimuttinti aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu aññataraṃ catutthajjhānasamāpattiṃ.
atk-s0402a:172_2: teheva ca kilesehi cetaso vimuttattā cetovimuttīti vuccati.
atk-s0402a:172_4: Anāgantā itthattanti puna imaṃ pañcakkhandhabhāvaṃ anāgantā,
atk-s0402a:172_6: uparūpapattiko vā hoti tattheva vā parinibbāyīti dasseti.
atk-s0402a:172_7: Iminā aṅgena samādhikammikassa bhikkhuno tayo maggā tīṇi ca phalāni kathitāni.
atk-s0402a:173_0: Kāmānaṃyeva nibbidāyāti duvidhānampi kāmānaṃ nibbindanatthāya ukkaṇṭhanatthāya.
atk-s0402a:173_4: Ettāvatā sotāpannassa ca sakadāgāmino ca pañcakāmaguṇikarāgakkhayatthāya anāgāmimaggavipassanā kathitā hoti.
atk-s0402a:173_6: Iminā anāgāmino bhavarāgakkhayatthāya arahattamaggavipassanā kathitā hoti.
atk-s0402a:173_7: Taṇhākkhayāya paṭipanno hotīti imināpi sotāpannasakadāgāmīnaṃyeva pañcakāmaguṇikataṇhākkhayakaraṇatthaṃ anāgāmimaggavipassanā kathitā.
atk-s0402a:173_8: So lobhakkhayāyāti imināpi anāgāmino bhavalobhakkhayatthāya arahattamaggavipassanāva kathitā.
atk-s0402a:174_0: Iti paṭhamena aṅgena sukkhavipassakassa dhātukammaṭṭhānikabhikkhuno heṭṭhimāni dve maggaphalāni kathitāni,
atk-s0402a:174_2: “so kāmāna”nti iminā sotāpannasakadāgāmīnaṃ pañcakāmaguṇikarāgakkhayāya upari anāgāmimaggavipassanā,
atk-s0402a:174_4: “so taṇhākkhayāyā”ti iminā sotāpannasakadāgāmīnaṃ pañcakāmaguṇikataṇhākkhayāya upari anāgāmimaggavipassanā,
atk-s0402a:174_5: “so lobhakkhayāyā”ti iminā anāgāmino bhavalobhakkhayāya upari arahattamaggavipassanā kathitāti evaṃ chahi
atk-s0402a:174_6: mukhehi vipassanaṃ kathetvā desanaṃ yathānusandhiṃ pāpesi.
atk-s0402a:174_10: evaṃ mahāsamayasutte maṅgalasutte ca cūḷarāhulovādasutte ca koṭisatasahassadevatā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu,
atk-s0402a:175_1: Sabbāpi hi tā attano attabhāve sukhume cittasarikkhake katvā māpesuṃ.
atk-s0402a:175_6: Mayaṃ dasabalaṃ pakkositvā samāpattiyā thāmaṃ kathāpessāmā”ti sabbāpi ekacittā ahesuntipi samacittā.
atk-s0402a:175_9: ko nu kho imaṃ samāgamaṃ sampatto,
atk-s0402a:175_10: ko na sampatto”ti olokayamānā tathāgatassa asampattabhāvaṃ disvā “mayaṃ tathāgataṃ pakkositvā parisaṃ
atk-s0402a:175_11: paripuṇṇaṃ karissāmā”ti sabbāpi ekacittā ahesuntipi samacittā.
atk-s0402a:175_13: anāgate kocideva bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā devo vā manusso vā “ayaṃ desanā sāvakabhāsitā”ti agāravaṃ kareyya,
atk-s0402a:175_14: sammāsambuddhaṃ pakkositvā imaṃ desanaṃ sabbaññubhāsitaṃ karissāma.
atk-s0402a:175_15: Evaṃ anāgate garubhāvanīyā bhavissatīti sabbāva ekacittā ahesuntipi samacittā.
atk-s0402a:175_17: sabbāpi hi tā ekasamāpattilābhiniyo vā ahesuṃ ekārammaṇalābhiniyo vāti evampi samacittā.
atk-s0402a:176_2: Anukampaṃ upādāyāti na therassa anukampaṃ kāruññaṃ anuddayaṃ paṭicca,
atk-s0402a:176_3: na ca imasmiṃ ṭhāne therassa anukampitabbakiccaṃ atthi.
atk-s0402a:176_4: Yasmiṃ hi divase thero sūkarakhataleṇadvāre bhāgineyyassa dīghanakhaparibbājakassa vedanākammaṭṭhāne
atk-s0402a:176_5: kathiyamāne tālavaṇṭaṃ gahetvā satthāraṃ bījamāno ṭhito parassa vaḍḍhitabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā khudaṃ vinodento
atk-s0402a:176_6: viya parassa sajjitapasādhanaṃ sīse paṭimuñcanto viya ca sāvakapāramiñāṇassa nippadesato matthakaṃ patto,
atk-s0402a:176_8: Avasesānaṃ pana taṃ ṭhānaṃ sampattānaṃ devamanussānaṃ anukampaṃ upādāya gacchatu bhagavāti bhagavantaṃ yāciṃsu.
atk-s0402a:177_0: Balavā purisoti dubbalo hi khippaṃ samiñjanapasāraṇaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0402a:177_3: Sammukhe pāturahosīti sammukhaṭṭhāne puratoyeva pākaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0402a:177_4: Bhagavā etadavocāti etaṃ “idha sāriputtā”tiādinā nayena attano āgamanakāraṇaṃ avoca.
atk-s0402a:177_6: “sace koci bālo akataññū bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā upāsako vā upāsikā vā evaṃ cinteyya –
atk-s0402a:177_8: sammāsambuddho ettakaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto usūyāya parisaṃ uṭṭhāpetuṃ āgato’ti.
atk-s0402a:177_9: So imaṃ mayi manopadosaṃ katvā apāye nibbatteyyā”ti.
atk-s0402a:177_10: Athattano āgamanakāraṇaṃ kathento etaṃ “idha sāriputtā”tiādivacanaṃ avoca.
atk-s0402a:178_0: Evaṃ attano āgamanakāraṇaṃ kathetvā idāni samāpattiyā thāmaṃ kathetuṃ tā kho pana,
atk-s0402a:178_3: Tattha yasavasena vā atthaṃ āharituṃ vaṭṭati samāpattivasena vā.
atk-s0402a:178_4: Yasavasena tāva mahesakkhā devatā dasa dasa ekaṭṭhāne aṭṭhaṃsu,
atk-s0402a:178_5: tāhi appesakkhatarā vīsati vīsati ekaṭṭhāne aṭṭhaṃsu,
atk-s0402a:178_8: Samāpattivasena pana yāhi paṇītā samāpatti bhāvitā,
atk-s0402a:179_1: Na ca aññamaññaṃ byābādhentīti evaṃ sambādhe ṭhāne tiṭṭhantiyopi aññamaññaṃ na byābādhenti na ghaṭṭenti,
atk-s0402a:179_5: tvaṃ maṃ maddantī ṭhitā”ti vattabbakāraṇaṃ nāhosi.
atk-s0402a:179_8: Yena tā devatāti yena tathābhāvitena cittena tā devatā dasapi hutvā…pe…
atk-s0402a:179_11: Idheva khoti sāsane vā manussaloke vā bhummaṃ,
atk-s0402a:179_13: Tāsañhi devatānaṃ imasmiṃyeva manussaloke imasmiṃyeva ca sāsane taṃ cittaṃ bhāvitaṃ,
atk-s0402a:179_15: tato ca pana āgantvā evaṃ sukhume attabhāve māpetvā ṭhitā.
atk-s0402a:179_16: Tattha kiñcāpi kassapadasabalassa sāsane tīṇi maggaphalāni nibbattetvā brahmaloke nibbattadevatāpi atthi,
atk-s0402a:179_17: sabbabuddhānaṃ pana ekāva anusāsanī ekaṃ sāsananti katvā “idheva kho,
atk-s0402a:179_18: sāriputtā”ti aññabuddhānaṃ sāsanampi imameva sāsanaṃ karonto āha.
atk-s0402a:180_0: Idāni sāriputtattheraṃ ārabbha tantivasena anusāsaniṃ kathento tasmātiha,
atk-s0402a:180_2: Tattha tasmāti yasmā tā devatā idheva santaṃ samāpattiṃ nibbattetvā sante bhave nibbattā, tasmā.
atk-s0402a:180_3: Santindriyāti pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ santatāya nibbutatāya paṇītatāya santindriyā.
atk-s0402a:180_4: Santamānasāti mānasassa santatāya nibbutatāya paṇītatāya santamānasā.
atk-s0402a:180_5: Santaṃyeva upahāraṃ upaharissāmāti kāyacittūpahāraṃ santaṃ nibbutaṃ paṇītaṃyeva upaharissāma.
atk-s0402a:180_6: Sabrahmacārīsūti samānaṃ ekuddesatādiṃ brahmaṃ carantesu sahadhammikesu.
atk-s0402a:180_9: sikkhitabbanti iminā ettakena vārena bhagavā desanaṃ sabbaññubhāsitaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0402a:180_11: Ye imaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ nāssosunti ye attano pāpikaṃ tucchaṃ niratthakaṃ diṭṭhiṃ nissāya imaṃ evarūpaṃ
atk-s0402a:180_12: dhammadesanaṃ sotuṃ na labhiṃsūti yathānusandhinā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0402a:181_1: Chaṭṭhe varaṇāyaṃ viharatīti varaṇā nāma ekaṃ nagaraṃ,
atk-s0402a:181_9: yvāyaṃ pañca kāmaguṇe nissāya uppajjati kāmarāgo,
atk-s0402a:181_11: Kāmarāgena abhiniviṭṭhattā vinibaddhattā tasmiṃyeva ca kāmarāge mahāpaṅke viya paligedhattā anupaviṭṭhattā
atk-s0402a:181_12: teneva ca kāmarāgena pariyuṭṭhitattā gahitattā kāmarāgeneva ca ajjhositattā gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā gahitattāti.
atk-s0402a:181_14: Diṭṭhirāgoti panettha dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo nissāya uppajjanakarāgo veditabbo.
atk-s0402a:181_15: Puratthimesu janapadesūti therassa vasanaṭṭhānato sāvatthijanapado puratthimadisābhāge hoti,
atk-s0402a:181_19: Yathā hi yaṃ telaṃ mānaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0402a:181_22: Yañca jalaṃ taḷākaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0402a:181_25: evamevaṃ yaṃ pītivacanaṃ hadayaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0402a:181_26: adhikaṃ hutvā anto asaṇṭhahitvā bahi nikkhamati,
atk-s0402a:182_2: Upasaṅkamīti “mahākaccānatthero kira nāma attano pitumattampi ayyakamattampi disvā neva abhivādeti na
atk-s0402a:182_3: paccuṭṭheti na āsanena nimantetī”ti sutvā “na sakkā ettakena niṭṭhaṃ gantuṃ,
atk-s0402a:182_4: upasaṅkamitvā naṃ pariggaṇhissāmī”ti bhuttapātarāso yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0402a:182_17: Na hi bhavaṃ kaccāno brāhmaṇeti idaṃ attānaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0402a:182_19: amhe evaṃ mahallake disvā bhoto kaccānassa abhivādanamattampi paccuṭṭhānamattampi āsanena nimantanamattampi natthīti.
atk-s0402a:182_20: Na sampannamevāti na yuttameva na anucchavikameva.
atk-s0402a:183_0: Thero brāhmaṇassa vacanaṃ sutvā “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo neva vuddhe jānāti na dahare,
atk-s0402a:183_1: ācikkhissāmissa vuddhe ca dahare cā”ti desanaṃ vaḍḍhento atthi brāhmaṇātiādimāha.
atk-s0402a:183_3: Passatāti tadeva hatthe ṭhapitaṃ āmalakaṃ viya passantena.
atk-s0402a:183_4: Vuddhabhūmīti yena kāraṇena vuddho nāma hoti,
atk-s0402a:183_6: Daharabhūmīti yena kāraṇena daharo nāma hoti,
atk-s0402a:183_10: Kāme paribhuñjatīti vatthukāme kilesakāmeti duvidhepi kāme kamanavasena paribhuñjati.
atk-s0402a:183_11: Kāmamajjhāvasatīti duvidhepi kāme ghare gharassāmiko viya vasati adhivasati.
atk-s0402a:183_12: Kāmapariyesanāya ussukoti duvidhānampi kāmānaṃ pariyesanatthaṃ ussukkamāpanno.
atk-s0402a:183_13: Bālo na therotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchatīti so na thero bālo mandotveva gaṇanaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0402a:184_0: “Na tena thero so hoti, yenassa palitaṃ siro;
atk-s0402a:186_3: Bhadrena yobbanena samannāgatoti yena yobbanena samannāgato yuvā,
atk-s0402a:186_5: Paṭhamena vayasāti paṭhamavayo nāma tettiṃsa vassāni,
atk-s0402a:186_7: Paṇḍito therotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchatīti so evarūpo puggalo paṇḍitoti ca theroti ca gaṇanaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0402a:187_0: “Yamhi saccañca dhammo ca, ahiṃsā saṃyamo damo;
atk-s0402a:188_0: Sa ve vantamalo dhīro, thero iti pavuccatī”ti. ;
atk-s0402a:189_6: Rājāno tasmiṃ samaye dubbalā hontīti tasmiṃ samaye rājāno tāsaṃ sampattīnaṃ abhāvena dubbalā honti.
atk-s0402a:189_7: Atiyātunti bahiddhā janapadacārikaṃ caritvā icchiticchitakkhaṇe antonagaraṃ pavisituṃ.
atk-s0402a:189_9: te nisedhessāmā”ti paṭhamayāme vā majjhimayāme vā pacchimayāme vā nikkhamituṃ phāsukaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0402a:189_10: Tato uṭṭhāya corā manusse pothetvā acchinditvā gacchanti.
atk-s0402a:189_11: Paccantime vā janapade anusaññātunti gāmaṃ vāsakaraṇatthāya setuṃ attharaṇatthāya pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇāpanatthāya
atk-s0402a:189_12: sālādīnaṃ karaṇatthāya paccantime janapade anusaññātumpi na sukhaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a:189_14: Bāhirāni vā kammantānīti bahigāme ārāme khettakammantāni.
atk-s0402a:189_15: Pāpabhikkhū balavanto hontīti pakkhuttarā yasuttarā puññavanto bahukehi upaṭṭhākehi ca upaṭṭhākīhi ca samannāgatā rājarājamahāmattasannissitā.
atk-s0402a:189_16: Pesalā bhikkhū tasmiṃ samaye dubbalā hontīti tasmiṃ samaye piyasīlā bhikkhū tāsaṃ sampattīnaṃ abhāvena dubbalā honti.
atk-s0402a:189_17: Tuṇhībhūtā tuṇhībhūtāva saṅghamajjhe saṅkasāyantīti nissaddā hutvā saṅghamajjhe nisinnā kiñci ekavacanampi
atk-s0402a:189_18: mukhaṃ ukkhipitvā kathetuṃ asakkontā pajjhāyantā viya nisīdanti.
atk-s0402a:190_1: Navame micchāpaṭipattādhikaraṇahetūti micchāpaṭipattiyā kāraṇahetu paṭipajjanahetūti attho.
atk-s0402a:190_3: Evarūpo hi sahavipassanakaṃ maggaṃ ārādhetuṃ sampādetuṃ pūretuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0402a:190_5: Imasmiṃ sutte saha vipassanāya maggo kathito.
atk-s0402a:191_3: Atthañca dhammañca paṭibāhantīti suggahitasuttantānaṃ atthañca pāḷiñca paṭibāhanti,
atk-s0402a:191_4: attano duggahitasuttantānaṃyeva atthañca pāḷiñca uttaritaraṃ katvā dassenti.
atk-s0402a:191_6: Imasmiṃ sutte sāsanassa vuddhi ca parihāni ca kathitāti.
atk-s0402a:196_12: Pākatindriyāti pakatiyā ṭhitehi vivaṭehi arakkhitehi indriyehi samannāgatā.
atk-s0402a:197_1: Dutiye bhaṇḍanajātāti bhaṇḍanaṃ vuccati kalahassa pubbabhāgo,
atk-s0402a:197_5: Pabbajitā pana āpattivītikkamavācaṃ vadantā kalahajātā nāma.
atk-s0402a:197_7: Mukhasattīhi vitudantāti guṇānaṃ chindanaṭṭhena dubbhāsitā vācā mukhasattiyoti vuccanti,
atk-s0402a:197_9: Samaggāti ekakammaṃ ekuddeso samasikkhatāti etesaṃ karaṇena samaggatāya sahitā.
atk-s0402a:198_6: Okkamane pubbaṅgamāti ettha okkamanaṃ vuccati avagamanaṭṭhena pañca nīvaraṇāni,
atk-s0402a:198_10: Na vīriyaṃ ārabhantīti duvidhampi vīriyaṃ na karonti.
atk-s0402a:198_11: Appattassa pattiyāti pubbe appattassa jhānavipassanāmaggaphalavisesassa pattiatthāya.
atk-s0402a:198_14: Diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjatīti ācariyupajjhāyehi kataṃ anukaronto diṭṭhassa tesaṃ ācārassa anugatiṃ āpajjati nāma.
atk-s0402a:199_3: “Idaṃ dukkha”nti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānantīti ṭhapetvā taṇhaṃ tebhūmakā pañcakkhandhā dukkhasaccaṃ nāma,
atk-s0402a:199_5: ito uddhaṃ dukkhaṃ natthīti yathāsabhāvato nappajānanti.
atk-s0402a:199_7: Sesapadesu pana tassa dukkhassa samuṭṭhāpikā purimataṇhā samudayo nāma,
atk-s0402a:199_9: dvinnampi vā tesaṃ saccānaṃ accantakkhayo asamuppatti dukkhanirodho nāma,
atk-s0402a:199_10: aṭṭhaṅgiko ariyamaggo dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā nāmāti evaṃ imasmiṃ sutte catūhi saccehi cattāro maggā ca cattāri ca phalāni kathitāni.
atk-s0402a:200_1: Pañcame parisākasaṭoti kasaṭaparisā kacavaraparisā palāpaparisāti attho.
atk-s0402a:200_6: Imāni pana cattāri agatigamanāni bhaṇḍabhājanīye ca vinicchayaṭṭhāne ca labbhanti.
atk-s0402a:200_7: Tattha bhaṇḍabhājanīye tāva attano bhārabhūtānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ amanāpe bhaṇḍake patte taṃ parivattetvā manāpaṃ dento chandāgatiṃ gacchati nāma.
atk-s0402a:200_8: Attano pana abhārabhūtānaṃ manāpe bhaṇḍake patte taṃ parivattetvā amanāpaṃ dento dosāgatiṃ gacchati nāma.
atk-s0402a:200_9: Bhaṇḍakabhājanīyavatthuñca ṭhitikañca ajānanto mohāgatiṃ gacchati nāma.
atk-s0402a:200_10: Mukharānaṃ vā rājādinissitānaṃ vā “ime me amanāpe bhaṇḍake dinne anatthampi kareyyu”nti bhayena parivattetvā manāpaṃ dento bhayāgatiṃ gacchati nāma.
atk-s0402a:200_12: sabbesaṃ tulābhūto pamāṇabhūto majjhatto hutvā yaṃ yassa pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0402a:200_14: ayaṃ catubbidhampi agatigamanaṃ na gacchati nāma.
atk-s0402a:200_15: Vinicchayaṭṭhāne pana attano bhārabhūtassa garukāpattiṃ lahukāpattīti katvā kathento chandāgatiṃ gacchati nāma.
atk-s0402a:200_16: Itarassa lahukāpattiṃ garukāpattīti katvā kathento dosāgatiṃ gacchati nāma.
atk-s0402a:200_17: Āpattivuṭṭhānaṃ pana samuccayakkhandhakañca ajānanto mohāgatiṃ gacchati nāma.
atk-s0402a:200_18: Mukharassa vā rājapūjitassa vā “ayaṃ me garukaṃ katvā āpattiṃ kathentassa anatthampi kareyyā”ti garukameva
atk-s0402a:200_19: lahukāti katvā kathento bhayāgatiṃ gacchati nāma.
atk-s0402a:200_21: ayaṃ catubbidhampi agatigamanaṃ na gacchati nāma.
atk-s0402a:201_7: Na aññā cittaṃ upaṭṭhapentīti vijānanatthāya cittaṃ na upaṭṭhapenti,
atk-s0402a:201_9: Uggahetabbaṃ pariyāpuṇitabbanti uggahetabbe ca pariyāpuṇitabbe ca.

atk-s0402a:361_1: Pātimokkhaṃ paññattanti bhikkhupātimokkhaṃ bhikkhunipātimokkhanti duvidhaṃ pātimokkhaṃ paññattaṃ.
atk-s0402a:361_5: Pavāraṇā paññattāti cātuddasikā pannarasikāti dve pavāraṇā paññattā.
atk-s0402a:361_6: Pavāraṇaṭṭhapanaṃ paññattanti sāpattikassa bhikkhuno pavāraṇā uttiyā vattamānāya pavāraṇaṭṭhapanaṃ paññattaṃ.
atk-s0402a:361_7: Tajjanīyakammādīsu bhikkhū vācāsattīhi vitudantānaṃ paṇḍukalohitakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tajjanīyakammaṃ paññattaṃ.
atk-s0402a:361_8: Bālassa abyattassa seyyasakassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṃ paññattaṃ.
atk-s0402a:361_9: Kuladūsake assajipunabbasuke bhikkhū ārabbha pabbājanīyakammaṃ paññattaṃ.
atk-s0402a:361_12: Garukāpattiṃ āpannassa paṭicchannāya āpattiyā parivāsadānaṃ paññattaṃ.
atk-s0402a:361_13: Parivāse antarāpattiṃ āpannassa mūlāya paṭikassanaṃ paññattaṃ.
atk-s0402a:362_1: garudhammūpasampadā ubhatosaṅghe upasampadā dūtena upasampadāti aṭṭhavidhā upasampadā paññattā.
atk-s0402a:362_2: Ñattikammaṃ nava ṭhānāni gacchatīti evaṃ navaṭṭhānikaṃ ñattikammaṃ paññattaṃ.
atk-s0402a:362_3: Ñattidutiyakammaṃ satta ṭhānāni gacchatīti evaṃ sattaṭṭhānikameva ñattidutiyakammaṃ paññattaṃ.
atk-s0402a:362_4: Ñatticatutthakammaṃ satta ṭhānāni gacchatīti evaṃ sattaṭṭhānikameva ñatticatutthakammaṃ paññattaṃ.
atk-s0402a:362_7: Dhammasammukhatā vinayasammukhatā saṅghasammukhatā puggalasammukhatāti imassa catubbidhassa sammukhībhāvassa vasena sammukhāvinayo paññatto.
atk-s0402a:362_10: Appaṭiññāya cuditakassa āpattiyā ataraṇatthaṃ paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ paññattaṃ.
atk-s0402a:362_14: Bhaṇḍanādivasena bahuṃ assāmaṇakaṃ katvā āpattiṃ āpannānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ṭhapetvā thullavajjaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0402a:384_3: Te taṃ pavattiṃ sutakālato paṭṭhāya bhayaṃ santāsaṃ āpajjanti.
atk-s0402a:384_5: “Yathā no te corā kupitā anatthampi āvaheyyu”nti hatthasāraṃ gahetvā dvipadacatuppadehi saddhiṃ araññaṃ
atk-s0402a:384_6: pavisitvā tattha tattha bhūmiyaṃ nipajjanti ḍaṃsamakasādīhi khajjamānā,
atk-s0402a:384_8: Tesaṃ evaṃ vicarantānaṃ vikkhittabhāvo anekaggatākāro nāma.
atk-s0402a:384_9: Tato coresu yathāvutte divase anāgacchantesu “tucchakasāsanaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0402a:384_11: Atha tesaṃ paviṭṭhabhāvaṃ ñatvā gāmaṃ parivāretvā dvāre aggiṃ datvā manusse ghātetvā corā sabbaṃ vibhavaṃ vilumpitvā gacchanti.
atk-s0402a:384_12: Tesu ghātitāvasesā aggiṃ nibbāpetvā koṭṭhakacchāyābhitticchāyādīsu tattha tattha laggitvā nisīdanti naṭṭhaṃ anusocamānā.
atk-s0402a:385_4: Ullittāvalittānīti anto ca bahi ca littāni.
atk-s0402a:385_6: Phusitaggaḷānīti chekehi vaḍḍhakīhi katattā piṭṭhasaṅghāṭamhi suṭṭhu phusitakavāṭāni.
atk-s0402a:385_8: Iminā padadvayena kavāṭavātapānānaṃ niccapihitataṃ akathetvā sampattiyeva kathitā.
atk-s0402a:385_9: Icchiticchitakkhaṇe pana tāni pidhīyanti ca vivarīyanti ca.
atk-s0402a:386_1: Bālo hi apaṇḍitapuriso rajjaṃ vā oparajjaṃ vā aññaṃ vā pana mahantaṃ ṭhānaṃ patthento katipaye attanā
atk-s0402a:386_2: sadise vidhavaputte mahādhutte gahetvā “etha ahaṃ tumhe issare karissāmī”ti pabbatagahanādīni nissāya
atk-s0402a:386_3: antamante gāme paharanto dāmarikabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā anupubbena nigamepi janapadepi paharati.
atk-s0402a:386_4: Manussā gehāni chaḍḍetvā khemaṭṭhānaṃ patthayamānā pakkamanti.
atk-s0402a:386_5: Te nissāya vasantā bhikkhūpi bhikkhuniyopi attano attano vasanaṭṭhānāni pahāya pakkamanti.
atk-s0402a:386_7: Evaṃ catunnampi parisānaṃ bhayaṃ āgatameva hoti.
atk-s0402a:386_8: Pabbajjitesupi dve bālā bhikkhū aññamaññaṃ vivādaṃ paṭṭhapetvā codanaṃ ārabhanti.
atk-s0402a:386_10: Catunnaṃ parisānaṃ bhayaṃ āgatameva hotīti evaṃ yāni kānici bhayāni uppajjanti,
atk-s0402a:386_11: sabbāni tāni bālato uppajjantīti yathānusandhinā desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0402a:388_1: Dutiye kāyadvārādipavattaṃ kammaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ sañjānanakāraṇaṃ assāti kammalakkhaṇo.
atk-s0402a:388_2: Apadānasobhanī paññāti yā paññā nāma apadānena sobhati,
atk-s0402a:388_3: bālā ca paṇḍitā ca attano attano cariteneva pākaṭā hontīti attho.
atk-s0402a:388_4: Bālena hi gatamaggo rukkhagacchagāmanigamādīni jhāpetvā gacchantassa indaggino gatamaggo viya hoti,
atk-s0402a:388_6: Paṇḍitena gatamaggo kusobbhādayo pūretvā vividhasassasampadaṃ āvahamānena catudīpikameghena gatamaggo viya hoti.
atk-s0402a:388_7: Yathā tena gatamagge udakapūrāni ceva vividhasassaphalāphalāni ca tāni tāni ṭhānāni paññāyanti,
atk-s0402a:388_8: evaṃ paṇḍitena gatamagge sampattiyova paññāyanti no vipattiyoti.
atk-s0402a:390_1: Tatiye bālalakkhaṇānīti “bālo aya”nti etehi lakkhīyati ñāyatīti bālalakkhaṇāni.
atk-s0402a:392_1: Catutthe accayaṃ accayato na passatīti attano aparādhaṃ aparādhato na passati.
atk-s0402a:392_2: Accayato disvā yathādhammaṃ nappaṭikarotīti “aparaddhaṃ mayā”ti ñatvāpi yo dhammo,
atk-s0402a:392_4: daṇḍakammaṃ āharitvā accayaṃ na deseti nakkhamāpeti.
atk-s0402a:392_5: Accayaṃ desentassa yathādhammaṃ nappaṭiggaṇhātīti parassa “viraddhaṃ mayā”ti ñatvā daṇḍakammaṃ āharitvā khamāpentassa nakkhamati.
atk-s0402a:394_1: Pañcame ayoniso pañhaṃ kattā hotīti “kati nu kho, udāyi,
atk-s0402a:394_2: anussatiṭṭhānānī”ti vutte “pubbenivāso anussatiṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti cintetvā lāḷudāyitthero viya anupāyacintāya apañhameva pañhanti kattā hoti.
atk-s0402a:394_3: Ayoniso pañhaṃ vissajjetā hotīti evaṃ cintitaṃ pana pañhaṃ vissajjentopi “idha, bhante,
atk-s0402a:394_6: ekampi jāti”ntiādinā nayena soyeva thero viya ayoniso vissajjetā hoti,
atk-s0402a:394_8: Parimaṇḍalehi padabyañjanehīti ettha padameva atthassa byañjanato padabyañjanaṃ.
atk-s0402a:394_9: Taṃ akkharapāripūriṃ katvā dasavidhaṃ byañjanabuddhiṃ aparihāpetvā vuttaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0402a:394_13: Nābbhanumoditāti evaṃ yoniso sabbaṃ kāraṇasampannaṃ katvāpi vissajjitaṃ parassa pañhaṃ nābhinumodati
atk-s0402a:394_14: nābhinandati sāriputtattherassa pañhaṃ lāḷudāyitthero viya. Yathāha –
atk-s0402a:395_3: yaṃ so atikkammeva kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ aññataraṃ manomayaṃ kāyaṃ upapanno saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpajjeyyāpi vuṭṭhaheyyāpi,
atk-s0402a:396_0: Yoniso pañhaṃ kattātiādīsu ānandatthero viya yonisova pañhaṃ cintetvā yoniso vissajjitā hoti.
atk-s0402a:396_2: anussatiṭṭhānānī”ti pucchito “ayaṃ pañho bhavissatī”ti yoniso cintetvā yoniso vissajjento āha – “idha, bhante,
atk-s0402a:396_6: Abbhanumoditā hotīti tathāgato viya yoniso abbhanumoditā hoti.
atk-s0402a:396_7: Tathāgato hi ānandattherena pañhe vissajjite “sādhu sādhu, ānanda,
atk-s0402a:398_1: Navame sukkapakkho pubbabhāge dasahipi kusalakammapathehi paricchinno,
atk-s0402a:398_3: Bahuñca puññaṃ pasavatīti ettha lokiyalokuttaramissakapuññaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0402a:400_5: Tañhi nirayādīsu apāyesu anudahatīti anudahanaṭṭhenapi malaṃ.
atk-s0402a:400_6: Tena samannāgato puggalo mātāpitūnampi santike bhikkhusaṅghassāpi antare bodhicetiyaṭṭhānesupi jigucchanīyo hoti,
atk-s0402a:400_7: sabbadisāsu cassa “evarūpaṃ kira tena pāpakammaṃ kata”nti avaṇṇagandho vāyatīti duggandhaṭṭhenapi malaṃ.
atk-s0402a:400_8: Tena ca samannāgato puggalo gatagataṭṭhāne upatāpañceva labhati,
atk-s0402a:400_9: kāyakammādīni cassa asucīni honti apabhassarānīti kiliṭṭhakaraṇaṭṭhenapi malaṃ.
atk-s0402a:400_10: Apica taṃ devamanussasampattiyo ceva nibbānasampattiñca milāpetīti milāpanaṭṭhenapi malanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a:406_8: bhūtabaliṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti evarūpe samādapeti gaṇhāpeti.
atk-s0402a:406_10: attano santakaṃ parassa adātukāmena “natthī”ti ayaṃ vañcanamusāvādo nāma vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti evarūpe samādapeti.
atk-s0402a:406_12: kammaṭṭhānaṃ visaṃvādetvā kathento pana ananulomikesu dhammesu samādapeti nāma dakkhiṇavihāravāsitthero viya.
atk-s0402a:406_13: Taṃ kira theraṃ eko upaṭṭhāko amaccaputto upasaṅkamitvā “mettāyantena paṭhamaṃ kīdise puggale mettāyitabba”nti pucchi.
atk-s0402a:406_15: Tassa ca bhariyā piyā hoti manāpā,
atk-s0402a:406_16: so taṃ ārabbha mettāyanto ummādaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0402a:406_18: Evarūpassa hi saddhivihārikādayo ceva upaṭṭhākādayo ca tesaṃ ārakkhadevatā ādiṃ katvā tāsaṃ tāsaṃ mittabhūtā
atk-s0402a:406_19: yāva brahmalokā sesadevatā ca “ayaṃ bhikkhu na ajānitvā karissatī”ti tena katameva karonti,
atk-s0402a:407_0: Sukkapakkhe pāṇātipātā veramaṇiādīnaṃyeva vasena kāyakammavacīkammāni veditabbāni.
atk-s0402a:407_1: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ pana avisaṃvādetvā kathento anulomikesu dhammesu samādapeti nāma koḷitavihāravāsī catunikāyikatissatthero viya.
atk-s0402a:407_2: Tassa kira jeṭṭhabhātā nandābhayatthero nāma potaliyavihāre vasanto ekasmiṃ roge samuṭṭhite kaniṭṭhaṃ pakkosāpetvā āha – “āvuso,
atk-s0402a:407_3: mayhaṃ sallahukaṃ katvā ekaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathehī”ti. Kiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0402a:407_8: ekasmiñca upādārūpe diṭṭhe tevīsati upādārūpāni pākaṭāni hontīti.
atk-s0402a:407_10: ettaka”nti taṃ uyyojetvā kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ pariggaṇhitvā upādārūpaṃ sallakkhetvā vivaṭṭetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0402a:407_11: Atha naṃ theraṃ bahivihārā anikkhantameva pakkositvā, “āvuso,
atk-s0402a:407_12: mahāavassayosi mayhaṃ jāto”ti kaniṭṭhattherassa attanā paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0402a:407_13: Bahujanahitāyāti etassapi hi saddhivihārikādayo “ayaṃ na ajānitvā karissatī”ti tena katameva karontīti bahujanahitāya paṭipanno nāma hotīti.
atk-s0402a:409_5: Yāvajīvaṃ sāraṇīyanti daharakāle jānitumpi na sakkā,
atk-s0402a:409_6: aparabhāge pana mātāpituādīhi ñātakehi vā dāsādīhi vā “tvaṃ asukajanapade asukanagare asukadivase asukanakkhatte
atk-s0402a:409_7: jāto”ti ācikkhite sutvā tato paṭṭhāya yāvajīvaṃ sarati na sammussati.
atk-s0402a:410_2: dutiyanti abhisekaṭṭhānaṃ nāma rañño balavatuṭṭhikaraṃ hoti,
atk-s0402a:411_0: Idāni yasmā sammāsambuddhassa rañño jātiṭṭhānādīhi kattabbakiccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0402a:411_1: imasmiṃ pana sāsane tappaṭibhāge tayo puggale dassetuṃ idaṃ kāraṇaṃ ābhataṃ,
atk-s0402a:411_4: Tattha anagāriyaṃ pabbajito hotīti ettha catupārisuddhisīlampi pabbajjānissitamevāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a:411_5: Sāraṇīyaṃ hotīti “ahaṃ asukaraṭṭhe asukajanapade asukavihāre asukamāḷake asukadivāṭṭhāne asukacaṅkame
atk-s0402a:411_6: asukarukkhamūle pabbajito”ti evaṃ yāvajīvaṃ saritabbameva hoti na sammussitabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a:412_8: asukarukkhamūle sotāpanno jāto”ti yāvajīvaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ hoti asammussanīyaṃ.
atk-s0402a:413_3: Sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvāti attanāva abhivisiṭṭhāya paññāya paccakkhaṃ katvā.
atk-s0402a:413_6: asukarukkhamūle arahattaṃ patta”nti attano arahattapattiṭṭhānaṃ nāma yāvajīvaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ hoti asammussanīyanti yathānusandhināva desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0402a:416_0: Ettāvatā kulavipattiṃ dassetvā idāni yasmā nīcakule jātopi ekacco aḍḍho hoti mahaddhano,
atk-s0402a:416_8: Yattha kasirena ghāsacchādo labbhatīti yasmiṃ kule dukkhena yāgubhattaghāso ca kopīnamattaṃ acchādanañca labbhati.
atk-s0402a:417_0: Idāni yasmā ekacco nīcakule jātopi upadhisampanno hoti attabhāvasamiddhiyaṃ ṭhito,
atk-s0402a:417_2: tasmāssa sarīravipattimpi dassetuṃ so ca hoti dubbaṇṇotiādimāha.
atk-s0402a:418_0: Jeṭṭhoti aññasmiṃ jeṭṭhe sati kaniṭṭho āsaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0402a:418_2: Ābhisekoti jeṭṭhopi na abhisekāraho āsaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0402a:418_4: Anabhisittoti abhisekārahopi kāṇakuṇiādidosarahito sakiṃ abhisitto puna abhiseke āsaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0402a:418_6: Acalappattoti jeṭṭhopi ābhiseko anabhisitto mando uttānaseyyako,
atk-s0402a:418_8: Soḷasavassuddesiko pana paññāyamānamassubhedo acalappatto nāma hoti,
atk-s0402a:419_4: kiñcideva asāruppaṃ disvā “idaṃ iminā kataṃ bhavissatī”ti evaṃ paresaṃ āsaṅkanīyasamācāro,
atk-s0402a:419_7: Tassa hi divāṭṭhānādīsu sannipatitvā kiñcideva mantayante bhikkhū disvā “ime ekato hutvā mantenti,
atk-s0402a:419_8: kacci nu kho mayā katakammaṃ jānitvā mantentī”ti evaṃ sāsaṅkasamācāro hoti.
atk-s0402a:419_10: Assamaṇo samaṇapaṭiññoti assamaṇo hutvāva samaṇapatirūpakatāya “samaṇo aha”nti evaṃ paṭiñño.
atk-s0402a:419_11: Abrahmacārī brahmacāripaṭiññoti aññe brahmacārino sunivatthe supārute sumbhakapattadhare gāmanigamarājadhānīsu
atk-s0402a:419_12: piṇḍāya caritvā jīvikaṃ kappente disvā sayampi tādisena ākārena tathā paṭipajjanato “ahaṃ brahmacārī”ti
atk-s0402a:419_14: “Ahaṃ bhikkhū”ti vatvā uposathaggādīni pavisanto pana brahmacāripaṭiñño hotiyeva,
atk-s0402a:421_1: Catutthe catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi janaṃ rañjetīti rājā.
atk-s0402a:421_5: Dhammeneva dasavidhena cakkavattivattena rājā jātoti dhammarājā.
atk-s0402a:421_6: Sopi na arājakanti sopi aññaṃ nissayarājānaṃ alabhitvā cakkaṃ nāma vattetuṃ na sakkotīti attho.
atk-s0402a:421_7: Iti satthā desanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā yathānusandhiṃ apāpetvāva tuṇhī ahosi. Kasmā?
atk-s0402a:421_9: bahū hi imasmiṃ ṭhāne tathārūpā bhikkhū,
atk-s0402a:421_11: Atheko anusandhikusalo bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ pucchanto ko pana,
atk-s0402a:422_2: Nissāyāti tadadhiṭṭhānena cetasā tameva nissayaṃ katvā.
atk-s0402a:422_3: Dhammaṃ sakkarontoti yathā kato so dhammo suṭṭhu kato hoti,
atk-s0402a:422_5: Dhammaṃ garuṃ karontoti tasmiṃ gāravuppattiyā taṃ garukaronto.
atk-s0402a:422_6: Dhammaṃ apacāyamānoti tasseva dhammassa añjalikaraṇādīhi nīcavuttitaṃ karonto.
atk-s0402a:422_7: Dhammaddhajo dhammaketūti taṃ dhammaṃ dhajamiva purakkhatvā ketumiva ukkhipitvā pavattiyā dhammaddhajo dhammaketu ca hutvāti attho.
atk-s0402a:422_8: Dhammādhipateyyoti dhammādhipatibhūtāgatabhāvena dhammavaseneva ca sabbakiriyānaṃ karaṇena dhammādhipateyyo hutvā.
atk-s0402a:422_9: Dhammikaṃ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṃ saṃvidahatīti dhammo assā atthīti dhammikā,
atk-s0402a:422_10: rakkhā ca āvaraṇañca gutti ca rakkhāvaraṇagutti.
atk-s0402a:422_11: Tattha “paraṃ rakkhanto attānaṃ rakkhatī”ti vacanato khantiādayo rakkhā.
atk-s0402a:422_19: Taṃ sabbampi suṭṭhu vidahati pavatteti ṭhapetīti attho.
atk-s0402a:423_3: antojanasaṅkhātaṃ puttadāraṃ sīlasaṃvare patiṭṭhāpento vatthagandhamālādīni cassa dadamāno sabbopaddave
atk-s0402a:423_4: cassa nivārayamāno dhammikaṃ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṃ saṃvidahati nāma.
atk-s0402a:423_12: tathā nigamavāsino negamā janapadavāsino ca jānapadā.
atk-s0402a:424_0: Dhammeneva cakkaṃ vattetīti dasakusalakammapathadhammeneva cakkaṃ pavatteti.
atk-s0402a:424_1: Taṃ hoti cakkaṃ appaṭivattiyanti taṃ tena evaṃ pavattitaṃ āṇācakkaṃ appaṭivattiyaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a:424_2: Kenaci manussabhūtenāti devatā nāma attanā icchiticchitameva karonti,
atk-s0402a:424_8: Dhammarājāti navahi lokuttaradhammehi mahājanaṃ rañjetīti dhammarājā.
atk-s0402a:424_9: Dhammaṃyevāti navalokuttaradhammameva nissāya tameva sakkaronto taṃ garukaronto taṃ apacāyamāno.
atk-s0402a:424_12: Tameva adhipatiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā viharatīti dhammādhipateyyo.
atk-s0402a:424_16: sucaritaṃ sevitabbanti evaṃ sabbattha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a:424_18: Dhammeneva anuttaraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattetīti navalokuttaradhammeneva asadisaṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavatteti.
atk-s0402a:424_19: Taṃ hoti cakkaṃ appaṭivattiyanti taṃ evaṃ pavattitaṃ dhammacakkaṃ etesu samaṇādīsu ekenapi paṭivattetuṃ paṭibāhituṃ na sakkā.
atk-s0402a:426_1: Pañcame isipataneti buddhapaccekabuddhasaṅkhātānaṃ isīnaṃ dhammacakkappavattanatthāya ceva uposathakaraṇatthāya ca āgantvā patane,
atk-s0402a:426_6: Chahi māsehi chārattūnehīti so kira raññā āṇattadivaseyeva sabbūpakaraṇāni sajjetvā antevāsikehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0402a:426_7: araññaṃ pavisitvā gāmadvāragāmamajjhadevakulasusānādīsu ṭhitarukkhe ceva jhāmapatitasukkharukkhe ca vivajjetvā
atk-s0402a:426_8: sampannapadese ṭhite sabbadosavivajjite nābhiaranemīnaṃ anurūpe rukkhe gahetvā taṃ cakkaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0402a:426_9: Tassa rukkhe vicinitvā gaṇhantassa ceva karontassa ca ettako kālo vītivatto.
atk-s0402a:427_1: Sakasāvāti pūtisārena ceva pheggunā ca yuttā.
atk-s0402a:427_7: Tesupi purimā tayo kilesānaṃ samudācārakkhaṇe papatitā nāma,
atk-s0402a:427_12: pāṇātipāto adinnādānaṃ micchācāro musāvādo pisuṇāvācā micchādiṭṭhīti ime tāva cha sotāpattimaggena pahīyanti,
atk-s0402a:429_1: Chaṭṭhe apaṇṇakapaṭipadanti aviraddhapaṭipadaṃ ekaṃsapaṭipadaṃ niyyānikapaṭipadaṃ kāraṇapaṭipadaṃ sārapaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0402a:429_2: maṇḍapaṭipadaṃ apaccanīkapaṭipadaṃ anulomapaṭipadaṃ dhammānudhammapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno hoti,
atk-s0402a:429_4: Evaṃ gahetvā paṭipanno hi bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā upāsako vā upāsikā vā manussadevanibbānasampattīhi hāyati parihāyati,
atk-s0402a:429_5: apaṇṇakapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno pana tāhi sampattīhi na parihāyati.
atk-s0402a:429_6: Atīte kantāraddhānamaggaṃ paṭipannesu dvīsu satthavāhesu yakkhassa vacanaṃ gahetvā bālasatthavāho saddhiṃ satthena anayabyasanaṃ patto,
atk-s0402a:429_7: yakkhassa vacanaṃ aggahetvā “udakadiṭṭhaṭṭhāne udakaṃ chaḍḍessāmā”ti satthake saññāpetvā maggaṃ paṭipanno paṇḍitasatthavāho viya.
atk-s0402a:432_0: Yoni cassa āraddhā hotīti ettha yonīti khandhakoṭṭhāsassapi kāraṇassapi passāvamaggassapi nāmaṃ.
atk-s0402a:432_6: yonijaṃ mattisambhava”nti ca “tamenaṃ kammajavātā nivattitvā uddhaṃpādaṃ adhosiraṃ samparivattetvā mātu
atk-s0402a:433_4: okāsato yāva bhavaggā savantīti vā āsavā,
atk-s0402a:433_5: ete dhamme etañca okāsaṃ antokaritvā pavattantīti attho.
atk-s0402a:433_9: Lokasmimpi hi cirapārivāsikā madirādayo āsavāti vuccanti,
atk-s0402a:433_16: Āyataṃ vā saṃsāradukkhaṃ savanti pasavantītipi āsavā.
atk-s0402a:433_17: Purimāni cettha nibbacanāni yattha kilesā āsavāti āgacchanti,
atk-s0402a:433_23: diṭṭhadhammikānaṃyeva āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya dhammaṃ desemī”ti ettha vivādamūlabhūtā kilesā āsavāti āgatā.
atk-s0402a:436_0: Te mayhaṃ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā”ti. –
atk-s0402a:437_0: Ettha tebhūmakaṃ ca kammaṃ avasesā ca akusalā dhammā.
atk-s0402a:437_1: “Diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāyā”ti ettha parūpavādavippaṭisāravadhabandhādayo
atk-s0402a:438_0: Te panete āsavā yattha yathā āgatā,
atk-s0402a:438_2: Ete hi vinaye tāva “diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya,
atk-s0402a:438_5: āsavā kāmāsavo bhavāsavo avijjāsavo”ti tidhā āgatā.
atk-s0402a:438_6: Aññesu ca suttantesu abhidhamme ca teyeva diṭṭhāsavena saha catudhā āgatā.
atk-s0402a:438_18: Sabbāsavapariyāye teyeva dassanena pahātabbehi saddhiṃ sattadhā āgatā.
atk-s0402a:438_19: Idha pana abhidhammanayena cattāro āsavā adhippetāti veditabbā.
atk-s0402a:439_0: Khayāyāti ettha pana āsavānaṃ sarasabhedopi khīṇākāropi maggaphalanibbānānipi “āsavakkhayo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0402a:439_1: “Yo āsavānaṃ khayo vayo bhedo paribhedo aniccatā antaradhāna”nti ettha hi āsavānaṃ sarasabhedo “āsavakkhayo”ti vutto.
atk-s0402a:439_4: passato āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmī”ti ettha āsavappahānaṃ āsavānaṃ accantakkhayo asamuppādo khīṇākāro natthibhāvo “āsavakkhayo”ti vutto.
atk-s0402a:441_0: Khayasmiṃ paṭhamaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tato aññā anantarā”ti. –
atk-s0402a:442_0: Ettha maggo “āsavakkhayo”ti vutto. “Āsavānaṃ khayā samaṇo hotī”ti ettha phalaṃ.
atk-s0402a:444_0: Āsavā tassa vaḍḍhanti, ārā so āsavakkhayā”ti. –
atk-s0402a:445_1: Imasmiṃ pana sutte phalaṃ sandhāya “āsavānaṃ khayāyā”ti āha,
atk-s0402a:446_3: Jāgariyaṃ anuyuttoti rattindivaṃ cha koṭṭhāse katvā pañcasu koṭṭhāsesu jāgaraṇabhāvaṃ anuyutto,
atk-s0402a:447_0: Evaṃ mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā idāni tameva ṭhapitapaṭipāṭiyā vibhajanto kathañca,
atk-s0402a:447_3: Tattha cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvātiādīnaṃ attho visuddhimagge vitthārito,
atk-s0402a:447_4: tathā paṭisaṅkhā yoniso āhāraṃ āhāreti neva davāyātiādīnaṃ.
atk-s0402a:447_8: Sīhaseyyaṃ kappetīti sīho viya seyyaṃ kappeti.
atk-s0402a:447_9: Pāde pādaṃ accādhāyāti vāmapādaṃ dakkhiṇapāde atiādhāya.
atk-s0402a:447_10: Samaṃ ṭhapite hi pāde jāṇukena jāṇukaṃ gopphakena ca gopphakaṃ ghaṭīyati,
atk-s0402a:447_12: Tasmā tassa dosassa parivajjanatthaṃ thokaṃ atikkamitvā esa pādaṃ ṭhapeti.
atk-s0402a:448_0: Sato sampajānoti satiyā ceva sampajaññena ca samannāgato.
atk-s0402a:448_1: Kathaṃ panesa niddāyanto sato sampajāno nāma hotīti?
atk-s0402a:448_3: Ayaṃ hi caṅkame caṅkamanto niddāya okkamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā pavattamānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ ṭhapetvā mañce vā phalake
atk-s0402a:448_4: vā nipanno niddaṃ upagantvā puna pabujjhamāno kammaṭṭhānaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhāne gaṇhantoyeva pabujjhati.
atk-s0402a:448_5: Tasmā niddāyantopi sato sampajāno nāma hoti.
atk-s0402a:448_7: Pariggahakammaṭṭhānavasenāpi panesa sato sampajāno nāma hoti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0402a:448_8: Ayaṃ hi caṅkamanto niddāya okkamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā pāsāṇaphalake vā mañce vā dakkhiṇena passena nipajjitvā paccavekkhati –
atk-s0402a:448_14: Tattha ākāsampi ‘ahaṃ vātaṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhita’nti na jānāti,
atk-s0402a:448_21: Na hi tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ ābhogo vā samannāhāro vā manasikāro vā cetanā vā patthanā vā atthī”ti.
atk-s0402a:448_22: Tassa evaṃ paccavekkhato taṃ paccavekkhaṇacittaṃ bhavaṅge otarati.
atk-s0402a:448_23: Evaṃ niddāyantopi sato sampajāno nāma hotīti.
atk-s0402a:449_0: Uṭṭhānasaññaṃ manasikaritvāti “ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ gate cande vā tārakāya vā uṭṭhahissāmī”ti uṭṭhānakālaparicchedikaṃ saññaṃ manasikaritvā,
atk-s0402a:449_2: Evaṃ karitvā sayito hi yathāparicchinneyeva kāle uṭṭhahati.
atk-s0402a:453_3: Jiguccheyyāthāti gūthe viya tasmiṃ vacane sañjātajigucchā bhaveyyātha.
atk-s0402a:453_6: Dibbena kira āyunā aṭṭīyathāti evamassa sambandho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a:455_4: Na sakkaccaṃ kammantaṃ adhiṭṭhātīti yathā adhiṭṭhitaṃ suadhiṭṭhitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0402a:455_6: Tattha paccūsakāle padasaddena uṭṭhāya dīpaṃ jāletvā bhaṇḍaṃ pasāretvā anisīdanto pubbaṇhasamayaṃ na sakkaccaṃ kammantaṃ adhiṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-s0402a:455_7: Ayaṃ hi yaṃ corā rattiṃ bhaṇḍaṃ haritvā “idaṃ amhākaṃ hatthato vissajjessāmā”ti āpaṇaṃ gantvā appena agghena denti,
atk-s0402a:455_8: yampi bahuverino manussā rattiṃ nagare vasitvā pātova āpaṇaṃ gantvā bhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhanti,
atk-s0402a:455_9: yaṃ vā pana janapadaṃ gantukāmā manussā pātova āpaṇaṃ gantvā bhaṇḍaṃ kiṇanti,
atk-s0402a:456_0: Aññesaṃ bhojanavelāya pana bhuñjituṃ āgantvā pātova bhaṇḍaṃ paṭisāmetvā gharaṃ gantvā bhuñjitvā niddāyitvā
atk-s0402a:456_1: sāyaṃ puna āpaṇaṃ āgacchanto majjhanhikasamayaṃ na sakkaccaṃ kammantaṃ adhiṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-s0402a:456_2: So hi yaṃ corā pātova vissajjetuṃ na sampāpuṇiṃsu,
atk-s0402a:456_3: divākāle pana paresaṃ asañcārakkhaṇe āpaṇaṃ gantvā appagghena denti,
atk-s0402a:456_4: yañca bhojanavelāya puññavanto issarā “āpaṇato idañcidañca laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti pahiṇitvā āharāpenti,
atk-s0402a:457_0: Yāva yāmabherinikkhamanā pana antoāpaṇe dīpaṃ jālāpetvā anisīdanto sāyanhasamayaṃ na sakkaccaṃ kammantaṃ adhiṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-s0402a:457_1: So hi yaṃ corā pātopi divāpi vissajjetuṃ na sampāpuṇiṃsu,
atk-s0402a:457_2: sāyaṃ pana āpaṇaṃ gantvā appagghena denti,
atk-s0402a:458_0: Na sakkaccaṃ samādhinimittaṃ adhiṭṭhātīti sakkaccakiriyāya samādhiṃ na samāpajjati.
atk-s0402a:458_1: Ettha ca pātova cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇesu vattaṃ katvā senāsanaṃ pavisitvā yāva bhikkhācāravelā,
atk-s0402a:458_2: tāva samāpattiṃ appetvā anisīdanto pubbaṇhasamayaṃ na sakkaccaṃ samādhinimittaṃ adhiṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-s0402a:458_3: Pacchābhattaṃ pana piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā yāva sāyanhasamayā samāpattiṃ
atk-s0402a:458_4: appetvā anisīdanto majjhanhikasamayaṃ na sakkaccaṃ samādhinimittaṃ adhiṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-s0402a:458_5: Sāyaṃ pana cetiyaṃ vanditvā therūpaṭṭhānaṃ katvā senāsanaṃ pavisitvā paṭhamayāmaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā
atk-s0402a:458_6: anisīdanto sāyanhasamayaṃ na sakkaccaṃ samādhinimittaṃ adhiṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-s0402a:458_8: Apicettha “samāpattiṃ appetvā”ti vuttaṭṭhāne samāpattiyā asati vipassanāpi vaṭṭati,
atk-s0402a:460_2: Vidhuroti visiṭṭhadhuro uttamadhuro ñāṇasampayuttena vīriyena samannāgato.
atk-s0402a:460_5: Ettakaṃ mūlaṃ bhavissati ettako udayoti tasmiṃ “evaṃ kītaṃ evaṃ vikkāyamāna”nti vuttapaṇiye yena kayena taṃ kītaṃ,
atk-s0402a:461_0: Kusalo hoti paṇiyaṃ ketuñca vikketuñcāti sulabhaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā kiṇanto dullabhaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā vikkiṇanto ca ettha kusalo nāma hoti,
atk-s0402a:462_3: Paṭibaloti kāyabalena ceva ñāṇabalena ca samannāgatattā samattho.
atk-s0402a:462_4: Amhākañca kālena kālaṃ anuppadātunti amhākañca gahitadhanamūlikaṃ vaḍḍhiṃ kālena kālaṃ anuppadātuṃ.
atk-s0402a:463_0: Kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upasampadāyāti kusaladhammānaṃ sampādanatthāya paṭilābhatthāya.
atk-s0402a:463_3: Anikkhittadhuroti “aggamaggaṃ apāpuṇitvā imaṃ vīriyadhuraṃ na ṭhapessāmī”ti evaṃ aṭṭhapitadhuro.
atk-s0402a:464_0: Bahussutāti ekanikāyādivasena bahu buddhavacanaṃ sutaṃ etesanti bahussutā.
atk-s0402a:464_1: Āgatāgamāti eko nikāyo eko āgamo nāma,
atk-s0402a:464_4: etesu āgamesu yesaṃ ekopi āgamo āgato paguṇo pavattito,
atk-s0402a:464_10: Paripañhatīti “imaṃ nāma pucchissāmī”ti aññāti tuleti pariggaṇhāti.
atk-s0402a:465_0: Imasmiṃ pana sutte paṭhamaṃ paññā āgatā,
atk-s0402a:465_2: Tattha paṭhamaṃ arahattaṃ patvā pacchā vīriyaṃ katvā kalyāṇamittā sevitabbāti na evaṃ attho daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0402a:465_3: desanāya nāma heṭṭhimena vā paricchedo hoti uparimena vā dvīhipi vā koṭīhi.
atk-s0402a:465_5: Tasmā kathentena paṭhamaṃ kalyāṇamittaupanissayaṃ dassetvā majjhe vīriyaṃ dassetvā pacchā arahattaṃ kathetabbanti.
atk-s0402a:471_8: Saddhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hotīti samiddhattherassa kira arahattamaggakkhaṇe saddhindriyaṃ dhuraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0402a:471_9: sesāni cattāri sahajātindriyāni tasseva parivārāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0402a:471_10: Iti thero attanā paṭividdhamaggaṃ kathento evamāha.
atk-s0402a:471_11: Mahākoṭṭhikattherassa pana arahattamaggakkhaṇe samādhindriyaṃ dhuraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0402a:471_12: sesāni cattāri indriyāni tasseva parivārāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0402a:471_13: Tasmā sopi samādhindriyaṃ adhimattanti kathento attanā paṭividdhamaggameva kathesi.
atk-s0402a:471_14: Sāriputtattherassa pana arahattamaggakkhaṇe paññindriyaṃ dhuraṃ ahosi.
atk-s0402a:471_15: Sesāni cattāri indriyāni tasseva parivārāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0402a:471_16: Tasmā sopi paññindriyaṃ adhimattanti kathento attanā paṭividdhamaggameva kathesi.
atk-s0402a:472_3: Evametasmiṃ sutte tīhipi therehi attanā paṭividdhamaggova kathito,
atk-s0402a:474_3: Neva vuṭṭhāti tamhā ābādhāti iminā atekicchena vātāpamārādinā rogena samannāgato niṭṭhāpattagilāno kathito.
atk-s0402a:474_4: Vuṭṭhāti tamhā ābādhāti iminā khipitakakacchutiṇapupphakajarādibhedo appamattaābādho kathito.
atk-s0402a:474_5: Labhanto sappāyāni bhojanāni no alabhantoti iminā pana yesaṃ paṭijagganena phāsukaṃ hoti,
atk-s0402a:474_7: Ettha ca patirūpo upaṭṭhāko nāma gilānupaṭṭhākaaṅgehi samannāgato paṇḍito dakkho analaso veditabbo.
atk-s0402a:474_9: Tasmiñhi gilāne attano dhammatāya yāpetuṃ asakkonte bhikkhusaṅghena tassa bhikkhuno eko bhikkhu ca sāmaṇero
atk-s0402a:474_12: tāva gilānassa ca tesañca dvinnaṃ yenattho,
atk-s0402a:475_0: Aññepi gilānā upaṭṭhātabbāti itarepi dve gilānā upaṭṭhāpetabbā.
atk-s0402a:475_5: Na kho pana maṃ paṭijaggantī”ti manopadosaṃ katvā apāye nibbatteyya.
atk-s0402a:475_6: Paṭijaggiyamānassa panassa evaṃ hoti “bhikkhusaṅghena yaṃ kātabbaṃ,
atk-s0402a:475_9: So bhikkhusaṅghe mettaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā sagge nibbattissati.
atk-s0402a:475_10: Yo pana appamattakena byādhinā samannāgato labhantopi alabhantopi vuṭṭhātiyeva,
atk-s0402a:475_11: tassa vināpi bhesajjena vūpasamanabyādhi bhesajje kate khippataraṃ vūpasammati.
atk-s0402a:475_12: So tato buddhavacanaṃ vā uggaṇhituṃ sakkhissati,
atk-s0402a:476_1: Niyāmaṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattanti kusalesu dhammesu magganiyāmasaṅkhātaṃ sammattaṃ.
atk-s0402a:476_3: Dutiyavārena ugghaṭitaññū gahito sāsane nālakattherasadiso buddhantare ekavāraṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ santike
atk-s0402a:477_0: Dhammadesanā anuññātāti māsassa aṭṭha vāre dhammakathā anuññātā.
atk-s0402a:477_1: Aññesampi dhammo desetabboti itaresampi dhammo kathetabbo.
atk-s0402a:477_3: Padaparamassa hi imasmiṃ attabhāve dhammaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ asakkontassāpi anāgate paccayo bhavissati.
atk-s0402a:477_4: Yo pana tathāgatassa rūpadassanaṃ labhantopi alabhantopi dhammavinayañca savanāya labhantopi alabhantopi dhammaṃ abhisameti,
atk-s0402a:477_6: Labhanto pana khippameva abhisamessatīti iminā kāraṇena tesaṃ dhammo desetabbo.
atk-s0402a:479_3: Abhisaṅkharotīti āyūhati rāsiṃ karoti piṇḍaṃ karoti.
atk-s0402a:479_6: Sabyābajjhā phassā phusantīti sadukkhā vipākaphassā phusanti.
atk-s0402a:479_7: Sabyābajjhaṃ vedanaṃ vediyatīti sadukkhaṃ vipākavedanaṃ vediyati,
atk-s0402a:479_9: Seyyathāpi sattā nerayikāti yathā niraye nibbattasattā ekantadukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vediyanti,
atk-s0402a:479_11: Kiṃ pana tattha upekkhāvedanā natthīti? Atthi,
atk-s0402a:479_12: dukkhavedanāya pana balavabhāvena sā abbohārikaṭṭhāne ṭhitā.
atk-s0402a:479_13: Iti nirayova nirayassa upamaṃ katvā āhaṭo.
atk-s0402a:480_0: Seyyathāpi devā subhakiṇhāti idhāpi devalokova devalokassa upamaṃ katvā āhaṭo.
atk-s0402a:480_1: Yasmā pana heṭṭhimesu brahmalokesu sappītikajjhānavipāko vattati,
atk-s0402a:480_4: Iti ayampi tatra paṭibhāgaupamā nāmāti veditabbā.
atk-s0402a:481_1: Seyyathāpi manussāti manussānaṃ hi kālena sukhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0402a:481_6: Tesaṃ hi hīnatarānaṃ mahesakkhatarā devatā disvā āsanā vuṭṭhātabbaṃ hoti,
atk-s0402a:481_9: añjalikammaṃ kātabbanti taṃ sabbampi dukkhaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0402a:481_11: Te hi kālena sampattiṃ anubhavanti kālena kammanti vokiṇṇasukhadukkhāva honti.
atk-s0402a:481_12: Iti imasmiṃ sutte tīṇi sucaritāni lokiyalokuttaramissakāni kathitānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0402a:483_6: Saraṇaṃ gato hotīti avassayaṃ gato hoti.
atk-s0402a:483_9: Idañca pana saraṇagamanaṃ aggahitasaraṇapubbassa akatābhinivesassa vasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a:483_10: Iti imasmiṃ sutte saraṇadāyako sotāpattimaggasampāpako arahattamaggasampāpakoti tayo ācariyā bahukārāti āgatā,
atk-s0402a:483_11: pabbajjādāyako buddhavacanadāyako kammavācācariyo sakadāgāmimaggasampāpako anāgāmimaggasampāpakoti ime ācariyā na āgatā,
atk-s0402a:483_18: upari dve maggā ca phalāni ca arahattamaggasannissitānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0402a:484_1: Na suppatikāraṃ vadāmīti patikāraṃ kātuṃ na sukaranti vadāmi.
atk-s0402a:484_2: Abhivādanādīsu anekasatavāraṃ anekasahassavārampi hi pañcapatiṭṭhitena nipatitvā vandanto āsanā vuṭṭhāya
atk-s0402a:484_3: paccuggacchanto diṭṭhadiṭṭhakkhaṇe añjaliṃ paggaṇhanto anucchavikaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ karonto divase divase
atk-s0402a:484_4: cīvarasataṃ cīvarasahassaṃ piṇḍapātasataṃ piṇḍapātasahassaṃ dadamāno cakkavāḷapariyantena sabbaratanamayaṃ
atk-s0402a:484_5: āvāsaṃ karonto sappinavanītādinānappakāraṃ bhesajjaṃ anuppadajjamāno neva sakkoti ācariyena katassa patikāraṃ
atk-s0402a:486_16: Purāṇavaṇo hi attano dhammatāyeva pubbaṃ lohitaṃ yūsanti imāni tīṇi savati,
atk-s0402a:487_2: tassa attano dhammatāya savanaṃ viya kodhanassapi attano dhammatāya uddhumātassa viya caṇḍikatassa caraṇaṃ,
atk-s0402a:487_3: kaṭṭhena vā kaṭhalāya vā ghaṭṭanaṃ viya appamattaṃ vacanaṃ,
atk-s0402a:487_4: bhiyyosomattāya savanaṃ viya “mādisaṃ nāma esa evaṃ vadatī”ti bhiyyosomattāya uddhumāyanabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0402a:488_3: cakkhumā puriso viya hi yogāvacaro daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0402a:488_6: vijjantarikāya cakkhumato purisassa samantā rūpadassanaṃ viya sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe nibbānadassanaṃ,
atk-s0402a:488_9: vijjantarikāya cakkhumato purisassa samantā rūpadassanaṃ viya sakadāgāmimaggakkhaṇe nibbānadassanaṃ,
atk-s0402a:488_12: vijjantarikāya cakkhumato purisassa samantā rūpadassanaṃ viya anāgāmimaggakkhaṇe nibbānadassanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a:489_3: vajirassa maṇigaṇṭhimpi vā pāsāṇagaṇṭhimpi vā vinivijjhitvā agamanabhāvassa natthitā viya arahattamaggañāṇena acchejjānaṃ kilesānaṃ natthibhāvo,
atk-s0402a:489_4: vajirena nibbiddhavedhassa puna apatipūraṇaṃ viya arahattamaggena chinnānaṃ kilesānaṃ puna anuppādo daṭṭhabboti.
atk-s0402a:491_4: Sakkatvā garuṃ katvāti sakkārañceva garukārañca katvā.
atk-s0402a:491_5: Hīno hoti sīlenātiādīsu upādāyupādāya hīnatā veditabbā.
atk-s0402a:491_6: Tattha yo hi pañca sīlāni rakkhati,
atk-s0402a:491_7: so dasa sīlāni rakkhantena na sevitabbo.
atk-s0402a:491_10: Aññatra anuddayā aññatra anukampāti ṭhapetvā anuddayañca anukampañca.
atk-s0402a:491_11: Attano atthāyeva hi evarūpo puggalo na sevitabbo,
atk-s0402a:492_0: Sīlasāmaññagatānaṃ satanti sīlena samānabhāvaṃ gatānaṃ santānaṃ.
atk-s0402a:492_1: Sīlakathā ca no bhavissatīti evaṃ samānasīlānaṃ amhākaṃ sīlameva ārabbha kathā bhavissati.
atk-s0402a:492_2: Sā ca no pavattinī bhavissatīti sā ca amhākaṃ kathā divasampi kathentānaṃ pavattissati na paṭihaññissati.
atk-s0402a:492_3: Sā ca no phāsu bhavissatīti sā ca divasampi pavattamānā sīlakathā amhākaṃ phāsuvihāro sukhavihāro bhavissati.
atk-s0402a:493_1: Tattha tattha paññāya anuggahessāmīti ettha sīlassa asappāye anupakāradhamme vajjetvā sappāye upakāradhamme
atk-s0402a:493_2: sevanto tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne sīlakkhandhaṃ paññāya anuggaṇhāti nāma.
atk-s0402a:493_4: Nihīyatīti attano hīnataraṃ puggalaṃ sevanto khāraparissāvane āsittaudakaṃ viya satataṃ samitaṃ hāyati parihāyati.
atk-s0402a:493_8: Tasmā attano uttariṃ bhajethāti yasmā seṭṭhaṃ puggalaṃ upanamanto udeti khippaṃ,
atk-s0402a:495_2: Atha kho nanti atha kho assa.
atk-s0402a:495_4: Evameva khoti ettha gūthakūpo viya dussīlyaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a:495_5: Gūthakūpe patitvā ṭhito dhammaniahi viya dussīlapuggalo.
atk-s0402a:495_6: Gūthakūpato uddhariyamānena tena ahinā purisassa sarīraṃ āruḷhenāpi adaṭṭhabhāvo viya dussīlaṃ sevamānassāpi tassa kiriyāya akaraṇabhāvo.
atk-s0402a:495_7: Sarīraṃ gūthena makkhetvā ahinā gatakālo viya dussīlaṃ sevamānassa pāpakittisaddaabbhuggamanakālo veditabbo.
atk-s0402a:496_1: Bhiyyosomattāya cicciṭāyatīti taṃ hi jhāyamānaṃ pakatiyāpi papaṭikāyo muñcantaṃ cicciṭāti “ciṭiciṭā”ti saddaṃ karoti,
atk-s0402a:496_3: Evameva khoti evamevaṃ kodhano attano dhammatāyapi uddhato caṇḍikato hutvā carati,
atk-s0402a:496_4: appamattakaṃ pana vacanaṃ sutakāle “mādisaṃ nāma evaṃ vadati evaṃ vadatī”ti atirekataraṃ uddhato caṇḍikato hutvā carati.
atk-s0402a:496_8: Tasmā evarūpo puggalo ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabboti yasmā kodhano atiseviyamāno atiupasaṅkamiyamānopi kujjhatiyeva,
atk-s0402a:496_10: Tasmā palālaggi viya ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo.
atk-s0402a:496_16: Anupasaṅkamitvā apaṭikkamitvā pana majjhattabhāvena tappantassa sītaṃ vūpasammati,
atk-s0402a:496_17: tasmā palālaggi viya kodhano puggalo majjhattabhāvena ajjhupekkhitabbo,
atk-s0402a:496_18: na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo.
atk-s0402a:499_1: Aṭṭhame gūthabhāṇīti yo gūthaṃ viya duggandhakathaṃ katheti.
atk-s0402a:499_2: Pupphabhāṇīti yo pupphāni viya sugandhakathaṃ katheti.
atk-s0402a:499_3: Madhubhāṇīti yo madhu viya madhurakathaṃ katheti.
atk-s0402a:499_12: Attahetu vā parahetu vāti attano vā parassa vā hatthapādādihetu vā dhanahetu vā.
atk-s0402a:499_13: Āmisakiñcikkhahetu vāti ettha āmisanti lañjo adhippeto.
atk-s0402a:499_14: Kiñcikkhanti yaṃ vā taṃ vā appamattakaṃ antamaso tittiriyavaṭṭakasappipiṇḍanavanītapiṇḍādimattakassa lañjassa hetūti attho.
atk-s0402a:499_15: Sampajānamusā bhāsitā hotīti jānantoyeva musāvādaṃ kattā hoti.
atk-s0402a:500_6: Atthamadhuratāya sakalasarīre kopaṃ ajanetvā pemaṃ janetīti pemanīyā.
atk-s0402a:500_7: Hadayaṃ gacchati appaṭihaññamānā sukhena cittaṃ pavisatīti hadayaṅgamā.
atk-s0402a:500_16: Evarūpī kathā bahuno janassa kantā hotīti bahujanakantā.
atk-s0402a:500_17: Kantabhāveneva bahuno janassa manāpā cittavuddhikarāti bahujanamanāpā.
atk-s0402a:502_1: Navame cakkhu na hotīti paññācakkhu na hoti.
atk-s0402a:502_5: Kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgeti kaṇhasukkāyeva aññamaññaṃ paṭibāhanato paṭipakkhavasena sappaṭibhāgāti vuccanti.
atk-s0402a:503_0: Na ceva bhogā tathārūpāti tathājātikā bhogāpissa na honti.
atk-s0402a:503_1: Na ca puññāni kubbatīti puññāni ca na karoti.
atk-s0402a:503_2: Ettāvatā bhoguppādanacakkhuno ca puññakaraṇacakkhuno ca abhāvo vutto.
atk-s0402a:503_3: Ubhayattha kaliggāhoti idhaloke ca paraloke cāti ubhayasmimpi aparaddhaggāho,
atk-s0402a:503_5: Atha vā ubhayattha kaliggāhoti ubhayesampi diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikānaṃ atthānaṃ kaliggāho,
atk-s0402a:503_11: musāvādena cūbhayanti theyyādīsu ubhayena pariyesatīti attho. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0402a:503_20: Na socatīti yasmiṃ ṭhāne antosokena na socati.
atk-s0402a:505_7: Itissa te dhammaṃ kathentā pubbapaṭṭhapanepi kalyāṇaṃ bhaddakaṃ anavajjameva katvā kathenti,
atk-s0402a:505_11: Tattha desanāya tāva catuppadikagāthāya paṭhamapadaṃ ādi,
atk-s0402a:505_18: tato paraṃ eko vā aneke vā majjhaṃ,
atk-s0402a:505_33: Dve dve vā kayiramāne sīlasamādhayo ādi,
atk-s0402a:506_3: Parisuddhanti parisuddhaṃ nijjaṭaṃ niggaṇṭhiṃ katvā desenti.
atk-s0402a:506_4: Brahmacariyaṃ pakāsentīti evaṃ desentā ca seṭṭhacariyabhūtaṃ sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṃ ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ pakāsenti.
atk-s0402a:506_5: Neva ādiṃ manasi karotīti neva pubbapaṭṭhapanaṃ manasi karoti.
atk-s0402a:507_2: Evameva khoti ettha kumbho nikujjo viya avakujjapañño puggalo daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0402a:507_4: udakassa vivaṭṭanakālo viya tasmiṃ āsane nisinnassa uggahetuṃ asamatthakālo,
atk-s0402a:507_5: udakassa asaṇṭhānakālo viya vuṭṭhahitvā asallakkhaṇakālo veditabbo.
atk-s0402a:508_2: Evameva khoti ettha ucchaṅgo viya ucchaṅgapañño puggalo daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0402a:508_4: ucchaṅge nānākhajjakāni khādantassa nisinnakālo viya tasmiṃ āsane nisinnassa uggaṇhanakālo,
atk-s0402a:508_5: vuṭṭhahantassa satisammosā pakiraṇakālo viya tasmā āsanā vuṭṭhāya gacchantassa asallakkhaṇakālo veditabbo.
atk-s0402a:509_2: Evameva khoti ettha uparimukho ṭhapito kumbho viya puthupañño puggalo daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0402a:509_4: udakassa saṇṭhānakālo viya tattha nisinnassa uggaṇhanakālo,
atk-s0402a:509_5: no vivaṭṭanakālo viya vuṭṭhāya gacchantassa sallakkhaṇakālo veditabbo.
atk-s0402a:510_3: Seyyo etena vuccatīti etasmā puggalā uttaritaroti vuccati.
atk-s0402a:510_4: Dhammānudhammappaṭipannoti navalokuttaradhammassa anudhammaṃ saha sīlena pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno.
atk-s0402a:510_6: Antakaro siyāti koṭikaro paricchedakaro parivaṭumakaro bhaveyyāti.
atk-s0402a:516_4: Iti mātāpitupūjakāni kulāni mātāpitūhi sabrahmakānīti pakāsetvā idāni nesaṃ sapubbācariyakādibhāvaṃ pakāsento sapubbācariyakānītiādimāha.
atk-s0402a:516_8: Puttakānaṃ hi mātāpitūhi jīvitaṃ āpāditaṃ pālitaṃ ghaṭitaṃ anuppabandhena pavattitaṃ.
atk-s0402a:516_9: Posakāti hatthapāde vaḍḍhetvā hadayalohitaṃ pāyetvā posetāro.
atk-s0402a:516_10: Imassa lokassa dassetāroti puttānaṃ hi imasmiṃ loke iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇassa dassanaṃ nāma mātāpitaro nissāya jātanti imassa lokassa dassetāro nāma.
atk-s0402a:517_1: Yathā brahmuno catasso bhāvanā avijahitā honti mettā karuṇā muditā upekkhāti,
atk-s0402a:517_2: evameva mātāpitūnaṃ puttakesu catasso bhāvanā avijahitā honti.
atk-s0402a:517_4: kucchigatasmiṃ hi dārake “kadā nu kho puttakaṃ arogaṃ paripuṇṇaṅgapaccaṅgaṃ passissāmā”ti mātāpitūnaṃ mettacittaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0402a:517_5: Yadā panesa mando uttānaseyyako ūkāhi vā maṅkulādīhi pāṇakehi daṭṭho dukkhaseyyāya vā pana pīḷito parodati viravati,
atk-s0402a:517_6: tadāssa saddaṃ sutvā mātāpitūnaṃ kāruññaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0402a:517_7: ādhāvitvā vidhāvitvā kīḷanakāle pana lobhanīyavayasmiṃ vā ṭhitakāle dārakaṃ oloketvā mātāpitūnaṃ cittaṃ
atk-s0402a:517_8: sappimaṇḍe pakkhittasatavihatakappāsapicupaṭalaṃ viya mudukaṃ hoti āmoditaṃ pamoditaṃ,
atk-s0402a:517_10: Yadā panesa putto dārābharaṇaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā pāṭiyekkaṃ agāraṃ ajjhāvasati,
atk-s0402a:517_11: tadā mātāpitūnaṃ “sakkoti dāni no puttako attano dhammatāya yāpetu”nti majjhattabhāvo uppajjati,
atk-s0402a:517_12: tasmiṃ kāle upekkhā labbhatīti iminā kāraṇena “brahmāti mātāpitaro”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a:518_0: Pubbācariyāti vuccareti mātāpitaro hi jātakālato paṭṭhāya “evaṃ nisīda,
atk-s0402a:518_20: Iti sabbepi te pacchācariyā nāma honti,
