atk-s0402a:518_24: Āhuneyyā ca puttānanti puttānaṃ āhutaṃ pāhutaṃ abhisaṅkhataṃ annapānādiṃ arahanti,
atk-s0402a:518_27: Pajāya anukampakāti paresaṃ pāṇe acchinditvāpi attano pajaṃ paṭijagganti gopāyanti.
atk-s0402a:519_10: Pādānaṃ dhovanenāti uṇhodakasītodakehi pādadhovanena ceva telamakkhanena ca.
atk-s0402a:519_12: Sagge pamodatīti idha tāva mātāpitūsu pāricariyaṃ disvā pāricariyakāraṇā taṃ paṇḍitamanussā idheva pasaṃsanti,
atk-s0402a:519_13: paralokaṃ pana gantvā sagge ṭhito so mātāpituupaṭṭhāko dibbasampattīhi āmodati pamodatīti.
atk-s0402a:521_3: Imasmiṃ ca saviññāṇaketi ettha attano ca parassa cāti ubhayesampi kāyo saviññāṇakaṭṭhena ekato katvā imasminti vutto.
atk-s0402a:521_4: Ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayāti ahaṅkāradiṭṭhi ca mamaṅkārataṇhā ca mānānusayo cāti attano ca parassa ca kilesā.
atk-s0402a:521_12: puggalanimittaṃ dhammanimittanti evarūpesu ca bahiddhā sabbanimittesu.
atk-s0402a:522_3: Etaṃ santaṃ etaṃ paṇītanti nibbānaṃ dassento āha.
atk-s0402a:522_4: Nibbānaṃ hi kilesānaṃ santatāya santaṃ nāma,
atk-s0402a:522_5: nibbānaṃ santanti samāpattiṃ appetvāva divasampi nisinnassa cittuppādo santanteva pavattatītipi santaṃ.
atk-s0402a:522_6: Paṇītanti samāpattiṃ appetvā nisinnassāpi cittuppādo paṇītanteva pavattatīti nibbānaṃ paṇītaṃ nāma.
atk-s0402a:522_8: “Sabbasaṅkhārasamatho”ti samāpattiṃ appetvā nisinnassa hi divasabhāgampi cittuppādo sabbasaṅkhārasamathoteva pavattati…pe…
atk-s0402a:522_9: tathā tīsu bhavesu vānasaṅkhātāya taṇhāya abhāvena nibbānanti laddhanāme tasmiṃ samāpattiṃ appetvā nisinnassa
atk-s0402a:522_10: cittuppādo nibbānaṃ nibbānanteva pavattatīti sabbasaṅkhārasamathotiādīni nāmāni labhati.
atk-s0402a:522_11: Imasmiṃ pana aṭṭhavidhe ābhogasamannāhāre imasmiṃ ṭhāne ekopi labbhati,
atk-s0402a:523_2: Paraattabhāvasakaattabhāvāni hi parāni ca oparāni cāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a:523_4: Iñjitanti rāgiñjitaṃ dosamohamānadiṭṭhikilesaduccaritiñjitanti imāni satta iñjitāni calitāni phanditāni.
atk-s0402a:523_12: Jātijaranti ettha jātijarāgahaṇeneva byādhimaraṇampi gahitamevāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a:525_4: Aññātāro ca dullabhāti paṭivijjhanakapuggalā pana dullabhā.
atk-s0402a:525_5: Idaṃ bhagavā “sāriputtattherassa ñāṇaṃ ghaṭṭemī”ti adhippāyena kathesi.
atk-s0402a:525_9: ahaṃ tumhehi desitaṃ dhammaṃ nayasatena nayasahassena paṭivijjhissāmi,
atk-s0402a:525_10: mamesa bhāro hotū”ti satthāraṃ desanāya ussāhento etassa bhagavā kālotiādimāha.
atk-s0402a:526_3: Vivattayi saṃyojananti dasavidhampi saṃyojanaṃ samūlakaṃ ubbattetvā chaḍḍesi.
atk-s0402a:526_4: Sammā mānābhisamayā antamakāsi dukkhassāti sammā upāyena sammā paṭipattiyā navavidhassa mānassa pahānābhisamayena vaṭṭadukkhassa antamakāsi.
atk-s0402a:526_9: mayā pārāyane udayapañhe idaṃ phalasamāpattimeva sandhāya etaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
atk-s0402a:527_2: Udayapañhe ca etaṃ padaṃ “pahānaṃ kāmacchandāna”nti āgataṃ,
atk-s0402a:527_8: Domanassāna cūbhayanti etāsañca kāmasaññānaṃ cetasikadomanassānañcāti ubhinnampi pahānaṃ paṭippassaddhipahānasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0402a:527_10: Niddese pana “kāmacchandassa ca domanassassa ca ubhinnaṃ pahānaṃ vūpasamaṃ paṭinissaggaṃ paṭippassaddhiṃ amataṃ nibbāna”nti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0402a:527_19: Thinassa ca panūdanantipi thinassa ca panūdanante uppannattā arahattaphalameva adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0402a:527_20: Kukkuccānaṃ nivāraṇanti kukkuccanivāraṇassa maggassa anantaraṃ uppannattā phalameva adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0402a:528_0: Upekkhāsatisaṃsuddhanti catutthajjhānike phale uppannāya upekkhāya ca satiyā ca saṃsuddhaṃ.
atk-s0402a:528_10: avijjāya pabhedanasaṅkhātaṃ vā nibbānaṃ ārabbha uppannattā evaṃladdhanāmaṃ arahattaphalameva.
atk-s0402a:528_11: Iti sabbehipi imehi pahānantiādīhi padehi arahattaphalameva pakāsitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a:530_3: Lobho nidānaṃ kammānaṃ samudayāyāti lubbhanapalubbhanasabhāvo lobho vaṭṭagāmikammānaṃ samudayāya piṇḍakaraṇatthāya nidānaṃ kāraṇaṃ paccayoti attho.
atk-s0402a:531_7: Yatthassa attabhāvo nibbattatīti yasmiṃ ṭhāne assa lobhajakammavato puggalassa attabhāvo nibbattati,
atk-s0402a:531_9: Tattha taṃ kammaṃ vipaccatīti tesu khandhesu taṃ kammaṃ vipaccati.
atk-s0402a:531_10: Diṭṭhe vā dhammetiādi yasmā taṃ kammaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ vā hoti upapajjavedanīyaṃ vā aparapariyāyavedanīyaṃ vā,
atk-s0402a:532_2: Avātātapahatānīti na vātena na ca ātapena hatāni.
atk-s0402a:532_6: Suparikammakatāya bhūmiyāti naṅgalakasanena ceva aṭṭhadantakena ca suṭṭhu parikammakatāya khettabhūmiyā.
atk-s0402a:533_0: Yaṃ panettha diṭṭhe vā dhammetiādi vuttaṃ,
atk-s0402a:533_1: tattha asammohatthaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne kammavibhatti nāma kathetabbā.
atk-s0402a:533_5: yaggarukaṃ yabbahulaṃ yadāsannaṃ kaṭattā vā pana kammaṃ,
atk-s0402a:533_7: Tattha ekajavanavīthiyaṃ sattasu cittesu kusalā vā akusalā vā paṭhamajavanacetanā diṭṭhadhammavedanīyakammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0402a:533_8: Taṃ imasmiṃyeva attabhāve vipākaṃ deti kākavaḷiyapuṇṇaseṭṭhīnaṃ viya kusalaṃ,
atk-s0402a:533_10: Tathā asakkontaṃ pana ahosikammaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0402a:533_13: Yathā hi migaluddakena migaṃ disvā dhanuṃ ākaḍḍhitvā khitto saro sace na virajjhati,
atk-s0402a:533_15: atha naṃ migaluddako niccammaṃ katvā khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ chetvā maṃsaṃ ādāya puttadāraṃ tosento gacchati.
atk-s0402a:533_17: migo palāyitvā puna taṃ disaṃ na oloketi.
atk-s0402a:533_19: Sarassa avirajjhitvā migavijjhanaṃ viya hi diṭṭhadhammavedanīyassa kammassa vipākavārapaṭilābho,
atk-s0402a:534_4: Tattha aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī ekāya samāpattiyā brahmaloke nibbattati.
atk-s0402a:534_5: Pañcannampi ānantariyānaṃ kattā ekena kammena niraye nibbattati,
atk-s0402a:534_6: sesasamāpattiyo ca kammāni ca ahosikammabhāvaṃyeva āpajjanti,
atk-s0402a:535_0: Ubhinnaṃ antare pana pañcajavanacetanā aparapariyāyavedanīyakammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0402a:535_3: Sati saṃsārappavattiyā ahosikammaṃ nāma na hoti.
atk-s0402a:535_5: Yathā hi sunakhaluddakena migaṃ disvā sunakho vissajjito migaṃ anubandhitvā yasmiṃ ṭhāne pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0402a:535_7: evamevaṃ idaṃ kammaṃ yasmiṃ ṭhāne okāsaṃ labhati,
atk-s0402a:536_0: Kusalākusalesu pana garukāgarukesu yaṃ garukaṃ hoti,
atk-s0402a:536_4: Tasmiṃ sati sesāni kusalāni vā akusalāni vā vipaccituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0402a:536_6: Yathā hi sāsapappamāṇāpi sakkharā vā ayaguḷikā vā udakarahade pakkhittā udakapiṭṭhe uplavituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0402a:537_6: Tadetaṃ yathā nāma dvīsu mallesu yuddhabhūmiṃ otiṇṇesu yo balavā,
atk-s0402a:537_8: evameva itaraṃ dubbalakammaṃ avattharitvā yaṃ āsevanavasena vā bahulaṃ,
atk-s0402a:538_0: So kira cūḷaṅgaṇiyayuddhe parājito vaḷavaṃ āruyha palāyi.
atk-s0402a:538_1: Tassa cūḷupaṭṭhāko tissāmacco nāma ekakova pacchato ahosi.
atk-s0402a:538_2: So ekaṃ aṭaviṃ pavisitvā nisinno jighacchāya bādhayamānāya –
atk-s0402a:538_6: mayā sāṭakantare ṭhapetvā ekaṃ suvaṇṇasarakabhattaṃ ābhatanti.
atk-s0402a:538_15: na me ayyānaṃ adatvā āhāro paribhuttapubbo atthi,
atk-s0402a:538_24: vissattho kālaṃ ghosehī”ti āha. So “kālo, bhante, kālo,
atk-s0402a:539_0: Athassa bodhimātumahātissatthero taṃ saddaṃ dibbāya sotadhātuyā sutvā ‘katthāyaṃ saddo’ti taṃ āvajjento
atk-s0402a:539_1: “ajja duṭṭhagāmaṇiabhayamahārājā yuddhaparājito aṭaviṃ pavisitvā nisinno ekaṃ sarakabhattaṃ cattāro koṭṭhāse
atk-s0402a:539_2: kāretvā ‘ekakova na paribhuñjissāmī’ti kālaṃ ghosāpesī”ti ñatvā “ajja mayā rañño saṅgahaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0402a:539_8: Rājā attano koṭṭhāsena saddhiṃ therassa koṭṭhāsaṃ patte pakkhipitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0402a:539_9: āhāraparissayo nāma mā kadāci hotū”ti vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0402a:539_10: Tissāmaccopi “mama ayyaputte passante bhuñjituṃ na sakkhissāmī”ti attano koṭṭhāsaṃ therasseva patte ākiri.
atk-s0402a:539_13: Rājā vaḷavaṃ oloketvā “ayampi attano koṭṭhāsaṃ therasseva patte pakkhipanaṃ paccāsīsatī”ti ñatvā tampi tattheva pakkhipitvā theraṃ vanditvā uyyojesi.
atk-s0402a:539_14: Thero taṃ bhattaṃ ādāya gantvā ādito paṭṭhāya bhikkhusaṅghassa ālopasaṅkhepena adāsi.
atk-s0402a:540_3: Thero rañño cittaṃ ñatvā atirekabhattaṃ etesaṃ yāpanamattaṃ katvā pattaṃ ākāse khipi,
atk-s0402a:540_6: Atha rājā pattaṃ dhovitvā “tucchapattaṃ na pesissāmī”ti uttarisāṭakaṃ mocetvā udakaṃ puñchitvā sāṭakaṃ
atk-s0402a:540_7: patte ṭhapetvā “patto gantvā mama ayyassa hatthe patiṭṭhātū”ti ākāse khipi.
atk-s0402a:541_0: Aparabhāge rañño tathāgatassa sarīradhātūnaṃ aṭṭhamabhāgaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā vīsaratanasatikaṃ mahācetiyaṃ
atk-s0402a:541_2: Athassa mahācetiyassa dakkhiṇapasse nipannassa pañcanikāyavasena bhikkhusaṅghe sajjhāyaṃ karonte chahi
atk-s0402a:541_3: devalokehi cha rathā āgantvā purato ākāse aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0402a:541_4: Rājā “puññapotthakaṃ āharathā”ti ādito paṭṭhāya puññapotthakaṃ vācāpesi.
atk-s0402a:541_5: Atha naṃ kiñci kammaṃ na paritosesi.
atk-s0402a:541_7: Potthakavācako “cūḷaṅgaṇiyayuddhe parājitena te deva aṭaviṃ pavisitvā nisinnena ekaṃ sarakabhattaṃ cattāro
atk-s0402a:541_8: koṭṭhāse kāretvā bodhimātumahātissattherassa bhikkhā dinnā”ti āha.
atk-s0402a:541_12: Rājā kālaṃ katvā tusitabhavanato āgataratheva patiṭṭhāya tusitabhavanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0402a:542_0: Yaṃ pana kusalākusalesu āsannamaraṇe anussarituṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0402a:542_2: Tadetaṃ yathā nāma gogaṇaparipuṇṇassa vajassa dvāre vivaṭe parabhāge dammagavabalavagavesu santesupi
atk-s0402a:542_3: yo vajadvārassa āsanno hoti antamaso dubbalajaraggavopi,
atk-s0402a:542_5: evameva aññesu kusalākusalesu santesupi maraṇakālassa āsannattā vipākaṃ deti.
atk-s0402a:543_1: madhuaṅgaṇagāme kira eko damiḷadovāriko pātova baḷisaṃ ādāya gantvā macche vadhitvā tayo koṭṭhāse katvā ekena taṇḍulaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0402a:543_4: Iminā nīhārena paññāsa vassāni pāṇātipātakammaṃ katvā aparabhāge mahallako anuṭṭhānaseyyaṃ upagacchati.
atk-s0402a:543_5: Tasmiṃ khaṇe girivihāravāsī cūḷapiṇḍapātikatissatthero “mā ayaṃ satto mayi passante nassatū”ti gantvā tassa gehadvāre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0402a:543_8: Ahaṃ paññāsa vassāni therassa santikaṃ na gatapubbo,
atk-s0402a:543_13: Thero “upāsakassa kā sarīrappavattī”ti pucchi. Dubbalo, bhanteti.
atk-s0402a:543_14: Thero gharaṃ pavisitvā satiṃ uppādetvā “sīlaṃ gaṇhissasī”ti āha. Āma, bhante, dethāti.
atk-s0402a:543_15: Thero tīṇi saraṇāni datvā pañca sīlāni dātuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0402a:543_16: Tassa pañca sīlānīti vacanakāleyeva jivhā papati.
atk-s0402a:543_19: Nibbattakkhaṇeyeva ca “kiṃ nu kho kammaṃ katvā mayā idaṃ laddha”nti āvajjento theraṃ nissāya laddhabhāvaṃ
atk-s0402a:543_20: ñatvā devalokato āgantvā theraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0402a:543_25: sace me ayyo pañca sīlāni adassa,
atk-s0402a:544_1: So tiṃsa vassāni sotāpattimaggatthāya dvattiṃsākāraṃ sajjhāyitvā “ahaṃ evaṃ dvattiṃsākāraṃ sajjhāyanto obhāsamattampi nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhiṃ,
atk-s0402a:544_2: buddhasāsanaṃ aniyyānikaṃ bhavissatī”ti diṭṭhivipallāsaṃ patvā kālakiriyaṃ katvā mahāgaṅgāya navausabhiko susumārapeto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0402a:544_3: Ekaṃ samayaṃ kacchakatitthena saṭṭhi pāsāṇatthambhasakaṭāni agamaṃsu.
atk-s0402a:544_4: So sabbepi te goṇe ca pāsāṇe ca khādi.
atk-s0402a:545_0: Etehi pana tīhi muttaṃ aññāṇavasena kataṃ kaṭattā vā pana kammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0402a:545_1: Taṃ yathā nāma ummattakena khittadaṇḍaṃ yattha vā tattha vā gacchati,
atk-s0402a:545_2: evameva tesaṃ abhāve yattha katthaci vipākaṃ deti.
atk-s0402a:546_0: Janakaṃ nāma ekaṃ paṭisandhiṃ janetvā pavattiṃ na janeti,
atk-s0402a:546_7: Ekacco hi kusalaṃ katvā sugatibhave nibbattati.
atk-s0402a:546_8: So tattha ṭhito punappunaṃ kusalaṃ katvā taṃ kammaṃ upatthambhetvā anekāni vassasatasahassāni sugatibhavasmiṃyeva vicarati.
atk-s0402a:546_10: So tattha ṭhito punappunaṃ akusalaṃ katvā taṃ kammaṃ upatthambhetvā bahūni vassasatasahassāni duggatibhavasmiṃyeva vicarati.
atk-s0402a:547_3: Upatthambhakaṃ pana vipākaṃ janetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0402a:547_4: aññena kammena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā janite vipāke uppajjanakasukhadukkhaṃ upatthambheti,
atk-s0402a:547_6: Upapīḷakaṃ nāma aññena kammena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā janite vipāke uppajjanakasukhadukkhaṃ pīḷeti bādheti,
atk-s0402a:547_9: kusalakamme vipaccamāne akusalakammaṃ upapīḷakaṃ hutvā tassa vipaccituṃ na deti.
atk-s0402a:547_10: Akusalakamme vipaccamāne kusalakammaṃ upapīḷakaṃ hutvā tassa vipaccituṃ na deti.
atk-s0402a:547_11: Yathā vaḍḍhamānakaṃ rukkhaṃ vā gacchaṃ vā lataṃ vā kocideva daṇḍena vā satthena vā bhindeyya vā chindeyya vā,
atk-s0402a:547_12: atha so rukkho vā gaccho vā latā vā vaḍḍhituṃ na sakkuṇeyya;
atk-s0402a:547_14: akusalaṃ vā pana vipaccamānaṃ kusalena upapīḷitaṃ vipaccituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0402a:548_0: Rājagahe kira vātakāḷako paññāsa vassāni coraghātakammaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0402a:548_2: vātakāḷako mahallako core ghātetuṃ na sakkotī”ti.
atk-s0402a:548_4: Amaccā naṃ apanetvā aññaṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0402a:548_6: tāva ahatavatthāni vā acchādituṃ surabhipupphāni vā piḷandhituṃ pāyāsaṃ vā bhuñjituṃ ucchādananhāpanaṃ vā paccanubhotuṃ nālattha.
atk-s0402a:548_7: So “dīgharattaṃ me kiliṭṭhavesena carita”nti “pāyāsaṃ me pacāhī”ti bhariyaṃ āṇāpetvā nhānīyasambhārāni
atk-s0402a:548_8: gāhāpetvā nhānatitthaṃ gantvā sīsaṃ nhatvā ahatavatthāni acchādetvā gandhe vilimpitvā pupphāni piḷandhitvā
atk-s0402a:548_9: gharaṃ āgacchanto sāriputtattheraṃ disvā “saṃkiliṭṭhakammato camhi apagato,
atk-s0402a:548_10: ayyo ca me diṭṭho”ti tuṭṭhamānaso theraṃ gharaṃ netvā navasappisakkaracuṇṇābhisaṅkhatena pāyāsena parivisi.
atk-s0402a:548_12: So anumodanaṃ sutvā anulomikakhantiṃ paṭilabhitvā theraṃ anugantvā nivattamāno antarāmagge taruṇavacchāya
atk-s0402a:548_13: gāviyā madditvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpito gantvā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbatti.
atk-s0402a:548_22: natthi nu kho pāpakammassa phalanti. Mā,
atk-s0402a:548_25: balavakalyāṇamittūpanissayaṃ labhitvā dhammasenāpatissa piṇḍapātaṃ datvā anumodanaṃ sutvā anulomikakhantiṃ paṭilabhitvā so tattha nibbattoti.
atk-s0402a:551_0: Upaghātakaṃ pana sayaṃ kusalampi akusalampi samānaṃ aññaṃ dubbalakammaṃ ghātetvā tassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā attano vipākassa okāsaṃ karoti.
atk-s0402a:551_1: Evaṃ pana kammena kate okāse taṃ vipākaṃ uppannaṃ nāma vuccati.
atk-s0402a:551_4: kusalakammassa vipaccanakāle ekaṃ akusalakammaṃ uṭṭhāya taṃ kammaṃ chinditvā pāteti.
atk-s0402a:551_5: Akusalakammassapi vipaccanakāle ekaṃ kusalakammaṃ uṭṭhāya taṃ kammaṃ chinditvā pāteti.
atk-s0402a:552_3: atthekaccāni pāpakāni kammasamādānāni upadhisampattipaṭibāḷhāni na vipaccanti,
atk-s0402a:552_4: atthekaccāni pāpakāni kammasamādānāni kālasampattipaṭibāḷhāni na vipaccanti,
atk-s0402a:552_5: atthekaccāni pāpakāni kammasamādānāni payogasampattipaṭibāḷhāni na vipaccanti.
atk-s0402a:552_6: Atthekaccāni pāpakāni kammasamādānāni gativipattiṃ āgamma vipaccanti,
atk-s0402a:552_10: Atthekaccāni kalyāṇāni kammasamādānāni gativipattipaṭibāḷhāni na vipaccanti,
atk-s0402a:552_14: Atthekaccāni kalyāṇāni kammasamādānāni gatisampattiṃ āgamma vipaccanti,
atk-s0402a:553_3: Gatisampattipaṭibāḷhāni na vipaccantītiādīsu aniṭṭhārammaṇānubhavanārahe kamme vijjamāneyeva sugatibhave
atk-s0402a:553_4: nibbattassa taṃ kammaṃ gatisampattipaṭibāḷhaṃ na vipaccati nāma.
atk-s0402a:553_5: Gatisampattiyā patibāhitaṃ hutvā na vipaccatīti attho.
atk-s0402a:553_6: Yo pana pāpakammena dāsiyā vā kammakāriyā vā kucchiyaṃ nibbattitvā upadhisampanno hoti,
atk-s0402a:553_8: Athassa sāmikā tassa rūpasampattiṃ disvā “nāyaṃ kiliṭṭhakammassānucchaviko”ti cittaṃ uppādetvā attano
atk-s0402a:553_9: jātaputtaṃ viya bhaṇḍāgārikādiṭṭhānesu ṭhapetvā sampattiṃ yojetvā pariharanti.
atk-s0402a:553_10: Evarūpassa kammaṃ upadhisampattipaṭibāḷhaṃ na vipaccati nāma.
atk-s0402a:553_11: Yo pana paṭhamakappikakālasadise sulabhasampannarasabhojane subhikkhakāle nibbattati,
atk-s0402a:553_12: tassa vijjamānampi pāpakammaṃ kālasampattipaṭibāḷhaṃ na vipaccati nāma.
atk-s0402a:553_19: evarūpassa pāpakammaṃ payogasampattipaṭibāḷhaṃ na vipaccati nāma.
atk-s0402a:554_0: Duggatibhave nibbattassa pana pāpakammaṃ gativipattiṃ āgamma vipaccati nāma.
atk-s0402a:554_1: Yo pana dāsiyā vā kammakāriyā vā kucchismiṃ nibbatto dubbaṇṇo hoti dussaṇṭhāno,
atk-s0402a:554_2: “yakkho nu kho manusso nu kho”ti vimatiṃ uppādeti.
atk-s0402a:554_4: atha naṃ “nāyaṃ aññassa kammassa anucchaviko”ti hatthiṃ vā rakkhāpenti assaṃ vā goṇe vā,
atk-s0402a:554_8: atha naṃ hatthiassādīnaṃ bhattamāsādīni vā pacāpenti,
atk-s0402a:554_11: Evarūpassa pāpakammaṃ upadhivipattiṃ āgamma vipaccati nāma.
atk-s0402a:554_12: Yo pana dubbhikkhakāle vā parihīnasampattikāle vā antarakappe vā nibbattati,
atk-s0402a:554_13: tassa pāpakammaṃ kālavipattiṃ āgamma vipaccati nāma.
atk-s0402a:554_14: Yo pana payogaṃ sampādetuṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0402a:554_17: tassa pāpakammaṃ payogavipattiṃ āgamma vipaccati nāma.
atk-s0402a:555_0: Yo pana iṭṭhārammaṇānubhavanārahe kamme vijjamāneyeva gantvā duggatibhave nibbattati,
atk-s0402a:555_1: tassa taṃ kammaṃ gativipattipaṭibāḷhaṃ na vipaccati nāma.
atk-s0402a:555_2: Yo pana puññānubhāvena rājarājamahāmattādīnaṃ gehe nibbattitvā kāṇo vā hoti kuṇī vā khañjo vā pakkhahato vā,
atk-s0402a:555_3: tassa oparajjasenāpatibhaṇḍāgārikaṭṭhānādīni na anucchavikānīti na denti.
atk-s0402a:555_4: Iccassa taṃ puññaṃ upadhivipattipaṭibāḷhaṃ na vipaccati nāma.
atk-s0402a:555_5: Yo pana dubbhikkhakāle vā parihīnasampattikāle vā antarakappe vā manussesu nibbattati,
atk-s0402a:555_6: tassa taṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ kālavipattipaṭibāḷhaṃ na vipaccati nāma.
atk-s0402a:555_7: Yo heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva payogaṃ sampādetuṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0402a:555_8: tassa kalyāṇakammaṃ payogavipattipaṭibāḷhaṃ na vipaccati nāma.
atk-s0402a:556_0: Kalyāṇakammena pana sugatibhave nibbattassa taṃ kammaṃ gatisampattiṃ āgamma vipaccati nāma.
atk-s0402a:556_1: Rājarājamahāmattādīnaṃ kule nibbattitvā upadhisampattiṃ pattassa attabhāvasamiddhiyaṃ ṭhitassa devanagare
atk-s0402a:556_4: evarūpassa kalyāṇakammaṃ upadhisampattiṃ āgamma vipaccati nāma.
atk-s0402a:556_5: Yo paṭhamakappikesu vā sulabhannapānakāle vā nibbattati,
atk-s0402a:556_6: tassa kalyāṇakammaṃ kālasampattiṃ āgamma vipaccati nāma.
atk-s0402a:556_8: tassa kammaṃ payogasampattiṃ āgamma vipaccati nāma.
atk-s0402a:558_0: Tattha yaṃ kammaṃ atīte āyūhitaṃ atīteyeva vipākavāraṃ labhi,
atk-s0402a:558_3: taṃ ahosi kammaṃ ahosi kammavipākoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a:558_5: paṭisandhijanakaṃ paṭisandhiṃ rūpajanakaṃ vā rūpaṃ janetuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0402a:558_6: taṃ ahosi kammaṃ nāhosi kammavipākoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a:558_7: Yaṃ pana atīte āyūhitaṃ etarahi laddhavipākavāraṃ paṭisandhijanakaṃ paṭisandhiṃ janetvā rūpajanakaṃ rūpaṃ janetvā ṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0402a:558_8: taṃ ahosi kammaṃ atthi kammavipākoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a:558_9: Yaṃ aladdhavipākavāraṃ paṭisandhijanakaṃ vā paṭisandhiṃ rūpajanakaṃ vā rūpaṃ janetuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0402a:558_10: taṃ ahosi kammaṃ natthi kammavipākoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a:558_11: Yaṃ pana atīte āyūhitaṃ anāgate vipākavāraṃ labhissati,
atk-s0402a:558_12: paṭisandhijanakaṃ paṭisandhiṃ rūpajanakaṃ rūpaṃ janetuṃ sakkhissati,
atk-s0402a:558_13: taṃ ahosi kammaṃ bhavissati kammavipākoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a:558_15: paṭisandhijanakaṃ paṭisandhiṃ rūpajanakaṃ vā rūpaṃ janetuṃ na sakkhissati,
atk-s0402a:558_16: taṃ ahosi kammaṃ na bhavissati kammavipākoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a:559_0: Yaṃ pana etarahi āyūhitaṃ etarahiyeva vipākavāraṃ labhati,
atk-s0402a:559_1: taṃ atthi kammaṃ atthi kammavipākoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a:559_2: Yaṃ pana etarahi vipākavāraṃ na labhati,
atk-s0402a:559_3: taṃ atthi kammaṃ natthi kammavipākoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a:559_4: Yaṃ pana etarahi āyūhitaṃ anāgate vipākavāraṃ labhissati,
atk-s0402a:559_5: paṭisandhijanakaṃ paṭisandhiṃ rūpajanakaṃ rūpaṃ janetuṃ sakkhissati,
atk-s0402a:559_6: taṃ atthi kammaṃ bhavissati kammavipākoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a:559_8: paṭisandhijanakaṃ paṭisandhiṃ rūpajanakaṃ vā rūpaṃ janetuṃ sakkhissati,
atk-s0402a:559_9: taṃ atthi kammaṃ na bhavissati kammavipākoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a:560_2: paṭisandhijanakaṃ paṭisandhiṃ rūpajanakaṃ vā rūpaṃ janessati,
atk-s0402a:560_3: taṃ bhavissati kammaṃ bhavissati kammavipākoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a:560_5: paṭisandhijanakaṃ paṭisandhiṃ rūpajanakaṃ vā rūpaṃ janetuṃ na sakkhissati,
atk-s0402a:560_6: taṃ bhavissati kammaṃ na bhavissati kammavipākoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a:561_0: Iti imāni ceva dvādasa abhidhammapariyāyena vibhattāni ca soḷasa kammāni attano ṭhānā osakkitvā suttantikapariyāyena
atk-s0402a:561_2: Tānipi tato osakkitvā tīṇiyeva kammāni honti diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ,
atk-s0402a:561_7: Yadi hi diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ kammaṃ upapajjavedanīyaṃ vā aparapariyāyavedanīyaṃ vā bhaveyya,
atk-s0402a:561_9: Sacepi upapajjavedanīyaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ vā aparapariyāyavedanīyaṃ vā bhaveyya,
atk-s0402a:561_11: Athāpi aparapariyāyavedanīyaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ vā upapajjavedanīyaṃ vā bhaveyya,
atk-s0402a:562_1: Ettha pana lobhe vigateti lobhe apagate niruddhe.
atk-s0402a:562_3: matthakacchinnatālo viya puna aviruḷhisabhāvaṃ katanti attho.
atk-s0402a:562_8: Evameva khoti ettha bījāni viya kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
atk-s0402a:562_11: aggiṃ datvā bījānaṃ ḍahanakālo viya maggañāṇena kilesānaṃ daḍḍhakālo,
atk-s0402a:562_12: masikatakālo viya pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ chinnamūlake katvā ṭhapitakālo,
atk-s0402a:562_13: mahāvāte opunitvā nadiyā vā pavāhetvā appavattikatakālo viya upādinnakasantānassa nirodhena chinnamūlakānaṃ
atk-s0402a:562_14: pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ appaṭisandhikabhāvena nirujjhitvā puna bhavasmiṃ paṭisandhiṃ aggahitakālo veditabbo.
atk-s0402a:563_2: yaṃ so avidū andhabālo lobhajañca dosajañca mohajañcāti kammaṃ karoti,
atk-s0402a:563_3: evaṃ karontena yaṃ tena pakataṃ kammaṃ appaṃ vā yadi vā bahuṃ.
atk-s0402a:563_4: Idheva taṃ vedaniyanti taṃ kammaṃ tena bālena idha sake attabhāveyeva vedanīyaṃ,
atk-s0402a:563_6: Vatthuṃ aññaṃ na vijjatīti tassa kammassa vipaccanatthāya aññaṃ vatthu natthi.
atk-s0402a:563_7: Na hi aññena kataṃ kammaṃ aññassa attabhāve vipaccati.
atk-s0402a:563_9: mohajañcāpi viddasūti tasmā yo vidū medhāvī paṇḍito taṃ lobhajādibhedaṃ kammaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0402a:563_12: arahattamaggavijjaṃ uppādetvā taṃ vā pana vijjaṃ uppādento sabbā duggatiyo jahati.
atk-s0402a:563_16: etthāpi lobhadosasīsena lobhajañca dosajañca kammameva niddiṭṭhanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a:565_4: Athāti evaṃ gunnaṃ gamanamaggaṃ ujuṃ mahāpathaṃ nissāya siṃsapāvane sayaṃ patitapaṇṇāni saṅkaḍḍhitvā
atk-s0402a:565_5: katasanthare sugatamahācīvaraṃ pattharitvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisinne tathāgate.
atk-s0402a:565_6: Hatthako āḷavakoti hatthato hatthaṃ gatattā evaṃladdhanāmo āḷavako rājaputto.
atk-s0402a:565_9: Kasmā pana sammāsambuddho taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā nisinno,
atk-s0402a:565_11: Sammāsambuddho tāva aṭṭhuppattikāya dhammadesanāya samuṭṭhānaṃ disvā tattha nisinno,
atk-s0402a:565_12: rājakumāropi pātova uṭṭhāya pañcahi upāsakasatehi parivuto buddhupaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanto mahāmaggā okkamma
atk-s0402a:565_13: gopathaṃ gahetvā “buddhānaṃ pūjanatthāya missakamālaṃ ocinissāmī”ti gacchanto satthāraṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0402a:566_5: Gokaṇṭakahatāti navavuṭṭhe deve gāvīnaṃ akkantakkantaṭṭhāne khurantarehi kaddamo uggantvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0402a:566_6: so vātātapena sukkho kakacadantasadiso hoti dukkhasamphasso.
atk-s0402a:566_10: Verambho vāto vāyatīti catūhi disāhi vāyanto vāto vāyati.
atk-s0402a:566_11: Ekāya disāya vā dvīhi vā disāhi tīhi vā disāhi vāyanto vāto verambhoti na vuccati.
atk-s0402a:567_0: Tena hi rājakumārāti idaṃ satthā “ayaṃ rājakumāro lokasmiṃ neva sukhavāsino,
atk-s0402a:567_2: jānāpessāmi na”nti upari desanaṃ vaḍḍhento āha.
atk-s0402a:567_3: Tattha yathā te khameyyāti yathā tuyhaṃ rucceyya.
atk-s0402a:567_9: Taṃ kira paccattharaṇaṃ setavatthassa upari kadalimigacammaṃ attharitvā sibbitvā karonti.
atk-s0402a:567_12: Ubhatolohitakūpadhānoti sīsūpadhānañca pādūpadhānañcāti pallaṅkassa ubhato ṭhapitalohitakūpadhāno.
atk-s0402a:567_14: Manāpena paccupaṭṭhitā assūti manāpena upaṭṭhānavidhānena paccupaṭṭhitā bhaveyyuṃ.
atk-s0402a:568_2: So rāgo tathāgatassa pahīnoti tathārūpo rāgo tathāgatassa pahīnoti attho.
atk-s0402a:569_2: Na limpati kāmesūti vatthukāmesu ca kilesakāmesu ca taṇhādiṭṭhilepehi na limpati.
atk-s0402a:569_5: Sabbā āsattiyo chetvāti āsattiyo vuccanti taṇhāyo,
atk-s0402a:569_6: tā sabbāpi rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu āsattavisattā āsattiyo chinditvā.
atk-s0402a:569_7: Vineyya hadaye daranti hadayanissitaṃ darathaṃ vinayitvā vūpasametvā.
atk-s0402a:569_8: Santiṃ pappuyya cetasoti cittassa kilesanibbānaṃ pāpuṇitvā.
atk-s0402a:571_5: Jiṇṇabyādhimatā hi saṃvegajananaṭṭhena “idāni te maccusamīpaṃ gantabba”nti codenti viya,
atk-s0402a:571_8: Yathā hi alaṅkatapaṭiyattāya devatāya ākāse ṭhatvā “tvaṃ asukadivase marissasī”ti vutte tassā vacanaṃ saddhātabbaṃ hoti;
atk-s0402a:571_9: evamevaṃ jiṇṇabyādhimatāpi dissamānā “tvampi evaṃdhammo”ti codenti viya,
atk-s0402a:571_10: tesañca taṃ vacanaṃ anaññathābhāvitāya devatāya byākaraṇasadisameva hotīti devā viya dūtāti devadūtā.
atk-s0402a:571_12: Sabbabodhisattā hi jiṇṇabyādhimatapabbajite disvāva saṃvegaṃ āpajjitvā nikkhamma pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0402a:572_2: Iminā hi kammena ayaṃ satto niraye nibbattati,
atk-s0402a:572_3: atha naṃ tattha yamo rājā devadūte samanuyuñjati.
atk-s0402a:572_4: Tattha kāyena duccaritaṃ caratīti kāyadvārena tividhaṃ duccaritaṃ carati.
atk-s0402a:573_2: nirayapālāti ettha ekacce therā “nirayapālā nāma natthi,
atk-s0402a:573_3: yantarūpaṃ viya kammameva kāraṇaṃ kāretī”ti vadanti.
atk-s0402a:573_5: Atthi ca kāraṇikā”tiādinā nayena abhidhamme paṭisedhitameva.
atk-s0402a:573_13: catūsu pana dvāresu cattāro janā honti.
atk-s0402a:573_19: Abrahmaññoti ettha ca khīṇāsavā brāhmaṇā nāma,
atk-s0402a:574_3: Nāddasanti attano santike pahitassa kassaci devadūtassa abhāvaṃ sandhāya evaṃ vadati.
atk-s0402a:575_0: Atha naṃ yamo “nāyaṃ bhāsitassa atthaṃ sallakkhetī”ti ñatvā atthaṃ sallakkhāpetukāmo ambhotiādimāha.
atk-s0402a:575_17: Parato byādhidhammo maraṇadhammoti padadvayepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a:576_0: Paṭhamaṃ devadūtaṃ samanuyuñjitvāti ettha jarājiṇṇasatto atthato evaṃ vadati nāma –
atk-s0402a:576_2: ahampi tumhe viya taruṇo ahosiṃ ūrubalī bāhubalī javasampanno,
atk-s0402a:576_4: vijjamānāpi me hatthapādā hatthapādakiccaṃ na karonti,
atk-s0402a:576_10: Iti tassā pure āgamanāva kalyāṇaṃ karothā”ti.
atk-s0402a:577_0: Dutiyaṃ devadūtanti etthapi gilānasatto atthato evaṃ vadati nāma –
atk-s0402a:577_6: Vijjamānāpi me hatthapādā hatthapādakiccaṃ na karonti,
atk-s0402a:577_12: Iti tassa pure āgamanāva kalyāṇaṃ karothā”ti.
atk-s0402a:578_3: Bhastā viya vāyunā uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā yathākkamaṃ samuggatena sūnabhāvena uddhumātattā uddhumātakaṃ.
atk-s0402a:578_9: paribhinnaṭṭhāne hi paggharitena pubbena palimakkhitanti attho.
atk-s0402a:579_0: Tatiyaṃ devadūtanti ettha matakasatto atthato evaṃ vadati nāma –
atk-s0402a:579_8: Iti tassa pure āgamanāva kalyāṇaṃ karothā”ti.
atk-s0402a:580_6: Yathā hi sabhaṇḍaṃ coraṃ gahetvā kattabbameva karonti na vinicchinanti.
atk-s0402a:581_0: Tattha dīghajayantadamiḷo nāma attano dhammatāya sari.
atk-s0402a:581_1: So kira damiḷo sumanagirimahāvihāre ākāsacetiyaṃ rattapaṭena pūjesi,
atk-s0402a:581_2: atha niraye ussadasāmante nibbatto aggijālasaddaṃ sutvāva attanā pūjitapaṭaṃ anussari,
atk-s0402a:581_4: Aparopi puttassa daharabhikkhuno khalisāṭakaṃ dento pādamūle ṭhapesi,
atk-s0402a:581_6: sopi ussadasāmante nibbatto jālasaddena taṃ sāṭakaṃ anussaritvā sagge nibbatto.
atk-s0402a:581_7: Evaṃ tāva attano dhammatāya kusalaṃ kammaṃ saritvā sagge nibbattatīti.
atk-s0402a:582_0: Attano dhammatāya asarante pana tayo devadūte pucchati.
atk-s0402a:582_4: Taṃ yamo rājā disvā sayaṃ sāreti.
atk-s0402a:582_5: Eko kira amacco sumanapupphakumbhena mahācetiyaṃ pūjetvā yamassa pattiṃ adāsi,
atk-s0402a:582_6: taṃ akusalakammena niraye nibbattaṃ yamassa santikaṃ nayiṃsu.
atk-s0402a:582_7: Tasmiṃ tīhipi devadūtehi kusalaṃ asarante yamo sayaṃ olokento disvā –
atk-s0402a:582_8: “nanu tvaṃ mahācetiyaṃ sumanapupphakumbhena pūjetvā mayhaṃ pattiṃ adāsī”ti sāresi,
atk-s0402a:582_9: so tasmiṃ kāle saritvā devalokaṃ gato.
atk-s0402a:582_11: “mahādukkhaṃ nāma anubhavissati ayaṃ satto”ti tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0402a:583_0: Tattaṃ ayokhilanti tigāvutaṃ attabhāvaṃ sampajjalitāya lohapathaviyā uttānakaṃ nipajjāpetvā dakkhiṇahatthe tālappamāṇaṃ ayasūlaṃ pavesenti,
atk-s0402a:583_3: evaṃ urenapi vāmapassenapi dakkhiṇapassenapi nipajjāpetvā te taṃ kammakāraṇaṃ karontiyeva.
atk-s0402a:583_4: Saṃvesetvāti jalitāya lohapathaviyā tigāvutaṃ attabhāvaṃ nipajjāpetvā.
atk-s0402a:583_5: Kuṭhārīhīti mahatīhi gehassa ekapakkhacchadanamattāhi kuṭhārīhi tacchanti,
atk-s0402a:583_9: Tacchantā pana suttāhataṃ karitvā dāruṃ viya aṭṭhaṃsampi chaḷaṃsampi karonti.
atk-s0402a:583_11: Rathe yojetvāti saddhiṃ yugayottapakkharathacakkakubbarapājanehi sabbato pajjalite rathe yojetvā.
atk-s0402a:583_14: Sakimpi uddhanti supakkuthitāya ukkhaliyā pakkhittataṇḍulā viya uddhamadhotiriyañca gacchati.
atk-s0402a:584_5: yathā taṃ samantā yojanasate ṭhatvā olokentassa akkhīni yamakagoḷakā viya nikkhamanti.
atk-s0402a:585_2: Jātimaraṇasambhaveti jātiyā ca maraṇassa ca kāraṇabhūte.
atk-s0402a:585_5: Diṭṭhadhammābhinibbutāti diṭṭhadhamme imasmiṃyeva attabhāve sabbakilesanibbānena nibbutā.
atk-s0402a:587_2: Imaṃ lokaṃ anuvicarantīti aṭṭhamīdivase kira sakko devarājā cattāro mahārājāno āṇāpeti – “tātā,
atk-s0402a:587_3: ajja aṭṭhamīdivase manussalokaṃ anuvicaritvā puññāni karontānaṃ nāmagottaṃ uggaṇhitvā āgacchathā”ti.
atk-s0402a:587_6: manussalokaṃ vicaritvā puññakārakānaṃ nāmagottāni suvaṇṇapaṭṭe likhitvā ānethā”ti.
atk-s0402a:587_12: Tattha uposathaṃ upavasantīti māsassa aṭṭhavāre uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhahanti.
atk-s0402a:587_14: Taṃ karontā ekasmiṃ addhamāse catunnaṃ uposathadivasānaṃ paccuggamanānuggamanavasena karonti.
atk-s0402a:587_22: Te evaṃ anuvicaritvā puññakammakārakānaṃ nāmagottāni sovaṇṇamaye paṭṭe likhitvā āharitvā catunnaṃ mahārājānaṃ denti.
atk-s0402a:587_23: Puttā imaṃ lokaṃ anuvicarantīti catūhi mahārājehi purimanayeneva pahitattā anuvicaranti.
atk-s0402a:588_2: appakā hontīti catunnaṃ mahārājānaṃ amaccā pārisajjā tā tā gāmanigamarājadhāniyo upasaṅkamanti,
atk-s0402a:588_3: tato taṃ upanissāya adhivatthā devatā “mahārājānaṃ amaccā āgatā”ti paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā tesaṃ santikaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0402a:588_4: Te paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā “kacci nu kho mārisā bahū manussā matteyyā”ti vuttanayena manussānaṃ puññapaṭipattiṃ pucchitvā “āma, mārisa,
atk-s0402a:588_5: imasmiṃ gāme asuko ca asuko ca puññāni karontī”ti vutte tesaṃ nāmagottaṃ likhitvā aññattha gacchanti.
atk-s0402a:588_6: Atha cātuddasiyaṃ catunnaṃ mahārājānaṃ puttāpi tameva suvaṇṇapaṭṭaṃ gahetvā teneva nayena anuvicarantā nāmagottāni likhanti.
atk-s0402a:588_7: Tadahuposathe pannarase cattāropi mahārājāno teneva nayena tasmiṃyeva suvaṇṇapaṭṭe nāmagottāni likhanti.
atk-s0402a:588_14: Devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānanti paṭhamaṃ abhinibbatte tettiṃsa devaputte upādāya evaṃladdhanāmānaṃ.
atk-s0402a:588_15: Tesaṃ pana uppattikathā dīghanikāye sakkapañhasuttavaṇṇanāya vitthāritā.
atk-s0402a:588_19: kāyā parihāyissantīti navanavānaṃ devaputtānaṃ apātubhāvena devakāyā parihāyissanti,
atk-s0402a:588_22: Iminā “mayaṃ paripuṇṇe devanagare devasaṅghamajjhe nakkhattaṃ kīḷituṃ na labhissāmā”ti anattamanā honti.
atk-s0402a:589_2: sakko devānamindoti attano sakkadevarājakālaṃ sandhāya katheti.
atk-s0402a:589_3: Ekassa vā sakkassa ajjhāsayaṃ gahetvā kathetīti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a:590_0: Pāṭihāriyapakkhañcāti ettha pāṭihāriyapakkho nāma antovasse temāsaṃ nibaddhuposatho,
atk-s0402a:590_1: taṃ asakkontassa dvinnaṃ pavāraṇānaṃ antare ekamāsaṃ nibaddhuposatho,
atk-s0402a:590_2: tampi asakkontassa paṭhamapavāraṇato paṭṭhāya eko addhamāso pāṭihāriyapakkhoyeva nāma.
atk-s0402a:590_4: Yopissa mādiso naroti yopi satto mādiso bhaveyya.
atk-s0402a:590_5: Sakkopi kira vuttappakārassa uposathakammassa guṇaṃ jānitvā dve devalokasampattiyo pahāya māsassa aṭṭha vāre uposathaṃ upavasati.
atk-s0402a:590_8: yopissa mādiso naroti yopi satto mādiso assa,
atk-s0402a:590_9: mayā pattaṃ sampattiṃ pāpuṇituṃ iccheyyāti attho.
atk-s0402a:590_10: Sakkā hi evarūpena uposathakammena sakkasampattiṃ pāpuṇitunti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0402a:591_1: Katakaraṇīyoti catūhi maggehi kattabbakiccaṃ katvā ṭhito.
atk-s0402a:591_5: Parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojanoti yena saṃyojanena baddho bhavesu ākaḍḍhīyati,
atk-s0402a:591_7: Sammadaññā vimuttoti hetunā nayena kāraṇena jānitvā vimutto.
atk-s0402a:592_0: Yopissa mādiso naroti yopi mādiso khīṇāsavo assa,
atk-s0402a:592_1: sopi evarūpaṃ uposathaṃ upavaseyyāti uposathakammassa guṇaṃ jānanto evaṃ vadeyya.
atk-s0402a:592_2: Aparo nayo yopissa mādiso naroti yopi satto mādiso assa,
atk-s0402a:592_3: mayā pattaṃ sampattiṃ pāpuṇituṃ iccheyyāti attho.
atk-s0402a:592_4: Sakkā hi evarūpena uposathakammena khīṇāsavasampattiṃ pāpuṇitunti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0402a:594_4: Imaṃ bhagavā kapilapure nibbattakālato paṭṭhāya niddukkhabhāvaṃ gahetvā āha,
atk-s0402a:594_5: cariyakāle pana tena anubhūtadukkhassa anto natthīti.
atk-s0402a:594_11: Evaṃ itarāpi dve padumapuṇḍarīkavanehi sañchannā honti.
atk-s0402a:594_12: Bodhisattassa kira sattaṭṭhavassikakāle rājā amacce pucchi –
atk-s0402a:594_15: Tato rājā kuddālakammakārake sannipātetvā pokkharaṇiṭṭhānāni gaṇhāpesi.
atk-s0402a:594_16: Atha sakko devarājā āvajjento taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā –
atk-s0402a:594_30: devā”ti vissakammadevaputto sakkassa paṭissutvā rattibhāge otaritvā rañño gāhāpitapokkharaṇiṭṭhānesuyeva teneva niyāmena pokkharaṇiyo māpesi.
atk-s0402a:595_2: So kira tāsu pokkharaṇīsu tattha tattha suvaṇṇarajatamaṇipavāḷamayā khuddakanāvāyo māpetvā “etā kalalakaddamapūritā ca hontu,
atk-s0402a:595_7: Evaṃ tā māpetvā vissakammo devapurameva gato.
atk-s0402a:595_8: Tato vibhātāya rattiyā mahājano disvā “mahāpurissassa māpitā bhavissantī”ti gantvā rañño ārocesi.
atk-s0402a:595_9: Rājā mahājanaparivāro gantvā pokkharaṇiyo disvā “mama puttassa puññiddhiyā devatāhi māpitā bhavissantī”ti attamano ahosi.
atk-s0402a:596_3: Na kho panassāhanti na kho panassa ahaṃ.
atk-s0402a:596_9: Ettha hi suiti ca tanti ca nipātamattaṃ,
atk-s0402a:596_13: Setacchattaṃ dhārīyatīti mānusakasetacchattampi dibbasetacchattampi uparidhāritameva hoti.
atk-s0402a:596_14: Mā naṃ phusi sītaṃ vāti mā etaṃ bodhisattaṃ sītaṃ vā uṇhādīsu vā aññataraṃ phusatūti attho.
atk-s0402a:597_0: Tayo pāsādā ahesunti bodhisatte kira soḷasavassuddesike jāte suddhodanamahārājā “puttassa vasanakapāsāde
atk-s0402a:597_1: kāressāmī”ti vaḍḍhakino sannipātāpetvā bhaddakena nakkhattamuhuttena navabhūmikataparikammaṃ kāretvā
atk-s0402a:598_3: Cittakammampi karontā tattha tattha pajjalite aggikkhandheyeva akaṃsu.
atk-s0402a:598_6: Vātapānāni uṇhaggāhāpanatthaṃ divā vivaṭāni rattiṃ pihitāni honti.
atk-s0402a:599_1: Sītautuggāhāpanatthaṃ panettha bhūmiyo uccā asambādhā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0402a:599_6: Vātapānasamīpesu cettha nava cāṭiyo ṭhapetvā udakassa pūretvā nīluppalādīhi sañchādenti.
atk-s0402a:599_8: yehi deve vassante viya udakadhārā nikkhamanti.
atk-s0402a:599_9: Antopāsāde tattha tattha kalalapūrā doṇiyo ṭhapetvā pañcavaṇṇāni padumāni ropayiṃsu.
atk-s0402a:599_10: Pāsādamatthake sukkhamahiṃsacammaṃ bandhitvā yantaṃ parivattetvā yāva chadanapiṭṭhiyā pāsāṇe āropetvā tasmiṃ vissajjenti.
atk-s0402a:599_11: Tesaṃ camme pavaṭṭantānaṃ saddo meghagajjitaṃ viya hoti.
atk-s0402a:599_12: Dvāravātapānāni panettha divā pihitāni honti rattiṃ vivaṭāni.
atk-s0402a:600_1: Bhūmiyo panettha dvinnampi utūnaṃ gāhāpanatthāya nātiuccā nātinīcā akaṃsu.
atk-s0402a:600_7: Ekacce dvāravātapānā rattiṃ vivaṭā divā pihitā,
atk-s0402a:601_13: Rājā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā puttassa santikaṃ gantvā ārocesi.
atk-s0402a:601_21: Mahāpuriso dhanuṃ āharāpetvā pallaṅke nisinnova jiyaṃ pādaṅguṭṭhake veṭhetvā kaḍḍhanto pādaṅguṭṭhakeneva
atk-s0402a:601_22: dhanuṃ āropetvā vāmena hatthena daṇḍe gahetvā dakkhiṇena hatthena kaḍḍhitvā jiyaṃ pothesi.
atk-s0402a:601_24: “Kiṃ saddo eso”ti ca vutte “devo gajjatī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0402a:601_27: aṅgīrasassa kumārassa sahassathāmadhanuṃ āropetvā jiyaṃ pothentassa jiyappahārasaddo eso”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0402a:602_2: Taṃ vinivijjhitvā “aññaṃ kiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti āha.
atk-s0402a:602_4: Taṃ vinivijjhitvā “aññaṃ kiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti āha.
atk-s0402a:602_8: Taṃ vinivijjhitvā “aññaṃ kiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti āha.
atk-s0402a:602_10: Tampi vinivijjhitvā “aññaṃ kiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti āha.
atk-s0402a:602_12: Mahāsatto vālikasakaṭampi palālasakaṭampi vinivijjhitvā udake ekusabhappamāṇaṃ kaṇḍaṃ pesesi,
atk-s0402a:602_14: Atha naṃ “idāni vātiṅgaṇasaññāya vālaṃ vijjhituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0402a:602_23: tātāti yojanamatthake vātiṅgaṇasaññāya vālaṃ bandhāpetvā rattandhakāre meghapaṭalacchannāsu disāsu kaṇḍaṃ khipi,
atk-s0402a:602_24: taṃ gantvā yojanamatthake vālaṃ phāletvā pathaviṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0402a:602_26: taṃ divasaṃ pana mahāsatto loke vattamānasippaṃ sabbameva sandassesi.
atk-s0402a:602_27: Sakyarājāno attano attano dhītaro alaṅkaritvā pesayiṃsu,
atk-s0402a:602_29: Mahāpuriso tīsu pāsādesu devo maññe paricārento mahāsampattiṃ anubhavati.
atk-s0402a:603_5: Rājā kira “tathārūpaṃ issariyasukhasampattiṃ anubhavamānassa purisaṃ disvā parisaṅkā uppajjati,
atk-s0402a:603_6: sā me puttassa mā ahosī”ti sabbakiccesu itthiyova ṭhapesi.
atk-s0402a:603_8: Na heṭṭhāpāsādaṃ orohāmīti pāsādato heṭṭhā na otarāmi.
atk-s0402a:603_9: Iti maṃ cattāro māse añño sikhābaddho puriso nāma passituṃ nālattha.
atk-s0402a:603_11: Dāsakammakaraporisassāti dāsānañceva devasikabhattavetanābhatānaṃ kammakarānañca nissāya jīvamānapurisānañca.
atk-s0402a:604_1: Evarūpena ca sukhumālenāti evaṃjātikena ca niddukkhabhāvena.
atk-s0402a:604_3: Evaṃ tathāgato ettakena ṭhānena attano sirisampattiṃ kathesi.
atk-s0402a:604_5: “evarūpāyapi pana sampattiyā ṭhito pamādaṃ akatvā appamattova ahosi”nti appamādalakkhaṇasseva dīpanatthaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0402a:604_11: Jigucchatīti asuciṃ viya disvā jigucchaṃ uppādeti.
atk-s0402a:604_12: Attānaṃyeva atisitvāti jarādhammampi samānaṃ attānaṃ atikkamitvā aṭṭīyati harāyatīti attho.
atk-s0402a:604_23: Tato paṭṭhāya yāva arahattā antarā mahāsattassa yobbanamado nāma na uppajjati.
atk-s0402a:604_25: Ettha pana ārogyamadoti ahaṃ nirogoti ārogyaṃ nissāya uppajjanako mānamado.
atk-s0402a:604_26: Jīvitamadoti ahaṃ ciraṃ jīvīti taṃ nissāya uppajjanako mānamado.
atk-s0402a:605_1: Tathāsantāti yathā santā eva aviparītabyādhiādisabhāvāva hutvāti attho.
atk-s0402a:605_3: Mama evaṃ vihārinoti mayhaṃ evaṃ jigucchāvihārena viharantassa evaṃ jigucchanaṃ nappatirūpaṃ bhaveyya nānucchavikaṃ.
atk-s0402a:605_4: Sohaṃ evaṃ viharantoti so ahaṃ evaṃ paraṃ jigucchamāno viharanto,
atk-s0402a:605_6: Ñatvā dhammaṃ nirūpadhinti sabbūpadhivirahitaṃ nibbānadhammaṃ ñatvā.
atk-s0402a:605_7: Sabbe made abhibhosmīti sabbe tayopi made abhibhaviṃ samatikkamiṃ.
atk-s0402a:605_8: Nekkhamme daṭṭhu khematanti nibbāne khemabhāvaṃ disvā.
atk-s0402a:605_11: Tassa me ahu ussāhoti tassa mayhaṃ taṃ nekkhammasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ abhipassantassa ussāho ahu,
atk-s0402a:605_14: kāmāni paṭisevitunti ahaṃ dāni duvidhepi kāme paṭisevituṃ abhabbo.
atk-s0402a:605_15: Anivatti bhavissāmīti pabbajjato ca sabbaññutaññāṇato ca na nivattissāmi,
atk-s0402a:605_18: Iti imāhi gāthāhi mahābodhipallaṅke attano āgamanīyavīriyaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0402a:607_2: Attādhipateyyantiādīsu attānaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā nibbattitaṃ guṇajātaṃ attādhipateyyaṃ.
atk-s0402a:607_4: Navavidhaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā nibbattitaṃ dhammādhipateyyaṃ.
atk-s0402a:607_20: Passaddho kāyoti nāmakāyo ca karajakāyo ca passaddho vūpasantadaratho.
atk-s0402a:607_22: Samāhitaṃ cittanti ārammaṇe cittaṃ sammā āhitaṃ suṭṭhu ṭhapitaṃ.
atk-s0402a:607_25: Suddhaṃ attānaṃ pariharatīti suddhaṃ nimmalaṃ katvā attānaṃ pariharati paṭijaggati,
atk-s0402a:607_27: Ayañca yāva arahattamaggā pariyāyena suddhamattānaṃ pariharati nāma,
atk-s0402a:608_1: Jānaṃ passaṃ viharantīti taṃ dhammaṃ jānantā passantā viharanti.
atk-s0402a:608_4: tīṇi ādhipateyyānīti ettāvatā tīṇi ādhipateyyāni lokiyalokuttaramissakāni kathitāni.
atk-s0402a:609_2: saccaṃ vā yadi vā musāti yaṃ tvaṃ karosi,
atk-s0402a:609_3: taṃ yadi vā yathāsabhāvaṃ yadi vā no yathāsabhāvanti tava attāva jānāti.
atk-s0402a:609_4: Iminā ca kāraṇena veditabbaṃ “pāpakammaṃ karontassa loke paṭicchannaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthī”ti.
atk-s0402a:609_7: Attānaṃ parigūhasīti yathā me attāpi na jānāti,
atk-s0402a:609_17: Yo ca phusī jātikkhayaṃ padhānavāti yo jhāyī padhānavā māraṃ abhibhavitvā jātikkhayaṃ arahattaṃ phusi.
atk-s0402a:609_19: Lokavidūti tayo loke vidite pākaṭe katvā ṭhito.
atk-s0402a:609_21: Sabbesu dhammesu atammayo munīti sabbe tebhūmakadhamme taṇhāsaṅkhātāya tammayatāya abhāvena atammayo
atk-s0402a:609_22: khīṇāsavamuni kadāci katthaci na hīyati na parihīyatīti vuttaṃ hotīti.
atk-s0402a:615_4: Saddhāya sammukhībhāvāti yadi hi saddhā na bhaveyya,
atk-s0402a:615_8: Tesaṃ pana sammukhībhāvena sakkā kātunti tasmā “saddhāya sammukhībhāvā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0402a:615_9: Ettha ca dve dhammā sulabhā deyyadhammā ceva dakkhiṇeyyā ca,
atk-s0402a:615_11: Puthujjanassa hi saddhā athāvarā padavārena nānā hoti,
atk-s0402a:615_12: teneva mahāmoggallānasadisopi aggasāvako pāṭibhogo bhavituṃ asakkonto āha –
atk-s0402a:617_4: Assaddho hi satakkhattuṃ hatthe dhovitvāpi malinahatthova hoti,
atk-s0402a:617_9: Dānasaṃvibhāgaratoti dānaṃ dadanto saṃvibhāgañca karonto dānasaṃvibhāgarato nāma hoti.
atk-s0402a:618_0: Dassanakāmo sīlavatanti dasapi yojanāni vīsampi tiṃsampi yojanasatampi gantvā sīlasampanne daṭṭhukāmo
atk-s0402a:618_1: hoti pāṭaliputtakabrāhmaṇo viya saddhātissamahārājā viya ca.
atk-s0402a:618_2: Pāṭaliputtassa kira nagaradvāre sālāya nisinnā dve brāhmaṇā kāḷavallimaṇḍapavāsimahānāgattherassa guṇakathaṃ
atk-s0402a:618_3: sutvā “amhehi taṃ bhikkhuṃ daṭṭhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti dvepi janā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0402a:618_5: Eko samuddatīraṃ patvā nāvāya mahātitthapaṭṭane oruyha anurādhapuraṃ āgantvā “kāḷavallimaṇḍapo kuhi”nti pucchi.
atk-s0402a:618_7: So anupubbena therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ patvā cūḷanagaragāme dhuraghare nivāsaṃ gahetvā therassa āhāraṃ
atk-s0402a:618_8: sampādetvā pātova vuṭṭhāya therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pucchitvā gantvā janapariyante ṭhito theraṃ dūratova
atk-s0402a:618_9: āgacchantaṃ disvā sakiṃ tattheva ṭhito vanditvā puna upasaṅkamitvā gopphakesu daḷhaṃ gahetvā vandanto “uccā, bhante,
atk-s0402a:618_14: tumhākaṃ pana guṇā mecakavaṇṇassa samuddassa matthakena gantvā sakalajambudīpatalaṃ ajjhottharitvā gatā,
atk-s0402a:618_15: ahampi pāṭaliputtanagaradvāre nisinno tumhākaṃ guṇakathaṃ assosi”nti.
atk-s0402a:618_16: So therassa bhikkhāhāraṃ datvā attano ticīvaraṃ paṭiyādetvā therassa santike pabbajitvā tassovāde patiṭṭhāya katipāheneva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0402a:619_1: mayhaṃ vanditabbayuttakaṃ ekaṃ ayyaṃ ācikkhathā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0402a:619_8: “kiṃ mayhaṃ mahallakakāle rājagehe kamma”nti divāṭṭhāne mañce nipajjitvā bhūmiyaṃ lekhaṃ likhanto acchi.
atk-s0402a:619_9: Rājā “kahaṃ thero”ti pucchitvā “divāṭṭhāne”ti sutvā tattha gacchanto theraṃ bhūmiyaṃ lekhaṃ likhantaṃ
atk-s0402a:619_13: evaṃvidhassa saddhassa pasannassa rañño kasmā vippaṭisāraṃ karitthā”ti. “Āvuso,
atk-s0402a:619_15: mahallakattherassa bhāro”ti vatvā aparabhāge anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyanto bhikkhusaṅghaṃ āha –
atk-s0402a:619_18: “idaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ antare appatiṭṭhahitvā raññā diṭṭhakāleyeva bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhātū”ti adhiṭṭhahitvā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0402a:619_20: Pañcayojanamagge dhajaṃ dhāretuṃ samatthā rukkhā dhajapaggahitāva ahesuṃ.
atk-s0402a:619_21: Gacchāpi gumbāpi sabbe kūṭāgārābhimukhā hutvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0402a:620_3: Kūṭāgāraṃ ākāsena gantvā thūpārāmaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā silācetiyaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0402a:620_4: Cetiyaṃ saha vatthunā uppatitvā kūṭāgāramatthake aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0402a:620_6: Tasmiṃ khaṇe mahābyagghatthero nāma lohapāsāde sattamakūṭāgāre nisinno bhikkhūnaṃ vinayakammaṃ karonto taṃ saddaṃ sutvā “kiṃ saddo eso”ti paṭipucchi. Bhante,
atk-s0402a:620_10: puññavante nissāya sakkāraṃ labhissāmāti antevāsike khamāpetvā ākāseneva āgantvā taṃ kūṭāgāraṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0402a:620_12: Rājā gandhapupphacuṇṇāni ādāya gantvā ākāse ṭhitaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ disvā kūṭāgāraṃ pūjesi.
atk-s0402a:620_13: Tasmiṃ khaṇe kūṭāgāraṃ otaritvā pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0402a:620_14: Rājā mahāsakkārena sarīrakiccaṃ kāretvā dhātuyo gahetvā cetiyaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0402a:621_0: Saddhammaṃ sotumicchatīti tathāgatappaveditaṃ saddhammaṃ sotukāmo hoti piṇḍapātikattherādayo viya.
atk-s0402a:621_1: Gaṅgāvanavāliaṅgaṇamhi kira tiṃsa bhikkhū vassaṃ upagatā anvaddhamāsaṃ uposathadivase catupaccayasantosabhāvanārāmamahāariyavaṃsañca kathenti.
atk-s0402a:621_2: Eko piṇḍapātikatthero pacchābhāgena āgantvā paṭicchannaṭṭhāne nisīdi.
atk-s0402a:621_3: Atha naṃ eko gonaso jaṅghapiṇḍimaṃsaṃ saṇḍāsena gaṇhanto viya ḍaṃsi.
atk-s0402a:621_4: Thero olokento gonasaṃ disvā “ajja dhammassavanantarāyaṃ na karissāmī”ti gonasaṃ gahetvā thavikāya pakkhipitvā
atk-s0402a:621_5: thavikāmukhaṃ bandhitvā avidūre ṭhāne ṭhapetvā dhammaṃ suṇantova nisīdi.
atk-s0402a:621_6: Aruṇuggamanañca visaṃ vikkhambhetvā therassa tiṇṇaṃ phalānaṃ pāpuṇanañca visassa daṭṭhaṭṭhāneneva otaritvā
atk-s0402a:621_9: “āvuso eko me coro gahito”ti thavikaṃ muñcitvā gonasaṃ vissajjesi.
atk-s0402a:622_0: Dīghavāpiyampi “mahājātakabhāṇakatthero gāthāsahassaṃ mahāvessantaraṃ kathessatī”ti tissamahāgāme tissamahāvihāravāsī
atk-s0402a:622_1: eko daharo sutvā tato nikkhamitvā ekāheneva navayojanamaggaṃ āgato.
atk-s0402a:622_3: Daharo dūramaggāgamanena sañjātakāyadarathattā paṭṭhānagāthāya saddhiṃ avasānagāthaṃyeva vavatthapesi.
atk-s0402a:622_4: Tato therassa “idamavocā”ti vatvā uṭṭhāya gamanakāle “mayhaṃ āgamanakammaṃ moghaṃ jāta”nti rodamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0402a:622_5: Eko manusso taṃ kathaṃ sutvā gantvā therassa ārocesi, “bhante,
atk-s0402a:622_6: ‘tumhākaṃ dhammakathaṃ sossāmī’ti eko daharabhikkhu tissamahāvihārā āgato,
atk-s0402a:622_7: so ‘kāyadarathabhāvena me āgamanaṃ moghaṃ jāta’nti rodamāno ṭhito”ti.
atk-s0402a:622_9: So punadivase therassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0402a:623_0: Aparāpi ullakolikaṇṇivāsikā ekā itthī puttakaṃ pāyamānā “dīghabhāṇakamahāabhayatthero nāma ariyavaṃsapaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0402a:623_1: kathetī”ti sutvā pañcayojanamaggaṃ gantvā divākathikattherassa nisinnakāleyeva vihāraṃ pavisitvā bhūmiyaṃ
atk-s0402a:623_2: puttaṃ nipajjāpetvā divākathikattherassa ṭhitakāva dhammaṃ assosi.
atk-s0402a:623_5: Thero tayo eva paccaye kathetvā uṭṭhānākāraṃ akāsi.
atk-s0402a:623_7: ‘ariyavaṃsaṃ kathessāmī’ti siniddhabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā madhurapānakaṃ pivitvā yaṭṭhimadhukatelādīhi bhesajjaṃ
atk-s0402a:623_11: Aruṇuggamanañca therassa “idamavocā”ti vacanañca upāsikāya sotāpattiphaluppatti ca ekakkhaṇeyeva ahosi.
atk-s0402a:624_0: Aparāpi kaḷamparavāsikā itthī aṅkena puttaṃ ādāya “dhammaṃ sossāmī”ti cittalapabbataṃ gantvā ekaṃ rukkhaṃ
atk-s0402a:624_1: nissāya dārakaṃ nipajjāpetvā sayaṃ ṭhitakāva dhammaṃ suṇāti.
atk-s0402a:624_2: Rattibhāgasamanantare eko dīghajātiko tassā passantiyāyeva samīpe nipannadārakaṃ catūhi dāṭhāhi ḍaṃsitvā agamāsi.
atk-s0402a:624_6: Anekakkhattuṃ kho pana me ayaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭe vaṭṭantiyā putto ahosi,
atk-s0402a:624_7: dhammameva carissāmī”ti tiyāmarattiṃ ṭhitakāva dhammaṃ paggaṇhitvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya aruṇe uggate
atk-s0402a:624_8: saccakiriyāya puttassa visaṃ nimmathetvā puttaṃ gahetvā gatā.
atk-s0402a:624_9: Evarūpā puggalā dhammaṃ sotukāmā nāma honti.
atk-s0402a:626_3: atthavase sampassamānenāti tayo atthe tīṇi kāraṇāni passantena.
atk-s0402a:626_5: Yo dhammaṃ desetīti yo puggalo catusaccadhammaṃ pakāseti.
atk-s0402a:628_0: 44. Catutthe ṭhānehīti kāraṇehi. Pavattinīti appaṭihatā niyyānikā.
atk-s0402a:630_1: Pañcame paṇḍitapaññattānīti paṇḍitehi paññattāni kathitāni pasatthāni.
atk-s0402a:630_2: Sappurisapaññattānīti sappurisehi mahāpurisehi paññattāni kathitāni pasatthāni.
atk-s0402a:630_7: puṇṇovāde damoti vuttā khantipi āḷavake vuttā paññāpi imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-s0402a:630_8: Mātāpitu upaṭṭhānanti mātāpitūnaṃ rakkhanaṃ gopanaṃ paṭijagganaṃ.
atk-s0402a:630_13: Idaṃ mātāpituupaṭṭhānaṃ sabbhi upaññātanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0402a:630_14: Sataṃ etāni ṭhānānīti santānaṃ uttamapurisānaṃ etāni ṭhānāni kāraṇāni.
atk-s0402a:630_15: Ariyo dassanasampannoti idha imesaṃyeva tiṇṇaṃ ṭhānānaṃ kāraṇena ariyo ceva dassanasampanno ca veditabbo,
atk-s0402a:630_17: Atha vā sataṃ etāni ṭhānānīti mātupaṭṭhānaṃ pitupaṭṭhānanti etāni ṭhānāni santānaṃ uttamapurisānaṃ kāraṇānīti
atk-s0402a:630_18: evaṃ mātāpituupaṭṭhākavasena imissā gāthāya attho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a:630_20: Sa lokaṃ bhajate sivanti so khemaṃ devalokaṃ gacchatīti.
atk-s0402a:632_2: Kāyenātiādīsu bhikkhū āgacchante disvā paccuggamanaṃ karontā gacchante anugacchantā āsanasālāya sammajjanaupalepanādīni
atk-s0402a:632_3: karontā āsanāni paññāpentā pānīyaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpentā kāyena puññaṃ pasavanti nāma.
atk-s0402a:632_10: cetiyaṃ vandathā”tiādīni vadantā vācāya puññaṃ pasavanti nāma.
atk-s0402a:632_11: Bhikkhū piṇḍāya carante disvā “labhantū”ti cintentā manasā puññaṃ pasavanti nāma.
atk-s0402a:634_7: Maggaphalāni pana asammasanūpagattā idha na kathīyanti.
atk-s0402a:634_15: Yathā hatthiassagomahiṃsādīnaṃ sattisūlādīni sañjānanalakkhaṇāni na hatthiādayo,
atk-s0402a:636_3: Na uppādo paññāyatītiādīhi uppādajarābhaṅgānaṃ abhāvo vutto.
atk-s0402a:640_1: Dasame ātappaṃ karaṇīyanti vīriyaṃ kātuṃ yuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a:640_3: anuppādaṃ sādhessāmīti iminā kāraṇena kattabbanti attho.
atk-s0402a:641_0: Ettake ṭhāne satthā āṇāpetvā āṇattiṃ pavattetvā idāni samādapento yato kho,
atk-s0402a:641_7: Ime ca pana ātāpādayo tayopi lokiyalokuttaramissakā kathitā.
atk-s0402a:643_7: yattha sakkā hoti dvīhipi tīhipi jaṅghasahassehi saddhiṃ nilīyituṃ.
atk-s0402a:643_9: yattha sakkā hoti sattahi vā aṭṭhahi vā jaṅghasahassehi saddhiṃ nilīyituṃ.
atk-s0402a:643_11: Rodhanti ghanaṃ aññamaññaṃ saṃsaṭṭhasākhaṃ ekābaddhaṃ mahāvanasaṇḍaṃ.
atk-s0402a:643_12: Pariyodhāya atthaṃ bhaṇissantīti pariyodahitvā taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ pakkhipitvā atthaṃ kathayissanti.
atk-s0402a:643_14: Pariyodhāya atthaṃ bhaṇantīti kismiñci kiñci vattuṃ āraddheyeva “mā evaṃ avacuttha,
atk-s0402a:643_16: na esa evarūpaṃ karissatī”ti taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ pakkhipitvā mahantampi dosaṃ harantā atthaṃ bhaṇanti.
atk-s0402a:643_18: Te hi tassapi dosaṃ paṭicchādetvā atthaṃ bhaṇanti.
atk-s0402a:653_6: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti puttadāre attano vacanaṃ akaronte disvā “samaṇassa gotamassa santikaṃ
atk-s0402a:653_12: mayaṃ brāhmaṇā na khattiyā nāmaccā na gahapatikāti brāhmaṇabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā jiṇṇātiādimāhaṃsu.
atk-s0402a:653_14: Avassayabhūtaṃ patiṭṭhākammaṃ amhehi na katanti dassenti.
atk-s0402a:653_18: ahampi kho etaṃ sampaṭicchāmīti ca dasseti.
atk-s0402a:654_0: Idāni yasmā te brāhmaṇā mahallakattā pabbajitvāpi vattaṃ pūretuṃ na sakkhissanti,
atk-s0402a:654_1: tasmā ne pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpento bhagavā yodha kāyena saṃyamotiādimāha.
atk-s0402a:654_4: Taṃ tassa petassāti taṃ puññaṃ tassa paralokaṃ gatassa tāyanaṭṭhena tāṇaṃ,
atk-s0402a:654_10: Evaṃ te brāhmaṇā tathāgatena pañcasu sīlesu samādapitā yāvajīvaṃ pañca sīlāni rakkhitvā sagge nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0402a:656_0: 53. Dutiye bhājananti yaṃkiñci bhaṇḍakaṃ. Sesaṃ paṭhame vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a:658_5: Sandiṭṭhiko dhammo hotīti sāmaṃ passitabbo hoti.
atk-s0402a:658_7: Ehipassikoti “ehi passā”ti evaṃ dassetuṃ sakkāti āgamanīyapaṭipadaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0402a:658_14: Imasmiṃ pana sutte brāhmaṇena lokuttaramaggo pucchito,
atk-s0402a:658_16: So hi sāmaṃ passitabbattā sandiṭṭhiko nāmāti.
atk-s0402a:662_0: 56. Pañcame akālikanti na kālantare pattabbaṃ. Opaneyyikanti paṭipattiyā upagantabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a:664_2: Avīci maññe phuṭo ahosīti yathā avīci mahānirayo nirantaraphuṭo nerayikasattehi paripuṇṇo,
atk-s0402a:664_4: Kukkuṭasaṃpātikāti ekagāmassa chadanapiṭṭhito uppatitvā itaragāmassa chadanapiṭṭhe patanasaṅkhāto kukkuṭasaṃpāto etāsu atthīti kukkuṭasaṃpātikā.
atk-s0402a:664_6: gāmantarato gāmantaraṃ kukkuṭānaṃ padasā gamanasaṅkhāto kukkuṭasaṃpādo etāsu atthīti attho.
atk-s0402a:664_9: attano parikkhāresu pana uppajjamāno na adhammarāgoti adhippeto,
atk-s0402a:664_13: Attanā pariggahitavatthumhi pana uppajjamāno samalobho nāma,
atk-s0402a:664_16: Devo na sammā dhāraṃ anuppavecchatīti vassitabbayutte kāle vassaṃ na vassati.
atk-s0402a:664_20: tehi daṭṭhattā nikkhantanikkhantāni sālisīsāni setavaṇṇāni honti nissārāni.
atk-s0402a:664_22: Salākāvuttanti vapitaṃ vapitaṃ sassaṃ salākāmattameva sampajjati,
atk-s0402a:664_25: Vāḷe amanusse ossajjantīti caṇḍayakkhe manussapathe vissajjenti,
atk-s0402a:666_2: Dhammassa cānudhammaṃ byākarontīti ettha dhammo nāma kathitakathā,
atk-s0402a:666_9: bhotā gotamena vuttā sakāraṇā vādappavatti kiñcipi gārayhaṃ kāraṇaṃ na āgacchatīti.
atk-s0402a:666_10: Atha vā tehi parehi vuttā sakāraṇā vādappavatti kiñci gārayhaṃ kāraṇaṃ na āgacchatīti pucchati.
atk-s0402a:667_0: Antarāyakaro hotīti antarāyaṃ vināsaṃ kicchalābhakaṃ vilomakaṃ karoti.
atk-s0402a:667_2: Khato ca hotīti guṇakhananena khato hoti.
atk-s0402a:669_7: Nāssa vaṇṇaṃ parikkhareti assa goṇassa sarīravaṇṇaṃ na upaparikkhanti,
atk-s0402a:669_9: Yasmiṃ kasmiñci jātiyeti yattha katthaci kulajāte.
atk-s0402a:669_10: Yāsu kāsuci etāsūti etāsu khattiyādippabhedāsu yāsu kāsuci jātīsu.
atk-s0402a:670_5: khandhabhāraṃ kilesabhāraṃ kāmaguṇabhārañca oropetvā ṭhitoti attho.
atk-s0402a:670_6: Katakiccoti catūhi maggehi kiccaṃ katvā ṭhito.
atk-s0402a:670_7: Pāragū sabbadhammānanti sabbadhammā vuccanti pañcakkhandhā dvādasāyatanāni aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo,
atk-s0402a:671_4: Na hi sante upāsareti buddhapaccekabuddhakhīṇāsave uttamapurise na upasaṅkamanti.
atk-s0402a:671_6: Mūlajātā patiṭṭhitāti iminā sotāpannassa saddhaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0402a:671_7: Kule vā idha jāyareti idha vā manussaloke khattiyabrāhmaṇavessakule jāyanti.
atk-s0402a:671_10: adhigacchantīti sīlasamādhipaññāti ime guṇe pūretvā anukkamena nibbānaṃ adhigacchantīti.
atk-s0402a:673_3: gacchissāmi tassa santika”nti cintetvā bhuttapātarāso mahājanaparivuto upasaṅkami.
atk-s0402a:673_6: So kira ito pubbe tathāgatassa santikaṃ agatapubbo.
atk-s0402a:673_9: mayi paṭhamataraṃ akathente katheyya vā na vā.
atk-s0402a:673_11: atha maṃ samāgamaṭṭhāne kathentaṃ evaṃ vakkhanti ‘tvaṃ idha kasmā kathesi,
atk-s0402a:673_12: yena te samaṇassa gotamassa santikaṃ gantvā vacanamattampi na laddha’nti.
atk-s0402a:673_13: Tasmā ‘evaṃ me ayaṃ garahā muccissatī”’ti maññamāno bhāsati.
atk-s0402a:673_15: tathāgatassa pana ñāṇaṃ ghaṭṭessāmīti adhippāyeneva bhāsati.
atk-s0402a:673_16: Evampi tevijjā brāhmaṇāti tevijjakabrāhmaṇā evaṃpaṇḍitā evaṃdhīrā evaṃbyattā evaṃbahussutā evaṃvādino,
atk-s0402a:673_20: ettakena kāraṇena sammatāti ayañhi ettha attho.
atk-s0402a:674_0: Yathā kathaṃ pana brāhmaṇāti ettha yathāti kāraṇavacanaṃ,
atk-s0402a:674_7: Taṃ sutvā brāhmaṇo “jānanaṭṭhāneyeva maṃ sammāsambuddho pucchi,
atk-s0402a:674_11: Mātito ca pitito cāti yassa mātā brāhmaṇī,
atk-s0402a:674_17: so ubhato sujāto mātito ca pitito ca.
atk-s0402a:674_20: “Samavepākiniyā gahaṇiyā”ti pana ettha kammajatejodhātu gahaṇīti vuccati.
atk-s0402a:675_0: Yāva sattamā pitāmahayugāti ettha pitu pitā pitāmaho,
atk-s0402a:675_5: Tato uddhaṃ sabbepi pubbapurisā pitāmahaggahaṇeneva gahitā.
atk-s0402a:675_8: atha vā akkhitto anupakkuṭṭho jātivādenāti dasseti.
atk-s0402a:675_12: na akkosaṃ vā nindaṃ vā pattapubbo.
atk-s0402a:676_2: ajjhāyakā ajjhāyakāteva tatiyaṃ akkharaṃ upanibbatta”nti evaṃ paṭhamakappikakāle jhānavirahitānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ garahavacanaṃ uppannaṃ.
atk-s0402a:676_4: mante parivattetīti iminā atthena pasaṃsāvacanaṃ katvā voharanti.
atk-s0402a:677_2: Saha nighaṇḍunā ca keṭubhena ca sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānaṃ.
atk-s0402a:677_7: Itihāsapañcamānanti āthabbaṇavedaṃ catutthaṃ katvā itiha āsa,
atk-s0402a:677_8: itiha āsāti īdisavacanapaṭisaṃyutto purāṇakathāsaṅkhāto khattavijjāsaṅkhāto vā itihāso pañcamo etesanti itihāsapañcamā.
atk-s0402a:678_0: Padaṃ tadavasesañca byākaraṇaṃ adhīyati vedeti cāti padako veyyākaraṇo.
atk-s0402a:678_2: Mahāpurisalakkhaṇanti mahāpurisānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ lakkhaṇadīpakaṃ dvādasasahassaganthapamāṇaṃ satthaṃ,
atk-s0402a:678_4: yesaṃ vasena “iminā lakkhaṇena samannāgatā buddhā nāma honti,
atk-s0402a:678_15: Avayo nāma yo tāni atthato ca ganthato ca sandhāretuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0402a:679_0: Tena hīti idaṃ bhagavā naṃ āyācantaṃ disvā “idānissa pañhaṃ kathetuṃ kālo”ti ñatvā āha.
atk-s0402a:679_5: Idha panetaṃ tissannaṃ vijjānaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipattidassanatthaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a:679_6: Tattha dvinnaṃ vijjānaṃ anupadavaṇṇanā ceva bhāvanānayo ca visuddhimagge vitthāritova.
atk-s0402a:680_4: Avijjāti tasseva pubbenivāsassa aviditakaraṇaṭṭhena tappaṭicchādako moho vuccati.
atk-s0402a:680_5: Tamoti sveva moho paṭicchādakaṭṭhena tamoti vuccati.
atk-s0402a:680_6: Ālokoti sāyeva vijjā obhāsakaraṇaṭṭhena ālokoti vuccati.
atk-s0402a:680_7: Ettha ca vijjā adhigatāti ayaṃ attho.
atk-s0402a:680_10: athassa adhigatavijjassa avijjā vihatā vinaṭṭhāti attho. Kasmā?
atk-s0402a:680_17: Kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatāya pahitattassa.
atk-s0402a:680_20: yathā appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avijjā vihaññeyya,
atk-s0402a:680_28: Etassa tena padhānānuyogassa anurūpameva phalaṃ laddhanti.
atk-s0402a:682_0: Tatiyavijjāya so evaṃ samāhite citteti vipassanāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānacittaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a:682_2: Arahattamaggo hi āsavavināsanato āsavānaṃ khayoti vuccati,
atk-s0402a:682_5: So idaṃ dukkhanti evamādīsu ettakaṃ dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0402a:682_6: na ito bhiyyoti sabbampi dukkhasaccaṃ sarasalakkhaṇappaṭivedhena yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti paṭivijjhati,
atk-s0402a:682_7: tassa ca dukkhassa nibbattikaṃ taṇhaṃ “ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo”ti,
atk-s0402a:682_10: Tassa ca sampāpakaṃ ariyamaggaṃ “ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti sarasalakkhaṇappaṭivedhena yathābhūtaṃ
atk-s0402a:683_0: Evaṃ sarūpato saccāni dassetvā idāni kilesavasena pariyāyato dassento ime āsavātiādimāha.
atk-s0402a:683_1: Tassa evaṃ jānato evaṃ passatoti tassa bhikkhuno evaṃ jānantassa evaṃ passantassa.
atk-s0402a:683_7: Vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇanti iminā paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0402a:683_9: Tena hi ñāṇena so paccavekkhanto khīṇā jātītiādīni pajānāti.
atk-s0402a:683_12: Na tāvassa atītā jāti khīṇā pubbeva khīṇattā,
atk-s0402a:683_17: Yā pana maggassa abhāvitattā uppajjeyya ekacatupañcavokārabhavesu ekacatupañcakkhandhappabhedā jāti,
atk-s0402a:683_18: sā maggassa bhāvitattā anuppādadhammataṃ āpajjanena khīṇā.
atk-s0402a:683_19: Taṃ so maggabhāvanāya pahīnakilese paccavekkhitvā kilesābhāve vijjamānampi kammaṃ āyatiappaṭisandhikaṃ hotīti jānanto pajānāti.
atk-s0402a:684_3: Puthujjanakalyāṇakena hi saddhiṃ satta sekkhā brahmacariyavāsaṃ vasanti nāma,
atk-s0402a:684_5: Tasmā so attano brahmacariyavāsaṃ paccavekkhanto “vusitaṃ brahmacariya”nti pajānāti.
atk-s0402a:684_6: Kataṃ karaṇīyanti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanābhisamayavasena soḷasavidhampi kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpitanti attho.
atk-s0402a:684_9: Tasmā so attano karaṇīyaṃ paccavekkhanto “kataṃ karaṇīya”nti pajānāti.
atk-s0402a:684_11: evaṃ soḷasavidhakiccabhāvāya kilesakkhayāya vā maggabhāvanākiccaṃ me natthīti pajānāti.
atk-s0402a:684_13: imasmā evaṃ pakārā idāni vattamānakkhandhasantānā aparaṃ khandhasantānaṃ mayhaṃ natthi,
atk-s0402a:684_14: ime pana pañcakkhandhā pariññātā tiṭṭhanti chinnamūlakā rukkhā viya.
atk-s0402a:684_15: Te carimakaviññāṇanirodhena anupādāno viya jātavedo nibbāyissantīti pajānāti.
atk-s0402a:685_13: Taṃ namassanti gotamanti taṃ gotamagottaṃ buddhasāvakā namassanti.
atk-s0402a:686_4: Saggāpāyañca passatīti cha kāmāvacare nava brahmaloke cattāro ca apāye passati.
atk-s0402a:686_9: Nāññaṃ lapitalāpananti yo panañño tevijjoti aññehi lapitavacanamattameva lapati,
atk-s0402a:686_11: attapaccakkhato ñatvā parassapi tisso vijjā kathentamevāhaṃ tevijjoti vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0402a:686_14: Idāni brāhmaṇo bhagavato kathāya pasanno pasannākāraṃ karonto abhikkantantiādimāha.
atk-s0402a:688_7: Tevijjesu brāhmaṇesu dānaṃ dadeyyāti sabbametaṃ dānaṃ tevijjesu dadeyya,
atk-s0402a:690_1: Dasame saṅgāravoti evaṃnāmako rājagahanagare jiṇṇapaṭisaṅkharaṇakārako āyuttakabrāhmaṇo.
atk-s0402a:690_6: Yaññaṃ yajāmāti bāhirasamaye sabbacatukkena sabbaṭṭhakena sabbasoḷasakena sabbadvattiṃsāya sabbacatusaṭṭhiyā
atk-s0402a:690_7: sabbasatena sabbapañcasatenāti ca evaṃ pāṇaghātapaṭisaṃyutto yañño nāma hoti.
atk-s0402a:690_11: Yaññādhikaraṇanti yajanakāraṇā ceva yājanakāraṇā cāti attho.
atk-s0402a:690_12: Ekasmiñhi bahūnaṃ dadantepi dāpentepi bahūsupi bahūnaṃ dentesupi dāpentesupi puññapaṭipadā anekasārīrikā nāma hoti.
atk-s0402a:690_14: Tuyhañca tuyhañca yajāmīti vadantassāpi tvañca tvañca yajāhīti āṇāpentassāpi ca anekasārīrikāva hoti.
atk-s0402a:690_16: Yassa vā tassa vāti yasmā vā tasmā vā.
atk-s0402a:690_17: Ekamattānaṃ dametīti attano indriyadamanavasena ekaṃ attānameva dameti.
atk-s0402a:690_18: Ekamattānaṃ sametīti attano rāgādisamanavasena ekaṃ attānameva sameti.
atk-s0402a:691_0: Evamidaṃ brāhmaṇassa kathaṃ sutvā satthā cintesi –
atk-s0402a:691_1: “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo pasughātakasaṃyuttaṃ mahāyaññaṃ anekasārīrikaṃ puññapaṭipadaṃ vadeti,
atk-s0402a:691_5: handassa ekasārīrikañca anekasārīrikañca paṭipadaṃ desessāmī”ti upari desanaṃ vaḍḍhento tena hi brāhmaṇātiādimāha.
atk-s0402a:691_6: Tattha yathā te khameyyāti yathā tuyhaṃ rucceyya.
atk-s0402a:691_7: Idha tathāgato loke uppajjatītiādi visuddhimagge vitthāritameva.
atk-s0402a:691_13: Anuttaraṃ brahmacariyogadhanti arahattamaggasaṅkhātassa brahmacariyassa anuttaraṃ ogadhaṃ uttamapatiṭṭhābhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ.
atk-s0402a:692_0: Appaṭṭhatarāti yattha bahūhi veyyāvaccakarehi vā upakaraṇehi vā attho natthi.
atk-s0402a:692_1: Appasamārambhatarāti yattha bahūnaṃ kammacchedavasena pīḷāsaṅkhāto samārambho natthi.
atk-s0402a:692_4: ete me pujjāti yathā bhavaṃ gotamo,
atk-s0402a:692_7: tumheyeva dve janā mayhaṃ pujjā ca pāsaṃsā cāti imamatthaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vadati.
atk-s0402a:692_10: attano kho pana vaṇṇe vutte padussanako nāma natthī”ti.
atk-s0402a:692_11: Tasmā pañhaṃ akathetukāmo vaṇṇabhaṇanena vikkhepaṃ karonto evamāha.
atk-s0402a:693_0: Na kho tyāhanti na kho te ahaṃ.
atk-s0402a:694_3: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ parimoceyyanti yaṃnūnāhaṃ ubhopete vihesato parimoceyyaṃ.
atk-s0402a:694_4: Brāhmaṇo hi ānandena pucchitaṃ pañhaṃ akathento viheseti,
atk-s0402a:694_6: Iti ubhopete vihesato mocessāmīti cintetvā evamāha.
atk-s0402a:694_8: Antarākathā udapādīti aññissā kathāya antarantare katarā kathā uppajjīti pucchati.
atk-s0402a:694_9: Tadā kira rājantepure tīṇi pāṭihāriyāni ārabbha kathā udapādi,
atk-s0402a:694_11: Atha brāhmaṇo “idāni vattuṃ sakkhissāmī”ti rājantepure uppannaṃ kathaṃ ārocento ayaṃ khvajja,
atk-s0402a:694_13: Tattha ayaṃ khvajjāti ayaṃ kho ajja.
atk-s0402a:694_16: Iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ dassesunti bhikkhācāraṃ gacchantā ākāseneva gamiṃsu ceva āgamiṃsu cāti evaṃ pubbe pavattaṃ ākāsagamanaṃ sandhāyevamāha.
atk-s0402a:694_17: Etarahi pana bahutarā ca bhikkhūti idaṃ so brāhmaṇo “pubbe bhikkhū ‘cattāro paccaye uppādessāmā’ti maññe evamakaṃsu,
atk-s0402a:694_18: idāni paccayānaṃ uppannabhāvaṃ ñatvā soppena ceva pamādena ca vītināmentī”ti laddhiyā evamāha.
atk-s0402a:695_5: Anekavihitaṃ iddhividhantiādīnaṃ attho ceva bhāvanānayo ca visuddhimagge vitthāritova.
atk-s0402a:696_0: Nimittena ādisatīti āgatanimittena vā gatanimittena vā ṭhitanimittena vā “idaṃ nāma bhavissatī”ti katheti.
atk-s0402a:696_2: eko kira rājā tisso muttā gahetvā purohitaṃ pucchi “kiṃ me, ācariya,
atk-s0402a:696_5: tena ca samayena ekā sarabū “makkhikaṃ gahessāmī”ti pakkhantā,
atk-s0402a:696_15: Evampi te manoti evaṃ tava mano somanassito vā domanassito vā kāmavitakkādisaṃyutto vāti.
atk-s0402a:696_17: Itipi te cittanti itipi tava cittaṃ,
atk-s0402a:696_18: imañca imañca atthaṃ cintayamānaṃ pavattatīti attho.
atk-s0402a:696_19: Bahuṃ cepi ādisatīti bahuṃ cepi katheti.
atk-s0402a:697_2: Saddaṃ sutvāti aññassa cittaṃ ñatvā kathentānaṃ sutvā.
atk-s0402a:697_3: Vitakkavipphārasaddanti vitakkavipphāravasena uppannaṃ vippalapantānaṃ suttappamattādīnaṃ saddaṃ.
atk-s0402a:697_5: Yaṃ vitakkayato tassa so saddo uppanno,
atk-s0402a:698_1: eko kira manusso “aṭṭaṃ karissāmī”ti gāmā nagaraṃ gacchanto nikkhantaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya “vinicchayasabhāyaṃ
atk-s0402a:698_2: rañño ca rājamahāmattānañca idaṃ kathessāmi idaṃ kathessāmī”ti vitakkento rājakulaṃ gato viya rañño purato
atk-s0402a:698_3: ṭhito viya aṭṭakārakena saddhiṃ kathento viya ca ahosi,
atk-s0402a:698_4: tassa taṃ vitakkavipphāravasena niccharantaṃ saddaṃ sutvā eko puriso “kenaṭṭhena gacchasī”ti āha.
atk-s0402a:698_7: So gantvā aṭṭaṃ katvā jayameva pāpuṇi.
atk-s0402a:699_1: Atha naṃ nikkhamantaṃ ekā dārikā aññavihitā na addasa.
atk-s0402a:699_2: So gāmadvāre ṭhatvā nivattitvā oloketvā taṃ disvā vitakkento agamāsi.
atk-s0402a:699_3: Gacchantoyeva ca “kiṃ nu kho kurumānā dārikā na addasā”ti vacībhedaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0402a:699_4: Passe ṭhito eko puriso sutvā “tumhe, bhante,
atk-s0402a:700_5: Āgamanena jānāti nāma kasiṇaparikammakāleyeva “yenākārenesa kasiṇabhāvanaṃ āraddho paṭhamajjhānaṃ vā…pe…
atk-s0402a:700_6: catutthajjhānaṃ vā aṭṭha vā samāpattiyo nibbattessatī”ti jānāti.
atk-s0402a:700_7: Pubbabhāgena jānāti nāma paṭhamavipassanāya āraddhāyayeva jānāti,
atk-s0402a:700_8: “yenākārena esa vipassanaṃ āraddho sotāpattimaggaṃ vā nibbattessati…pe…
atk-s0402a:700_12: imassa nāma cittassa anantarā imaṃ nāma vitakkaṃ vitakkessati,
atk-s0402a:700_13: ito vuṭṭhitassa etassa hānabhāgiyo vā samādhi bhavissati ṭhitibhāgiyo vā visesabhāgiyo vā nibbedhabhāgiyo vā,
atk-s0402a:700_15: Tattha puthujjano cetopariyañāṇalābhī puthujjanānaṃyeva cittaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0402a:700_17: Ariyesupi heṭṭhimo uparimassa cittaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0402a:700_22: Tesañhi heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā samāpatti tatravattiyeva hoti.
atk-s0402a:700_23: Tatheva taṃ hotīti etaṃ ekaṃsena tatheva hoti.
atk-s0402a:701_0: Evaṃ vitakkethāti evaṃ nekkhammavitakkādayo pavattentā vitakketha.
atk-s0402a:701_1: Mā evaṃ vitakkayitthāti evaṃ kāmavitakkādayo pavattentā mā vitakkayittha.
atk-s0402a:701_4: Mā evanti niccantiādinā nayena mā manasā karittha.
atk-s0402a:701_6: Idañca upasampajjāti idaṃ catumaggaphalappabhedaṃ lokuttaradhammameva upasampajja pāpuṇitvā nipphādetvā viharatha.
atk-s0402a:702_0: Māyāsahadhammarūpaṃ viya khāyatīti māyāya samānakāraṇajātikaṃ viya hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0402a:702_1: Māyākāropi hi udakaṃ gahetvā telaṃ karoti,
atk-s0402a:702_2: telaṃ gahetvā udakanti evaṃ anekarūpaṃ māyaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0402a:702_6: pāṭihāriyaṃ māyāsahadhammarūpaṃ viya khāyatīti cintāmaṇikavijjāsarikkhakataṃ sandhāya evaṃ āha.
atk-s0402a:702_7: Cintāmaṇikavijjaṃ jānantāpi hi āgacchantameva disvā “ayaṃ idaṃ nāma vitakkento āgacchatī”ti jānanti.
atk-s0402a:703_2: Bhavañhi gotamo avitakkaṃ avicāranti idha brāhmaṇo avasesaṃ ādesanāpāṭihāriyaṃ bāhirakanti na gaṇhi.
atk-s0402a:703_3: Idañca pana sabbaṃ so brāhmaṇo tathāgatassa vaṇṇaṃ kathentoyeva āha.
atk-s0402a:703_4: Addhā kho tyāyanti ekaṃseneva tayā ayaṃ.
atk-s0402a:703_5: Āsajja upanīya vācā bhāsitāti mama guṇe ghaṭṭetvā mameva guṇānaṃ santikaṃ upanītā vācā bhāsitā.
atk-s0402a:703_6: Apica tyāhaṃ byākarissāmīti apica te ahameva kathessāmīti.
atk-s0402a:709_9: Titthiyā nāma yesaṃ tā diṭṭhiyo ruccanti khamanti.
atk-s0402a:709_12: gunnaṃ dakkhiṇāpatho āyatana”nti ettha sañjātiṭṭhānaṃ āyatanaṃ nāma.
atk-s0402a:712_5: Sabbepi hi diṭṭhigatikā sañjāyamānā imesuyeva tīsu ṭhānesu sañjāyanti,
atk-s0402a:712_6: samosaraṇamānāpi etesuyeva tīsu ṭhānesu samosaranti sannipatanti,
atk-s0402a:712_7: diṭṭhigatikabhāve ca nesaṃ etāneva tīṇi kāraṇānīti titthabhūtāni sañjātiādinā atthena āyatanānītipi titthāyatanāni.
atk-s0402a:712_9: Samanuyuñjiyamānānīti kā nāmetā diṭṭhiyoti evaṃ pucchiyamānāni.
atk-s0402a:712_10: Samanugāhiyamānānīti kiṃkāraṇā etā diṭṭhiyo uppannāti evaṃ sammā anuggāhiyamānāni.
atk-s0402a:712_11: Samanubhāsiyamānānīti paṭinissajjetha etāni pāpakāni diṭṭhigatānīti evaṃ sammā anusāsiyamānāni.
atk-s0402a:712_14: “samanuyuñjatīti vā samanuggāhatīti vā samanubhāsatīti vā esese ekaṭṭhe same samabhāge tajjāte taññevā”ti.
atk-s0402a:713_0: Parampi gantvāti ācariyaparamparā laddhiparamparā attabhāvaparamparāti etesu yaṃkiñci paramparaṃ gantvāpi.
atk-s0402a:713_10: amhākaṃ ācariyapācariyo ahetuapaccayavādī”ti evaṃ gacchantāni hi etāni ācariyaparamparaṃ gacchanti nāma.
atk-s0402a:713_13: amhākaṃ ācariyapācariyo ahetuapaccayaladdhiko”ti evaṃ gacchantāni laddhiparamparaṃ gacchanti nāma.
atk-s0402a:713_16: amhākaṃ ācariyapācariyassa attabhāvo ahetu apaccayo”ti evaṃ gacchantāni attabhāvaparamparaṃ gacchanti nāma.
atk-s0402a:713_17: Evaṃ pana suvidūrampi gacchantāni akiriyamatteyeva saṇṭhahanti,
atk-s0402a:713_18: ekopi etesaṃ diṭṭhigatikānaṃ kattā vā kāretā vā na paññāyati.
atk-s0402a:714_1: Kāmañca purisotipi vutte puggalotipi vutte sattoyeva vutto hoti,
atk-s0402a:714_2: ayaṃ pana sammutikathā nāma yo yathā jānāti,
atk-s0402a:714_4: Paṭisaṃvedetīti attano santāne uppannaṃ jānāti paṭisaṃviditaṃ karoti,
atk-s0402a:714_8: Iminā kammavedanañca kiriyavedanañca paṭikkhipitvā ekaṃ vipākavedanameva sampaṭicchanti.
atk-s0402a:714_9: Ye vā ime pittasamuṭṭhānā ābādhā semhasamuṭṭhānā vātasamuṭṭhānā sannipātikā utupariṇāmajā visamaparihārajā
atk-s0402a:714_10: opakkamikā ābādhā kammavipākajā ābādhāti aṭṭha rogā vuttā,
atk-s0402a:714_11: tesu satta paṭikkhipitvā ekaṃ vipākavedanaṃyeva sampaṭicchanti.
atk-s0402a:714_12: Yepime diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ upapajjavedanīyaṃ aparapariyāyavedanīyanti tayo kammarāsayo vuttā,
atk-s0402a:714_13: tesupi dve paṭibāhitvā ekaṃ aparapariyāyakammaṃyeva sampaṭicchanti.
atk-s0402a:714_14: Yepime diṭṭhadhammavedanīyo vipāko upapajjavedanīyo aparapariyāyavedanīyoti tayo vipākarāsayo vuttā,
atk-s0402a:714_15: tesupi dve paṭibāhitvā ekaṃ aparapariyāyavipākameva sampaṭicchanti.
atk-s0402a:714_16: Yepime kusalacetanā akusalacetanā vipākacetanā kiriyacetanāti cattāro cetanārāsayo vuttā,
atk-s0402a:714_17: tesupi tayo paṭibāhitvā ekaṃ vipākacetanaṃyeva sampaṭicchanti.
atk-s0402a:715_3: imā tisso vedanā paccuppanne attanā katamūlakena vā āṇattimūlakena vā pubbekatena vā ahetuapaccayā vā paṭisaṃvedituṃ nāma na sakkā,
atk-s0402a:715_5: Evaṃvādino panete heṭṭhā vuttesu aṭṭhasu rogesu ekampi asampaṭicchitvā sabbe paṭibāhanti,
atk-s0402a:715_6: heṭṭhā vuttesu ca tīsu kammarāsīsu tīsu vipākarāsīsu catūsu cetanārāsīsu ekampi asampaṭicchitvā sabbepi paṭibāhanti.
atk-s0402a:716_3: imā tisso vedanā paccuppanne attanā katamūlakena vā āṇattimūlakena vā pubbekatena vā issaranimmānahetunā vā paṭisaṃvedituṃ nāma na sakkā,
atk-s0402a:716_5: Evaṃvādino panete heṭṭhā vuttesu rogādīsu ekampi asampaṭicchitvā sabbaṃ paṭibāhanti.
atk-s0402a:717_0: Evaṃ satthā mātikaṃ nikkhipitvā idāni taṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ tatra,
atk-s0402a:717_2: Tattha evaṃ vadāmīti laddhipatiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ evaṃ vadāmīti dasseti.
atk-s0402a:717_3: Laddhiñhi appatiṭṭhāpetvā niggayhamānā laddhito laddhiṃ saṅkamanti,
atk-s0402a:717_6: Laddhiyā pana patiṭṭhāpitāya saṅkamituṃ alabhantā suniggahitā honti,
atk-s0402a:717_7: iti nesaṃ laddhipatiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ evaṃ vadāmīti āha.
atk-s0402a:717_12: Pāṇātipātino bhavissanti pubbekatahetūti ye keci loke pāṇaṃ atipātenti,
atk-s0402a:717_15: Na hi pāṇātipātakammaṃ attanā katamūlakena na āṇattimūlakena na issaranimmānahetunā na ahetuapaccayā sakkā paṭisaṃvedetuṃ,
atk-s0402a:717_19: Iti bhagavā tesaṃyeva laddhiṃ gahetvā tesaṃ niggahaṃ āropeti.
atk-s0402a:718_2: Idaṃ vā karaṇīyaṃ idaṃ vā akaraṇīyanti ettha ayaṃ adhippāyo –
atk-s0402a:718_4: idaṃ vā akaraṇīyanti akattabbassa akaraṇatthāya kattukamyatā vā paccattapurisakāro vā na hoti.
atk-s0402a:718_5: Chandavāyāmesu vā asantesu “idaṃ kattabba”ntipi “idaṃ na kattabba”ntipi na hoti.
atk-s0402a:718_6: Iti karaṇīyākaraṇīye kho pana saccato thetato anupalabbhiyamāneti evaṃ kattabbe ca akattabbe ca bhūtato thirato apaññāyamāne alabbhamāne.
atk-s0402a:718_7: Yadi hi kattabbaṃ kātuṃ akattabbato ca viramituṃ labheyya,
atk-s0402a:718_9: Yasmā pana ubhayampi taṃ esa nupalabbhati,
atk-s0402a:718_10: tasmā taṃ saccato thetato na upalabbhati,
atk-s0402a:718_13: Anārakkhānaṃ viharatanti chasu dvāresu nirārakkhānaṃ viharantānaṃ.
atk-s0402a:718_14: Na hoti paccattaṃ sahadhammiko samaṇavādoti evaṃ bhūtānaṃ tumhākaṃ vā aññesaṃ vā mayaṃ samaṇāti paccattaṃ sakāraṇo samaṇavādo na hoti na ijjhati.
atk-s0402a:719_0: Evaṃ pubbekatavādino niggahetvā idāni issaranimmānavādino niggahetuṃ tatra,
atk-s0402a:720_0: Evaṃ imesaṃ titthāyatanānaṃ parampi gantvā akiriyāya saṇṭhahanabhāvena tucchabhāvaṃ aniyyānikabhāvaṃ,
atk-s0402a:720_1: asārabhāvena thusakoṭṭanasadisataṃ āpajjanabhāvena aggisaññāya dhamamānakhajjupanakasarikkhataṃ taṃdiṭṭhikānaṃ
atk-s0402a:720_2: purimassapi majjhimassapi pacchimassapi atthadassanatāya abhāvena andhaveṇūpamataṃ saddamatteneva tāni
atk-s0402a:720_3: gahetvā sāradiṭṭhikānaṃ pathaviyaṃ patitassa beluvapakkassa daddabhāyitasaddaṃ sutvā “pathavī saṃvaṭṭamānā
atk-s0402a:720_4: āgacchatī”ti saññāya palāyantena sasakena sarikkhabhāvañca dassetvā idāni attanā desitassa dhammassa
atk-s0402a:720_5: sārabhāvañceva niyyānikabhāvañca dassetuṃ ayaṃ kho pana,
atk-s0402a:720_7: Tattha aniggahitoti aññehi aniggahito niggahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyo.
atk-s0402a:720_9: “saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ naṃ karissāmā”ti pavattehipi tathā kātuṃ asakkuṇeyyo.
atk-s0402a:720_11: Appaṭikuṭṭhoti “kiṃ iminā haratha na”nti evaṃ appaṭibāhito,
atk-s0402a:721_1: bhikkhave”ti pañhaṃ pucchitvā “imā cha dhātuyo”tiādinā nayena mātikaṃ nikkhipitvā yathāpaṭipāṭiyā vibhajitvā dassento puna imā cha dhātuyotiādimāha.
atk-s0402a:721_5: Manopavicārāti vitakkavicārapādehi aṭṭhārasasu ṭhānesu manassa upavicārā.
atk-s0402a:722_7: Taṃ kho panetaṃ saṅkhepato āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhepatopi vitthāratopi kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0402a:722_8: Vitthārato āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhepato kathetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0402a:722_10: Imasmiṃ pana titthāyatanasutte idaṃ saṅkhepato chadhātuvasena kammaṭṭhānaṃ āgataṃ.
atk-s0402a:723_0: Saṅkhepato chadhātuvasena kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariggaṇhantopi evaṃ pariggaṇhāti –
atk-s0402a:723_1: pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātūti imāni cattāri mahābhūtāni,
atk-s0402a:723_3: Ekasmiṃ ca upādārūpe diṭṭhe sesāni tevīsati diṭṭhānevāti sallakkhetabbāni.
atk-s0402a:723_7: phasso ca cetanā ca saṅkhārakkhandhoti ime cattāro arūpakkhandhā nāma.
atk-s0402a:723_8: Cattāri pana mahābhūtāni catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādārūpaṃ rūpakkhandho nāma.
atk-s0402a:723_10: rūpakkhandho rūpanti nāmañca rūpañcāti dveyeva dhammā honti,
atk-s0402a:723_11: tato uddhaṃ satto vā jīvo vā natthīti evaṃ ekassa bhikkhuno saṅkhepato chadhātuvasena arahattasampāpakaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a:724_0: Vitthārato pariggaṇhanto pana cattāri mahābhūtāni pariggaṇhitvā ākāsadhātupariggahānusārena tevīsati upādārūpāni pariggaṇhāti.
atk-s0402a:724_1: Atha nesaṃ paccayaṃ upaparikkhanto puna cattāreva mahābhūtāni disvā tesu pathavīdhātu vīsatikoṭṭhāsā,
atk-s0402a:724_4: vāyodhātu chakoṭṭhāsāti koṭṭhāsavasena samodhānetvā dvācattālīsa mahābhūtāni ca vavatthapetvā tesu tevīsati
atk-s0402a:724_6: Tāni ca vatthurūpena saddhiṃ chasaṭṭhi hontīti chasaṭṭhi rūpāni passati.
atk-s0402a:724_9: Tehi sahajātā vedanādayopi tattakāyevāti ekāsīti vedanā vedanākkhandho,
atk-s0402a:724_11: ekāsīti cetanā saṅkhārakkhandhoti ime cattāro arūpakkhandhā tebhūmakavasena gayhamānā catuvīsādhikāni
atk-s0402a:724_12: tīṇi dhammasatāni hontīti iti ime ca arūpadhammā chasaṭṭhi ca rūpadhammāti sabbepi samodhānetvā nāmañca
atk-s0402a:724_14: tato uddhaṃ satto vā jīvo vā natthīti nāmarūpavasena pañcakkhandhe vavatthapetvā tesaṃ paccayaṃ pariyesanto
atk-s0402a:724_15: avijjāpaccayā taṇhāpaccayā kammapaccayā āhārapaccayāti evaṃ paccayaṃ disvā “atītepi imehi paccayehi idaṃ
atk-s0402a:724_18: etarahipi etehiyeva pavattatī”ti tīsu kālesu kaṅkhaṃ vitaritvā anukkamena paṭipajjamāno arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0402a:724_19: Evaṃ vitthāratopi chadhātuvasena arahattasampāpakaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a:725_0: Cakkhu phassāyatananti suvaṇṇādīnaṃ suvaṇṇādiākaro viya dve cakkhuviññāṇāni dve sampaṭicchanāni tīṇi
atk-s0402a:725_1: santīraṇānīti imehi sattahi viññāṇehi sahajātānaṃ sattannaṃ phassānaṃ samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena ākaroti āyatanaṃ.
atk-s0402a:725_3: Mano phassāyatananti ettha pana dvāvīsati vipākaphassā yojetabbā.
atk-s0402a:725_4: Iti hidaṃ chaphassāyatanānaṃ vasena kammaṭṭhānaṃ āgataṃ.
atk-s0402a:725_7: ettha hi purimāni pañca āyatanāni upādārūpaṃ,
atk-s0402a:725_8: tesu diṭṭhesu avasesaṃ upādārūpaṃ diṭṭhameva hoti.
atk-s0402a:725_11: tena sahajātā vedanādayo sesā tayo arūpakkhandhāti heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva saṅkhepato ca vitthārato ca arahattasampāpakaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a:726_0: Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ passitvā.
atk-s0402a:726_4: Ettha ca iṭṭhaṃ vā hotu aniṭṭhaṃ vā,
atk-s0402a:726_13: Taṃ kho panetaṃ saṅkhepato āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhepatopi vitthāratopi kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0402a:726_14: Vitthārato āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhepato kathetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0402a:726_15: Imasmiṃ pana titthāyatanasutte idaṃ saṅkhepato aṭṭhārasamanopavicāravasena kammaṭṭhānaṃ āgataṃ.
atk-s0402a:727_2: rūpaṃ saddo gandho rasoti imāni nava upādārūpāni,
atk-s0402a:727_3: tesu diṭṭhesu sesaṃ upādārūpaṃ diṭṭhameva hoti.
atk-s0402a:727_7: tena sahajātā vedanādayo tayo arūpakkhandhāti heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva saṅkhepato ca vitthārato ca arahattasampāpakaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a:728_3: vitthārato panetaṃ padaṃ visuddhimagge pakāsitaṃ. Channaṃ,
atk-s0402a:728_7: Yassa hi tathāgato dvādasapadaṃ paccayāvaṭṭaṃ kathetukāmo hoti,
atk-s0402a:728_9: Gabbhāvakkanti vaṭṭasmiṃ hi dassite kathetumpi sukhaṃ hoti paraṃ avabodhe utumpīti sukhāvabodhanatthaṃ idamāraddhanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a:728_10: Tattha channaṃ dhātūnanti heṭṭhā vuttānaṃyeva pathavīdhātuādīnaṃ.
atk-s0402a:728_14: Kassa channaṃ dhātūnaṃ paccayena, kiṃ mātu,
atk-s0402a:728_17: paṭisandhiggaṇhanakasattasseva pana channaṃ dhātūnaṃ paccayena gabbhassāvakkanti nāma hoti.
atk-s0402a:728_18: Gabbho ca nāmesa nirayagabbho tiracchānayonigabbho pettivisayagabbho manussagabbho devagabbhoti nānappakāro hoti.
atk-s0402a:728_20: Avakkanti hotīti okkanti nibbatti pātubhāvo hoti,
atk-s0402a:730_0: Okkantiyā sati nāmarūpanti “viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa”nti vuttaṭṭhāne vatthudasakaṃ kāyadasakaṃ bhāvadasakaṃ
atk-s0402a:730_1: tayo arūpino khandhāti tettiṃsa dhammā gahitā,
atk-s0402a:730_2: imasmiṃ pana “okkantiyā sati nāmarūpa”nti vuttaṭṭhāne viññāṇakkhandhampi pakkhipitvā gabbhaseyyakānaṃ
atk-s0402a:730_4: Nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanantiādīhi yatheva okkantiyā sati nāmarūpapātubhāvo dassito,
atk-s0402a:731_0: Vediyamānassāti ettha vedanaṃ anubhavantopi vediyamānoti vuccati jānantopi.
atk-s0402a:731_2: vediyatīti maṃ saṅgho dhāretū”ti ettha hi anubhavanto vediyamāno nāma,
atk-s0402a:731_3: “sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vediyamāno sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vediyāmīti pajānātī”ti ettha jānanto.
atk-s0402a:731_5: Idaṃ dukkhanti paññapemīti evaṃ jānantassa sattassa “idaṃ dukkhaṃ ettakaṃ dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0402a:731_6: natthi ito uddhaṃ dukkha”nti paññapemi bodhemi jānāpemi.
atk-s0402a:732_1: ṭhapetvā hi taṇhaṃ tebhūmakā pañcakkhandhā dukkhaṃ nāma,
atk-s0402a:732_3: tesaṃ dvinnampi saccānaṃ anuppattinirodho dukkhanirodho nāma,
atk-s0402a:732_4: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā nāma.
atk-s0402a:732_5: Iti bhagavā okkantiyā sati nāmarūpanti kathentopi vediyamānassa jānamānasseva kathesi,
atk-s0402a:732_14: ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti paññapemīti kathentopi vediyamānassa jānamānasseva kathesi.
atk-s0402a:733_0: Idāni tāni paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitāni saccāni vitthārento katamañca,
atk-s0402a:733_5: tattha “dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccaṃ yāyaṃ taṇhā ponobbhavikā”ti imāya tantiyā āgataṃ,
atk-s0402a:733_7: Tattha ca dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ “yo tassāyeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho”ti imāya tantiyā āgataṃ,
atk-s0402a:734_0: Tattha asesavirāganirodhāti asesavirāgena ca asesanirodhena ca.
atk-s0402a:734_4: Imehi pana padehi yaṃ āgamma avijjādayo nirujjhanti,
atk-s0402a:734_6: Nibbānañhi avijjānirodhotipi saṅkhāranirodhotipi evaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ nirodhanāmena kathīyati.
atk-s0402a:734_10: Tattha yasmā avijjādīnaṃ nirodho nāma khīṇākāropi vuccati arahattampi nibbānampi,
atk-s0402a:734_11: tasmā idha khīṇākāradassanavasena dvādasasu ṭhānesu arahattaṃ,
atk-s0402a:734_13: Idaṃ vuccatīti ettha nibbānameva sandhāya idanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a:734_14: Aṭṭhaṅgikoti na aṭṭhahi aṅgehi vinimutto añño maggo nāma atthi.
atk-s0402a:734_15: Yathā pana pañcaṅgikaṃ tūriyanti vutte pañcaṅgamattameva tūriyanti vuttaṃ hoti,
atk-s0402a:734_18: Niggaṇhanto hi hāpetvā vā dasseti vaḍḍhetvā vā taṃ parivattetvā vā.
atk-s0402a:734_19: Tattha yasmā cattāri ariyasaccāni “na imāni cattāri,
atk-s0402a:734_20: dve vā tīṇi vā”ti evaṃ hāpetvāpi “pañca vā cha vā”ti evaṃ vaḍḍhetvāpi “na imāni cattāri ariyasaccāni,
atk-s0402a:734_21: aññāneva cattāri ariyasaccānī”ti dassetuṃ na sakkā.
atk-s0402a:736_1: Dutiye amātāputtikānīti mātā ca putto ca mātāputtaṃ,
atk-s0402a:736_2: parittātuṃ samatthabhāvena natthi ettha mātāputtanti amātāputtikāni.
atk-s0402a:736_4: Tattha mātāpi puttaṃ nappaṭilabhatīti tasmiṃ aggibhaye uppanne mātāpi puttaṃ passituṃ na labhati,
atk-s0402a:736_5: puttopi mātaraṃ passituṃ na labhatīti attho.
atk-s0402a:736_9: Yadā hi te aṭavito janapadaṃ otaritvā gāmanigamarājadhāniyo paharitvā vilumpanti,
atk-s0402a:736_13: Bhayasmiṃ hi sampatte yesaṃ yānakāni atthi,
atk-s0402a:736_14: te attano parikkhārabhaṇḍaṃ tesu āropetvā palāyanti.
atk-s0402a:736_16: te kājena vā ādāya sīsena vā ukkhipitvā palāyantiyeva.
atk-s0402a:736_21: Mātāpi puttaṃ paṭilabhatīti āgacchantaṃ vā gacchantaṃ vā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nilīnaṃ vā passituṃ labhati.
