atk-s0402a:1534_9: tasmā kappo dve kappā cattāro kappāti ayamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0402a:1534_12: so dve vāre gaṇetvā ekena guṇena dve kappā honti,
atk-s0402a:1534_14: puna te cattāro kappāti imehi catūhi guṇehi guṇitā ekena guṇena aṭṭha honti,
atk-s0402a:1534_18: Evamidha paṇītajjhānavasena catusaṭṭhi kappā gahitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0402a:1534_19: Pañca kappasatānīti idaṃ paṇītasseva upapattijjhānassa vasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1534_20: Vehapphalesu vā paṭhamajjhānabhūmiādīsu viya tiṇṇaṃ brahmalokānaṃ abhāvato ettakameva āyuppamāṇaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1536_13: Ettha ca “aniccato palokato”ti dvīhi padehi aniccalakkhaṇaṃ kathitaṃ,

atk-s0402a:1540_2: Kucchiṃ okkamatīti ettha kucchiṃ okkanto hotīti attho.

atk-s0402a:1540_23: Ekekāya disāya nava nava yojanasatasahassāni andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā ālokaṃ dassenti,

atk-s0402a:1541_1: Kiṃ pana kammaṃ katvā tattha uppajjantīti?
atk-s0402a:1541_2: Bhāriyaṃ dāruṇaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇānañca upari aparādhaṃ,
atk-s0402a:1541_3: aññañca divase divase pāṇavadhādisāhasikakammaṃ katvā uppajjanti tambapaṇṇidīpe abhayacoranāgacorādayo viya.
atk-s0402a:1541_6: Te rukkhe vagguliyo viya nakhehi cakkavāḷapabbatapāde lagganti.
atk-s0402a:1541_8: atha “bhakkho no laddho”ti maññamānā tattha byāvaṭā viparivattitvā lokasandhārakaudake patanti,
atk-s0402a:1541_9: vāte paharantepi madhukaphalāni viya chijjitvā udake patanti,
atk-s0402a:1541_10: patitamattāva accantakhāre udake piṭṭhapiṇḍi viya vilīyanti.
atk-s0402a:1541_11: Aññepi kira bho santi sattāti bho yathā mayaṃ mahādukkhaṃ anubhavāma,
atk-s0402a:1541_12: evaṃ aññepi kira sattā idaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavanatthāya idhūpapannāti taṃdivasaṃ passanti.
atk-s0402a:1541_13: Ayaṃ pana obhāso ekayāgupānamattampi na tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0402a:1541_16: Dīghabhāṇakā pana “accharāsaṅghātamattameva vijjuobhāso viya niccharitvā kiṃ idanti bhaṇantānaṃyeva antaradhāyatī”ti vadanti.

atk-s0402a:1545_1: Navame bhikkhuparisā ānandaṃ dassanāyāti ye bhagavantaṃ passitukāmā theraṃ upasaṅkamanti,

atk-s0402a:1547_1: Dasame khattiyaparisāti abhisittā anabhisittā ca khattiyā.
atk-s0402a:1547_2: Te hi kira “rājā cakkavattī nāma abhirūpo pāsādiko hoti,
atk-s0402a:1547_4: dhammiko dhammarājā”ti tassa guṇakathaṃ sutvā savanena dassanamhi samente attamanā honti.

atk-s0402a:1553_1: Catutthassa paṭhame upapattipaṭilābhiyānīti yehi anantarā upapattiṃ paṭilabhati.
atk-s0402a:1553_3: Sakadāgāmissāti idaṃ appahīnasaṃyojanesu ariyesu uttamakoṭiyā gahitaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1553_4: Yasmā pana antarāparinibbāyissa antarā upapatti natthi,
atk-s0402a:1553_5: yaṃ pana so tattha jhānaṃ samāpajjati,
atk-s0402a:1553_6: taṃ kusalattā “upapattibhavassa paccayo” teva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0402a:1553_9: Orambhāgiyesu ca appahīnaṃ upādāya sakadāgāmissa avisesena “orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnānī”ti vuttaṃ.

atk-s0402a:1558_1: yassa puggalassa saha udāhaṭavelāya dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0402a:1558_4: yassa puggalassa vitthārena atthe vibhajiyamāne dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0402a:1558_7: yassa puggalassa uddesato paripucchato yonisomanasikaroto kalyāṇamitte sevato bhajato payirupāsato anupubbena dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0402a:1558_10: yassa puggalassa bahumpi suṇato bahumpi bhaṇato bahumpi dhārayato bahumpi vācayato na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0402a:1560_1: Catutthe uṭṭhānavīriyeneva divasaṃ vītināmetvā tassa nissandaphalamattaṃ kiñcideva labhitvā jīvikaṃ kappeti,
atk-s0402a:1560_2: taṃ pana uṭṭhānaṃ āgamma kiñci puññaphalaṃ nappaṭilabhati,
atk-s0402a:1560_4: Cātumahārājike pana deve ādiṃ katvā sabbepi devā uṭṭhānavīriyena vinā puññaphalasseva upajīvanato kammaphalūpajīvino na uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvino nāma.
atk-s0402a:1564_2: dutiyo sukkhavipassako sotāpanno ca sakadāgāmī ca,
atk-s0402a:1564_4: So hi yasmā taṅkhaṇikampi upapattinimittakaṃ jhānaṃ paṭilabhatiyeva,
atk-s0402a:1564_7: So hi sabbesaṃ sīlādipaccanīkānaṃ pahīnattā sabbattha paripūrakārī nāma.

atk-s0402a:1598_4: Lābhasakkārasilokappaṭilābhāyāti susaṅkhatacatupaccayasaṅkhātassa lābhasakkārassa ceva vaṇṇabhaṇanasaṅkhātassa silokassa ca paṭilābhatthāya.
atk-s0402a:1598_5: Saṅkhāya kulāni upasaṅkamatīti “iti maṃ ete jānissantī”ti jānanatthāya kulāni upasaṅkamati.
atk-s0402a:1602_1: Navame ehi tvanti there paṭibaddhacittā taṃ pahiṇituṃ evamāha.
atk-s0402a:1602_2: Sasīsaṃ pārupitvāti saha sīsena kāyaṃ pārupitvā.
atk-s0402a:1602_3: Mañcake nipajjīti vegena mañcakaṃ paññāpetvā tattha nipajji.
atk-s0402a:1602_4: Etadavocāti tassākāraṃ sallakkhetvā lobhappahānatthāya saṇheneva asubhakathaṃ kathetuṃ etaṃ avoca.
atk-s0402a:1602_5: Āhārasambhūtoti āhārena sambhūto āhāraṃ nissāya vaḍḍhito.
atk-s0402a:1602_6: Āhāraṃ nissāya āhāraṃ pajahatīti paccuppannaṃ kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ nissāya taṃ evaṃ yoniso sevamāno pubbakammasaṅkhātaṃ āhāraṃ pajahati.
atk-s0402a:1603_0: Taṇhaṃ pajahatīti idāni evaṃ pavattaṃ paccuppannataṇhaṃ nissāya vaṭṭamūlikaṃ pubbataṇhaṃ pajahati.
atk-s0402a:1603_1: Ayaṃ pana paccuppannataṇhā kusalā akusalāti? Akusalā.
atk-s0402a:1603_6: Etissāpi pana paccuppannāya sevitabbataṇhāya nikanti pajahitabbāyeva.
atk-s0402a:1603_7: So hi nāma āyasmā āsavānaṃ khayā upasampajja viharissati,
atk-s0402a:1603_8: kimaṅgaṃ panāhanti ettha kimaṅgaṃ panāti kāraṇaparivitakkanametaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1603_11: ahaṃ kena kāraṇena na sacchikatvā viharissāmi.
atk-s0402a:1603_15: Mānaṃ nissāyāti idaṃ evaṃ uppannasevitabbamānaṃ nissāya.
atk-s0402a:1603_18: sopi taṇhā viya akusalo ceva sevitabbo ca,

atk-s0402a:1612_1: Dutiyassa paṭhame sukhapaṭikkhepena dukkhā paṭipajjitabbato paṭipadā etissāti dukkhāpaṭipadā.
atk-s0402a:1612_2: Asīghappavattitāya garubhāvena dandhā abhiññā etissāti dandhābhiññā.
atk-s0402a:1614_5: Paññindriyanti hi ettha vipassanāpaññāva paññindriyanti adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1615_1: idha bhikkhu pubbe akatābhiniveso pubbabhāge rūpapariggahe kilamati,
atk-s0402a:1615_6: Evaṃ pañcasu ṭhānesu kilamanto vipassanaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0402a:1615_15: gotrabhuñāṇeti imesu navasu vipassanāñāṇesupi kilamitvāva lokuttaramaggaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0402a:1615_16: Tassa so lokuttaramaggo evaṃ dukkhena garubhāvena sacchikatattā dukkhapaṭipado dandhābhiñño nāma jāto.
atk-s0402a:1615_17: Yo pana pubbabhāge pañcasu ñāṇesu kilamanto aparabhāge navasu vipassanāñāṇesu akilamitvāva maggaṃ sacchikaroti,
atk-s0402a:1615_18: tassa so maggo evaṃ dukkhena agarubhāvena sacchikatattā dukkhapaṭipado khippābhiñño nāma jāto.
atk-s0402a:1616_1: ekassa hi purisassa cattāro goṇā palāyitvā aṭaviṃ paviṭṭhā.
atk-s0402a:1616_2: So sakaṇṭake sagahane vane te pariyesanto gahanamaggeneva kicchena kasirena gantvā gahanaṭṭhāneyeva nilīne goṇepi kicchena kasirena addasa.
atk-s0402a:1616_3: Eko kicchena gantvā abbhokāse ṭhite khippameva addasa.
atk-s0402a:1616_4: Aparo abbhokāsamaggena sukhena gantvā gahanaṭṭhāne nilīne kicchena kasirena addasa.
atk-s0402a:1616_5: Aparo abbhokāsamaggeneva sukhena gantvā abbhokāse ṭhiteyeva khippaṃ addasa.
atk-s0402a:1616_6: Tattha cattāro goṇā viya cattāro ariyamaggā daṭṭhabbā,

atk-s0402a:1629_4: dutiyamaggādayo pana uppādento tameva āsevati bhāveti bahulīkarotīti vuccati.
atk-s0402a:1629_5: Vipassanāpubbaṅgamanti vipassanaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ purecārikaṃ katvā samathaṃ bhāveti,
atk-s0402a:1629_6: pakatiyā vipassanālābhī vipassanāya ṭhatvā samādhiṃ uppādetīti attho.
atk-s0402a:1630_1: Tattha teneva cittena samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā teneva saṅkhāre sammasituṃ na sakkā.
atk-s0402a:1631_2: samayoti iminā sattannaṃ sappāyānaṃ paṭilābhakālo kathito.
atk-s0402a:1631_3: Yaṃ taṃ cittanti yasmiṃ samaye taṃ vipassanāvīthiṃ okkamitvā pavattaṃ cittaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1631_4: Ajjhattameva santiṭṭhatīti vipassanāvīthiṃ paccottharitvā tasmiṃyeva gocarajjhattasaṅkhāte ārammaṇe santiṭṭhati.
atk-s0402a:1637_3: Kāyasañcetanāhetūtiādīsu kāyasañcetanā nāma kāyadvāre cetanā pakappanā.
atk-s0402a:1637_10: Uppajjati ajjhattaṃ sukhadukkhanti aṭṭhakusalakammapaccayā niyakajjhatte sukhaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0402a:1637_14: Sace hi avijjā chādayamānā paccayo hoti,
atk-s0402a:1637_15: evaṃ sante tīsu dvāresu sukhadukkhānaṃ paccayabhūtā cetanā uppajjati.
atk-s0402a:1638_0: Sāmaṃ vātiādīsu parehi anāṇatto sayameva abhisaṅkharonto sāmaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti nāma.
atk-s0402a:1638_1: Yaṃ pana pare samādapetvā āṇāpetvā kārenti,
atk-s0402a:1638_2: tassa taṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ pare abhisaṅkharonti nāma.
atk-s0402a:1638_3: Yo pana kusalaṃ kusalanti akusalaṃ akusalanti kusalavipākaṃ kusalavipākoti akusalavipākaṃ akusalavipākoti
atk-s0402a:1639_4: tesaṃ kusalanti ajānantānampi taṃ kusalameva hoti.
atk-s0402a:1639_8: tesaṃ jānantānampi ajānantānampi taṃ kusalameva hoti.
atk-s0402a:1639_17: Tesaṃ jānantānampi ajānantānampi akusalakammaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1640_7: Manodvāre pana ekekasmimpi vikappe ekūnatiṃsa katvā satañca soḷasa ca honti.
atk-s0402a:1640_8: Iti sabbāpi tīsu dvāresu dve satāni chasattati ca cetanā.
atk-s0402a:1640_14: tassa paccayā catasso dhātuyo cattāri bhūtānīti ime pañcakkhandhā dukkhasaccaṃ nāma.
atk-s0402a:1641_2: dhammesu avijjā anupatitāti imesu vuttappabhedesu cetanādhammesu avijjā sahajātavasena ca upanissayavasena ca anupatitā.
atk-s0402a:1641_3: Evaṃ vaṭṭañceva vaṭṭamūlikā ca avijjā dassitā hoti.
atk-s0402a:1642_0: Ettāvatā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pattassa khīṇāsavassa idāni thutiṃ karonto avijjāyatveva asesavirāganirodhātiādimāha.
atk-s0402a:1642_1: Tattha asesavirāganirodhāti asesavirāgena ceva asesanirodhena ca.
atk-s0402a:1642_2: So kāyo na hotīti khīṇāsavassa kāyena karaṇakammaṃ paññāyati,
atk-s0402a:1642_3: cetiyaṅgaṇasammajjanaṃ bodhiyaṅgaṇasammajjanaṃ abhikkamanaṃ paṭikkamanaṃ vattānuvattakaraṇanti evamādi.
atk-s0402a:1642_4: Kāyadvāre panassa vīsati cetanā avipākadhammataṃ āpajjanti.
atk-s0402a:1642_7: yaṃ paccayāssa taṃ uppajjati ajjhattaṃ sukhadukkha”nti.
atk-s0402a:1642_8: Kāyadvārappavattā hi cetanā idha kāyoti adhippetā.
atk-s0402a:1643_0: Iti satthā ettakena ṭhānena tīhi dvārehi āyūhitakammaṃ dassetvā idāni tassa kammassa vipaccanaṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ cattārome bhikkhavetiādimāha.
atk-s0402a:1643_2: Attasañcetanā kamatīti attanā pakappitacetanā vahati pavattati.
atk-s0402a:1644_0: Attasañcetanāhetu tesaṃ sattānaṃ tamhā kāyā cuti hotītiādīsu khiḍḍāpadosikā devā attasañcetanāhetu cavanti.
atk-s0402a:1644_1: Tesañhi nandanavanacittalatāvanaphārusakavanādīsu dibbaratisamappitānaṃ kīḷantānaṃ pānabhojane sati sammussati,
atk-s0402a:1644_2: te āhārupacchedena ātape khittamālā viya milāyanti.
atk-s0402a:1644_5: Tesu kira eko devaputto “nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmī”ti saparivāro rathena vīthiṃ paṭipajjati.
atk-s0402a:1644_6: Athañño nikkhamanto taṃ purato gacchantaṃ disvā “kiṃ, bho,
atk-s0402a:1644_7: ayaṃ kapaṇo adiṭṭhapubbaṃ viya etaṃ disvā pītiyā uddhumāto viya gajjamāno viya ca gacchatī”ti kujjhati.
atk-s0402a:1644_8: Purato gacchantopi nivattitvā taṃ kuddhaṃ disvā kuddhā nāma suvijānā hontīti kuddhabhāvamassa ñatvā “tvaṃ kuddho mayhaṃ kiṃ karissasi,
atk-s0402a:1644_9: ayaṃ sampatti mayā dānasīlādīnaṃ vasena laddhā,
atk-s0402a:1644_12: ubhosu pana kuddhesu ekassa kodho itarassa paccayo hoti,
atk-s0402a:1644_13: tassapi kodho itarassa paccayo hotīti ubho kandantānaṃyeva orodhānaṃ cavanti.
atk-s0402a:1644_14: Manussā attasañcetanā ca parasañcetanā ca hetu cavanti,
atk-s0402a:1644_15: attasañcetanāya ca parasañcetanāya ca hetubhūtāya cavantīti attho.
atk-s0402a:1644_16: Manussā hi kujjhitvā attanāva attānaṃ hatthehipi daṇḍehipi paharanti,
atk-s0402a:1644_23: parepi daṇḍena vā satthane vā paharitvā mārenti.
atk-s0402a:1645_0: Katame tena devā daṭṭhabbāti katame nāma te devā daṭṭhabbāti attho.
atk-s0402a:1645_1: Tena vā attabhāvena katame devā daṭṭhabbātipi attho.
atk-s0402a:1645_2: Kasmā pana thero imaṃ pañhaṃ pucchati,
atk-s0402a:1645_4: idaṃ pana padaṃ attano sabhāvena buddhavisayaṃ pañhanti thero na kathesi.
atk-s0402a:1645_6: Ayaṃ pana pañho heṭṭhā kāmāvacarepi rūpāvacarepi labbhati,
atk-s0402a:1645_7: bhavaggena pana paricchinditvā kathito nippadesena kathito hotīti bhagavatā evaṃ kathito.
atk-s0402a:1646_4: tatrūpapattikā vā uparūpapattikā vā tattheva vā parinibbāyino hontīti attho.
atk-s0402a:1646_5: Ettha ca heṭṭhimabhave nibbattānaṃ vasena uparūpapattikā veditabbā.
atk-s0402a:1648_1: Dutiye atthapaṭisambhidāti pañcasu atthesu pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1648_12: So maṃ pañhenāti so maṃ pañhena upagacchatu.
atk-s0402a:1648_13: Ahaṃ veyyākaraṇenāti ahamassa pañhakathanena cittaṃ ārādhessāmi.
atk-s0402a:1648_14: Yo no dhammānaṃ sukusaloti yo amhākaṃ adhigatadhammānaṃ sukusalo satthā,
atk-s0402a:1648_17: “sacchikarohi tāva sāriputtā”ti vatvā maṃ paṭibāhissatīti satthu purato nisinnakova sīhanādaṃ nadati.
atk-s0402a:1648_19: Imāsu ca pana paṭisambhidāsu tisso paṭisambhidā lokiyā,
atk-s0402a:1650_3: Atthaññaṃ kiñcīti etesu asesato niruddhesu tato paraṃ koci appamattakopi kileso atthīti pucchati.
atk-s0402a:1650_4: Natthaññaṃ kiñcīti idhāpi “appamattakopi kileso natthī”ti pucchati.
atk-s0402a:1650_7: Tenassa thero pucchitapucchitaṃ paṭibāhanto mā hevanti āha.
atk-s0402a:1650_10: Attūpaladdhivaseneva “atthaññaṃ kiñci añño koci attā nāma atthī”ti sassatādiākārena pucchati.
atk-s0402a:1650_17: tesaṃ “buddhakālepeso pañho mahāsāvakehi vissajjito”ti vacanokāsupacchedanatthaṃ pucchatiyeva.
atk-s0402a:1651_0: Appapañcaṃ papañcetīti na papañcetabbaṭṭhāne papañcaṃ karoti,
atk-s0402a:1651_2: Tāvatā papañcassa gatīti yattakā channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ gati,
atk-s0402a:1651_3: tattakāva taṇhādiṭṭhimānappabhedassa papañcassa gati. Channaṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0402a:1651_4: phassāyatanānaṃ asesavirāganirodhā papañcanirodho papañcavūpasamoti etesu chasu āyatanesu sabbaso niruddhesu papañcāpi niruddhāva honti,
atk-s0402a:1651_6: Āruppe pana puthujjanadevatānaṃ kiñcāpi pañca phassāyatanāni niruddhāni,
atk-s0402a:1651_7: chaṭṭhassa pana aniruddhattā tayopi papañcā appahīnāva.
atk-s0402a:1653_1: Pañcame vijjāyantakaro hotīti vijjāya vaṭṭadukkhassa antakaro hoti,
atk-s0402a:1653_2: sakalaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ paricchinnaṃ parivaṭumaṃ katvā tiṭṭhatīti.
atk-s0402a:1653_5: Antakaro abhavissāti vaṭṭadukkhassa antaṃ katvā ṭhito abhavissa.
atk-s0402a:1653_7: Yathābhūtaṃ jānaṃ passaṃ antakaro hotīti yathāsabhāvaṃ maggapaññāya jānitvā passitvā vaṭṭadukkhassa antaṃ
atk-s0402a:1653_8: katvā ṭhito nāma hotīti arahattanikūṭena pañhaṃ niṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0402a:1655_1: Sattame ajjhattikāti kesādīsu vīsatiyā koṭṭhāsesu thaddhākāralakkhaṇā pathavīdhātu.
atk-s0402a:1655_2: Bāhirāti bahiddhā anindriyabaddhesu pāsāṇapabbatādīsu thaddhākāralakkhaṇā pathavīdhātu.
atk-s0402a:1655_6: na meso attāti idaṃ tayaṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiggāhapaṭikkhepavasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1655_7: Sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbanti hetunā kāraṇena maggapaññāya passitabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1655_10: Vivattayi saṃyojananti dasavidhampi saṃyojanaṃ vivattayi ubbattetvā pajahi.
atk-s0402a:1655_11: Sammā mānābhisamayāti hetunā kāraṇena navavidhassa mānassa pahānābhisamayā.
atk-s0402a:1655_12: Antamakāsi dukkhassāti vaṭṭadukkhaṃ paricchinnaṃ parivaṭumaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0402a:1655_14: Iti satthārā saṃyuttamahānikāye rāhulovāde vipassanā kathitā,
atk-s0402a:1655_16: ambalaṭṭhikarāhulovāde daharasseva sato musāvādā veramaṇī kathitā,
atk-s0402a:1655_18: Imasmiṃ aṅguttaramahānikāye ayaṃ catukoṭikasuññatā nāma kathitāti.
atk-s0402a:1657_1: Aṭṭhame santaṃ cetovimuttinti aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ aññataraṃ samāpattiṃ.
atk-s0402a:1658_1: eko kira puriso caṇḍasotāya vāḷamacchākulāya nadiyā pāraṃ gantukāmo “orimaṃ tīraṃ sāsaṅkaṃ sappaṭibhayaṃ,
atk-s0402a:1658_3: kiṃ nu kho katvā pāraṃ gamissāmī”ti paṭipāṭiyā ṭhite aṭṭha kakudharukkhe disvā “sakkā imāya rukkhapaṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0402a:1658_5: sākhāya hatthā na saṇṭhaheyyu”nti nigrodhapilakkharukkhādīnaṃ aññatarassa lākhāya hatthapāde makkhetvā dakkhiṇahatthena ekaṃ sākhaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0402a:1658_7: Puna vāmahatthena dakkhiṇapādena vāmapādenāti cattāropi hatthapādā tattheva lagiṃsu.
atk-s0402a:1658_8: So adhosiro lambamāno uparinadiyaṃ deve vuṭṭhe puṇṇāya nadiyā sote nimuggo kumbhīlādīnaṃ bhakkho ahosi.
atk-s0402a:1659_4: paṭipāṭiyā ṭhitā aṭṭha kakudharukkhā viya aṭṭha samāpattiyo,
atk-s0402a:1659_5: lepamakkhitena hatthena sākhāgahaṇaṃ viya jhānavipassanānaṃ pāripanthike asodhetvā samāpattisamāpajjanaṃ,
atk-s0402a:1659_6: catūhi hatthapādehi sākhāya baddhassa olambanaṃ viya paṭhamajjhāne nikantiyā laggakālo,
atk-s0402a:1659_7: uparisote vuṭṭhi viya chasu dvāresu kilesānaṃ uppannakālo,
atk-s0402a:1659_8: nadiyā puṇṇāya sote nimuggassa kumbhīlādīnaṃ bhakkhabhūtakālo viya saṃsārasote nimuggassa catūsu apāyesu dukkhānubhavanakālo veditabbo.
atk-s0402a:1660_2: tatheva hi pāraṃ gantukāmo puriso “kakudharukkhā nāma maṭṭhasākhā,
atk-s0402a:1660_3: kiliṭṭhahatthena gaṇhantassa hattho parigaleyyā”ti hatthapāde sudhote katvā ekaṃ sākhaṃ gaṇhitvā paṭhamaṃ rukkhaṃ āruḷho.
atk-s0402a:1661_0: Tattha “imehi rukkhehi pārimatīraṃ gamissāmī”ti tassa purisassa cintitakālo viya yogino “aṭṭha samāpattiyo
atk-s0402a:1661_1: samāpajjitvā samāpattito vuṭṭhāya arahattaṃ gamissāmī”ti cintitakālo,
atk-s0402a:1661_2: suddhena hatthena sākhāgahaṇaṃ viya jhānavipassanānaṃ pāripanthikadhamme sodhetvā samāpattisamāpajjanaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1661_4: paṭhamarukkhato oruyha dutiyaṃ āruḷhakālo viya paṭhamajjhāne nikantiyā abaddhassa tato vuṭṭhāya dutiyajjhānasamāpannakālo…pe…
atk-s0402a:1661_5: sattamarukkhato oruyha aṭṭhamaṃ āruḷhakālo viya ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattiyaṃ nikantiyā abaddhassa tato vuṭṭhāya nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpannakālo.
atk-s0402a:1661_6: Aṭṭhamarukkhato oruyha pārimatīraṃ khemantabhūmiṃ gatakālo viya nevasaññānāsaññāyatane nikantiyā abaddhassa
atk-s0402a:1661_7: samāpattito vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre sammasitvā arahattappattakālo veditabbo.
atk-s0402a:1662_0: Avijjāppabhedaṃ manasi karotīti aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu aññāṇabhūtāya gaṇabahalamahāavijjāya pabhedasaṅkhātaṃ arahattaṃ manasi karoti.
atk-s0402a:1662_2: Jambālīti gāmato nikkhantassa mahāudakassa patiṭṭhānabhūto mahāāvāṭo.
atk-s0402a:1662_3: Anekavassagaṇikāti gāmassa vā nagarassa vā uppannakāleyeva uppannattā anekāni vassagaṇāni uppannāya etissāti anekavassagaṇikā.
atk-s0402a:1662_6: Na āḷippabhedo pāṭikaṅkhoti na pāḷippabhedo pāṭikaṅkhitabbo.
atk-s0402a:1662_7: Na hi tato udakaṃ uṭṭhāya pāḷiṃ bhinditvā kacavaraṃ gahetvā mahāsamuddaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0402a:1663_1: Eko kira nagaravāsiko kulaputto uyyānaṃ gavesanto nagarato nātidūre naccāsanne mahantaṃ jambāliṃ addasa.
atk-s0402a:1663_2: So “imasmiṃ ṭhāne ramaṇīyaṃ uyyānaṃ bhavissatī”ti sallakkhetvā kuddālaṃ ādāya cattāripi kandarāni pidhāya apavāhanacchiddāni vivaritvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0402a:1663_9: So katipāhena āgantvā paṭikkamma ṭhito oloketvā “na sakkā upagantu”nti pakkāmi.
atk-s0402a:1664_0: Tattha nagaravāsī kulaputto viya yogāvacaro daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0402a:1664_1: uyyānaṃ gavesantena gāmadvāre jambāliyā diṭṭhakālo viya cātumahābhūtikakāyo,
atk-s0402a:1664_4: devassa sammā avuṭṭhakālo viya sappāyakammaṭṭhānassa aladdhakālo,
atk-s0402a:1664_5: avasesaudakassa apāyamukhehi parissavitvā gatakālo viya abbhantare guṇānaṃ parihīnakālo,
atk-s0402a:1664_6: udakassa uṭṭhāya pāḷiṃ bhinditvā kacavaraṃ ādāya mahāsamuddaṃ pāpuṇituṃ asamatthakālo viya arahattamaggena
atk-s0402a:1664_7: avijjāpāḷiṃ bhinditvā kilesarāsiṃ vidhamitvā nibbānaṃ sacchikātuṃ asamatthakālo,
atk-s0402a:1664_8: cammakhaṇḍapilotikādīnaṃ tattheva pūtibhāvo viya abbhantare rāgādikilesehi paripūritakālo,
atk-s0402a:1664_9: tassa āgantvā disvā vippaṭisārino gatakālo viya vaṭṭasamaṅgipuggalassa vaṭṭe abhiratakālo veditabbo.
atk-s0402a:1665_1: Tato hi udakaṃ uṭṭhāya pāḷiṃ bhinditvā kacavaraṃ ādāya mahāsamuddaṃ pāpuṇituṃ sakkhissatīti attho.
atk-s0402a:1666_1: Tattha āyamukhānaṃ vivaṭakālo viya sappāyadhammassavanassa laddhakālo,
atk-s0402a:1666_2: apāyamukhānaṃ pihitakālo viya chasu dvāresu saṃvarassa paccupaṭṭhitakālo,
atk-s0402a:1666_3: devassa sammā vuṭṭhakālo viya sappāyakammaṭṭhānassa laddhakālo,
atk-s0402a:1666_4: udakassa uṭṭhāya pāḷiṃ bhinditvā kacavaraṃ ādāya mahāsamuddaṃ pattakālo viya arahattamaggena avijjaṃ
atk-s0402a:1666_6: āyamukhehi paviṭṭhena udakena sarassa paripuṇṇakālo viya abbhantare lokuttaradhammehi paripuṇṇakālo,
atk-s0402a:1666_7: samantato vatiṃ katvā rukkhe ropetvā uyyānamajjhe pāsādaṃ māpetvā nāṭakāni paccupaṭṭhapetvā subhojanaṃ
atk-s0402a:1666_8: bhuñjantassa nisinnakālo viya dhammapāsādaṃ āruyha nibbānārammaṇaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā nisinnakālo
atk-s0402a:1668_1: Navame hānabhāgiyā saññātiādīsu “paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhiṃ kāmasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti,
atk-s0402a:1668_2: hānabhāginī paññā”ti abhidhamme vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a:1668_3: Yathābhūtaṃ nappajānantīti yathāsabhāvato maggañāṇena na jānanti.
atk-s0402a:1670_1: Dasame bhoganagare viharatīti parinibbānasamaye cārikaṃ caranto taṃ nagaraṃ patvā tattha viharati.
atk-s0402a:1670_4: buddhādayo mahante mahante apadisitvā vuttāni mahākāraṇānīti attho.
atk-s0402a:1670_5: Neva abhinanditabbanti haṭṭhatuṭṭhehi sādhukāraṃ datvā pubbeva na sotabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1670_6: Evaṃ kate hi pacchā “idaṃ na sametī”ti vuccamānopi “kiṃ pubbeva ayaṃ dhammo,
atk-s0402a:1670_7: idāni na dhammo”ti vatvā laddhiṃ na vissajjeti.
atk-s0402a:1670_8: Nappaṭikkositabbanti “kiṃ esa bālo vadatī”ti evaṃ pubbeva na vattabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1670_9: Evaṃ vutte hi vattuṃ yuttampi na vakkhati. Tenāha –
atk-s0402a:1670_15: imasmiṃ ṭhāne pubbāparaṃ kathita”nti suṭṭhu gahetvā.
atk-s0402a:1671_0: Ettha ca suttanti vinayo vutto. Yathāha –
atk-s0402a:1671_8: vinayapiṭakaṃ vinayoti evaṃ dveyeva piṭakāni pariyādiyanti.
atk-s0402a:1671_10: vinayapiṭakaṃ vinayoti evampi tīṇi piṭakāni na tāva pariyādiyanti.
atk-s0402a:1671_13: jātakaṃ paṭisambhidā niddeso suttanipāto dhammapadaṃ udānaṃ itivuttakaṃ vimānavatthu petavatthu theragāthā therīgāthā apadānanti.
atk-s0402a:1672_0: Sudinnatthero pana “asuttanāmakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ natthī”ti taṃ sabbaṃ paṭikkhipitvā “tīṇi piṭakāni suttaṃ,
atk-s0402a:1672_2: Tato taṃ kāraṇaṃ dassento idaṃ suttamāhari –
atk-s0402a:1673_2: ime dhammā sarāgāya saṃvattanti no virāgāya,
atk-s0402a:1673_9: ācayāya saṃvattanti no apacayāya. Ekaṃsena, gotami,
atk-s0402a:1673_10: jāneyyāsi ‘neso dhammo neso vinayo netaṃ satthu sāsana’nti.
atk-s0402a:1674_2: ime dhammā virāgāya saṃvattanti no sarāgāya,
atk-s0402a:1674_9: apacayāya saṃvattanti no ācayāya. Ekaṃsena, gotami,
atk-s0402a:1674_10: jāneyyāsi ‘eso dhammo eso vinayo etaṃ satthu sāsana”’nti.
atk-s0402a:1675_1: Vinayeti etasmiṃ rāgādivinayakāraṇe saṃsandetabbānīti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0402a:1675_2: Na ceva sutte otarantīti suttapaṭipāṭiyā katthaci anāgantvā challiṃ uṭṭhapetvā guḷhavessantara-
atk-s0402a:1675_5: Evaṃ āgatāni hi rāgādivinaye ca apaññāyamānāni chaḍḍetabbāni honti.
atk-s0402a:1681_1: Catutthassa paṭhame ṭhānakusaloti yena ṭhānena ṭhito avirādhetvā vijjhituṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0402a:1683_1: Dutiye natthi koci pāṭibhogoti ahaṃ te pāṭibhogoti evaṃ pāṭibhogo bhavituṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0402a:1685_0: 183. Tatiye natthi tato dosoti tasmiṃ doso nāma natthīti attho.
atk-s0402a:1687_12: Kaṅkhī hotīti buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇesu ceva sikkhāya ca pubbante ca aparante ca pubbantāparante ca paṭiccasamuppāde
atk-s0402a:1687_13: cāti aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu kaṅkhāya samannāgato hoti.
atk-s0402a:1687_14: Vicikicchīti vicikicchāya samannāgato sāsanasaddhamme na niṭṭhaṃ gato,
atk-s0402a:1689_2: So tena na samaṇoti maññatīti so khīṇāsavo tena saccena “ahaṃ samaṇo”ti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhīhi na maññati.
atk-s0402a:1689_5: tadabhiññāyāti yaṃ tattha “sabbe pāṇā avajjhā”ti paṭipattiyā saccaṃ tathaṃ aviparītaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1689_6: Iminā vacīsaccaṃ abbhantaraṃ katvā paramatthasaccaṃ nibbānaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0402a:1689_7: Tadabhiññāyāti taṃ ubhayampi abhivisiṭṭhāya paññāya jānitvā.
atk-s0402a:1689_8: Anuddayāya anukampāya paṭipanno hotīti anuddayatthāya ca anukampatthāya ca yā paṭipadā,
atk-s0402a:1690_1: Iti vadaṃ brāhmaṇo saccamāhāti evampi vadanto khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇo saccameva āha.
atk-s0402a:1690_3: Nāhaṃ kvacanīti ettha pana catukkoṭikasuññatā kathitā.
atk-s0402a:1690_4: Ayañhi “nāhaṃ kvacanī”ti kvaci attānaṃ na passati,
atk-s0402a:1690_5: kassaci kiñcanatasminti attano attānaṃ kassaci parassa kiñcanabhāve upanetabbaṃ na passati,
atk-s0402a:1690_8: parikkhāraṭṭhāne vā parikkhāraṃ maññitvā upanetabbaṃ na passatīti attho.
atk-s0402a:1690_9: Na ca mama kvacanīti ettha mamasaddaṃ tāva ṭhapetvā “na ca kvacani parassa ca attānaṃ kvaci na passatī”ti ayamattho.
atk-s0402a:1690_10: Idāni “mamasaddaṃ āharitvā mama kismiñci kiñcanaṃ natthī”ti so parassa attā mama kismiñci kiñcanabhāve atthīti na passati,
atk-s0402a:1690_13: parikkhāraṭṭhāne vā parikkhāranti kismiñci ṭhāne parassa attānaṃ iminā kiñcanabhāvena upanetabbaṃ na passatīti attho.
atk-s0402a:1690_14: Evamayaṃ yasmā neva katthaci attānaṃ passati,
atk-s0402a:1690_15: na taṃ parassa kiñcanabhāve upanetabbaṃ passati,
atk-s0402a:1690_17: na parassa attānaṃ attano kiñcanabhāve upanetabbaṃ passatīti.
atk-s0402a:1690_18: Iti vadaṃ brāhmaṇoti evaṃ catukkoṭikaṃ suññataṃ vadantopi khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇo tassā paṭipadāya sammā paṭividdhattā saccameva āha,
atk-s0402a:1690_19: na musāti sabbesupi vāresu maññanānaṃ pahīnattāyeva na maññatīti ca attho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a:1690_20: Ākiñcaññaṃyeva paṭipadanti kiñcanabhāvavirahitaṃ nippalibodhaṃ niggahaṇameva paṭipadaṃ paṭipanno hoti pūretvā ṭhito.
atk-s0402a:1691_0: Imāni kho paribbājakā cattāri brāhmaṇasaccāni mayā sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā paveditānīti yāni tumhe bhovādibrāhmaṇānaṃ saccāni vadetha,
atk-s0402a:1691_1: tehi aññāni mayā imāni bāhitapāpabrāhmaṇassa cattāri saccāni catūhi maggehi soḷasavidhena kiccena jānitvā
atk-s0402a:1691_2: paccakkhaṃ katvā paveditāni desitāni jotitānīti attho.
atk-s0402a:1691_3: Iti imasmiṃ sutte catūsupi ṭhānesu khīṇāsavassa vacīsaccameva kathitanti.
atk-s0402a:1693_4: Paññā eva vā ummujjanaṭṭhena ummaggoti vuccati.
atk-s0402a:1693_6: Cittassa uppannassa vasaṃ gacchatīti ye cittassa vasaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0402a:1693_9: Dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hotīti lokuttaradhammassa anucchavikadhammaṃ saha sīlena pubbabhāgappaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno hoti.
atk-s0402a:1693_11: Idaṃ dukkhanti ṭhapetvā taṇhaṃ sesaṃ tebhūmakakkhandhapañcakaṃ dukkhanti sutaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a:1693_13: Ayaṃ dukkhasamudayoti vaṭṭamūlakataṇhā tassa dukkhassa samudayoti sutaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a:1695_4: Bālo ayaṃ rājātiādi yaṃ te upārambhaṃ vattenti,
atk-s0402a:1695_19: Iminā nayena netīti iminā kāraṇena anuneti jānāpeti.
atk-s0402a:1695_20: Karaṇīyādhikaraṇīyesūti paṇḍitehi kattabbakiccesu ca atirekakattabbakiccesu ca.
atk-s0402a:1695_22: Alamatthadasatarehīti ettha atthe passituṃ samatthā alamatthadasā,
atk-s0402a:1695_26: chekehi chekataro paṇḍitehi paṇḍitataroti pucchanto evamāha.
atk-s0402a:1695_28: Iti brāhmaṇo attano sappurisatāya taṃ eḷeyyarājānampi tassa parivārikepi udakampi rāmaputtaṃ pasaṃsi.
atk-s0402a:1695_31: Yathā andho neva anandhaṃ na andhaṃ passati,
atk-s0402a:1695_32: evaṃ asappuriso neva sappurisaṃ na asappurisaṃ jānāti.
atk-s0402a:1695_35: Todeyyopi sappurisatāya asappurise aññāsīti imamatthavasaṃ paṭicca tuṭṭhamānaso brāhmaṇo acchariyaṃ bho,
atk-s0402a:1695_36: gotamātiādīni vatvā tathāgatassa bhāsitaṃ anumoditvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0402a:1697_4: “kiṃ nu kho satthā mayi attano santikaṃ upagate vaṇṇaṃ kathessati,
atk-s0402a:1697_6: “Nerayiko devadatto kappaṭṭho atekiccho”ti vacanaṃ sutvā satthāraṃ ghaṭṭetukāmo upasaṅkamītipi vadanti.
atk-s0402a:1697_8: Sabbo so na upapādetīti sabbopi so kusaladhammaṃ na uppādeti,
atk-s0402a:1697_9: attano vā vacanaṃ upapādetuṃ anucchavikaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0402a:1697_10: Anupapādento gārayho hotīti kusalaṃ dhammaṃ uppādetuṃ asakkonto attano ca vacanaṃ upapannaṃ anucchavikaṃ kātuṃ asakkonto gārayho hoti.
atk-s0402a:1698_0: Atha bhagavā tassa vādaṃ gahetvā tasseva gīvāya paṭimuñcanto parūpārambhantiādimāha.
atk-s0402a:1698_2: Tattha aparimāṇā padātiādīsu tasmiṃ akusalanti paññāpane padānipi akkharānipi dhammadesanāpi aparimāṇāyeva.
atk-s0402a:1698_3: Itipidaṃ akusalanti idampi akusalaṃ idampi akusalaṃ imināpi kāraṇena imināpi kāraṇena akusalanti evaṃ akusalapaññattiyaṃ āgatānipi aparimāṇāni.
atk-s0402a:1698_4: Athāpi aññenākārena tathāgato taṃ dhammaṃ deseyya,
atk-s0402a:1698_9: Yāva dhaṃsī vatāyanti yāva guṇadhaṃsī vata ayaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1698_11: Yatra hi nāmāti yo hi nāma.
atk-s0402a:1698_15: Evañca pana vatvā gīvāya gaṇhāpetvā nikkaḍḍhāpesiyevāti.
atk-s0402a:1700_10: Āsavānaṃ khayasaṅkhātaṃ pana arahattaṃ paccavekkhaṇavasena paccavekkhaṇapaññāya sacchikaraṇīyaṃ nāmāti.
atk-s0402a:1702_1: Dasame tuṇhībhūtaṃ tuṇhībhūtanti yato yato anuviloketi,
atk-s0402a:1702_3: Bhikkhū āmantesīti paṭipattisampanne bhikkhū pasannehi cakkhūhi anuviloketvā uppannadhammapāmojjo thometukāmatāya āmantesi.
atk-s0402a:1703_0: Idāni evarūpehi evarūpehi ca guṇehi samannāgatā ettha bhikkhū atthīti dassetuṃ santi bhikkhavetiādimāha.
atk-s0402a:1703_1: Tattha devappattāti upapattidevanibbattakaṃ dibbavihāraṃ dibbavihārena ca arahattaṃ pattā.
atk-s0402a:1703_2: Brahmappattāti niddosaṭṭhena brahmabhāvasādhakaṃ brahmavihāraṃ brahmavihārena ca arahattaṃ pattā.
atk-s0402a:1703_3: Āneñjappattāti aniñjanabhāvasādhakaṃ āneñjaṃ āneñjena ca arahattaṃ pattā.
atk-s0402a:1703_4: Ariyappattāti puthujjanabhāvaṃ atikkamma ariyabhāvaṃ pattā. Evaṃ kho,
atk-s0402a:1703_6: bhikkhu devappatto hotītiādīsu evaṃ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhāne ṭhatvā cittaṃ vivaṭṭetvā arahattaṃ patto devappatto nāma hoti,
atk-s0402a:1703_7: catūsu brahmavihāresu ṭhatvā cittaṃ vivaṭṭetvā arahattaṃ patto brahmappatto nāma,
atk-s0402a:1703_8: catūsu arūpajjhānesu ṭhatvā cittaṃ vivaṭṭetvā arahattaṃ patto āneñjappatto nāma.
atk-s0402a:1703_9: Idaṃ dukkhantiādīhi catūhi saccehi cattāro maggā tīṇi ca phalāni kathitāni.
atk-s0402a:1703_10: Tasmā imaṃ ariyadhammaṃ patto bhikkhu ariyappatto nāma hotīti.
atk-s0402a:1709_1: Pañcamassa paṭhame sotānugatānanti pasādasotaṃ odahitvā ñāṇasotena vavatthapitānaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1709_2: Cattāro ānisaṃsā pāṭikaṅkhāti cattāro guṇānisaṃsā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā.
atk-s0402a:1709_6: Pañcasatā kira brāhmaṇapabbajitā “sammāsambuddho liṅgavacanavibhattipadabyañjanādīhi kathento amhehi ñātameva kathessati,
atk-s0402a:1709_7: aññātaṃ kiṃ kathessatī”ti dhammassavanatthaṃ na gacchanti.
atk-s0402a:1709_8: Satthā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā te pakkosāpetvā “kasmā evaṃ karotha,
atk-s0402a:1709_10: sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ suṇantānañca sajjhāyantānañca ime ettakā ānisaṃsā”ti dassento imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0402a:1710_0: Tattha dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇātīti suttaṃ geyyantiādikaṃ navaṅgaṃ satthusāsanabhūtaṃ tantidhammaṃ vaḷañjeti.
atk-s0402a:1710_1: Sotānugatā hontīti sotaṃ anuppattā anupaviṭṭhā honti.
atk-s0402a:1710_3: Diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhāti atthato ca kāraṇato ca paññāya suṭṭhu paṭividdhā paccakkhaṃ katā.
atk-s0402a:1710_4: Muṭṭhassati kālaṃ kurumānoti nayidaṃ buddhavacanaṃ anussaraṇasatiyā abhāvena vuttaṃ,
atk-s0402a:1710_6: Puthujjano hi muṭṭhassati kālaṃ karoti nāma.
atk-s0402a:1710_10: te sabbe pasanne ādāse chāyā viya plavanti,
atk-s0402a:1710_14: Atha so satto khippaṃyeva visesagāmī hoti,
atk-s0402a:1711_0: Iddhimā cetovasippattoti iddhisampanno cittassa vasibhāvapatto khīṇāsavo.
atk-s0402a:1711_1: Ayaṃ vā so dhammavinayoti ettha vibhāvanattho vā- saddo.
atk-s0402a:1711_4: Idampi buddhavacanaṃ mayā pubbe vaḷañjitanti buddhavacanānussaraṇavasenetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1711_5: Devaputtoti pañcālacaṇḍo viya hatthakamahābrahmā viya sanaṅkumārabrahmā viya ca eko dhammakathikadevaputto.
atk-s0402a:1711_6: Opapātiko opapātikaṃ sāretīti paṭhamaṃ uppanno devaputto pacchā uppannaṃ sāreti.
atk-s0402a:1711_7: Sahapaṃsukīḷikāti etena nesaṃ dīgharattaṃ kataparicayabhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0402a:1711_8: Samāgaccheyyunti sālāya vā rukkhamūle vā sammukhībhāvaṃ gaccheyyuṃ.
atk-s0402a:1711_9: Evaṃ vadeyyāti sālāya vā rukkhamūle vā paṭhamataraṃ nisinno pacchā āgataṃ evaṃ vadeyya.
atk-s0402a:1713_6: Na santatavutti sīlesūti satataṃ sabbakālaṃ sīlajīvitaṃ na jīvatīti attho.
atk-s0402a:1713_8: Ekena eko voharatīti ekena saddhiṃ eko hutvā katheti.
atk-s0402a:1713_12: pacchimakathāya ca purimakathā na sametīti attho.
atk-s0402a:1714_3: Rogabyasane pana rogoyeva ārogyavināsanato byasanaṃ rogabyasanaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1714_5: Lābho cātiādīsu ekaṃ attabhāvaṃ lābho anuparivattati,
atk-s0402a:1714_12: Santanti paccanīkasantatāya santaṃ katvā na kathetīti attho.
atk-s0402a:1714_14: Atakkāvacaranti yathā takkena nayaggāhena gahetuṃ sakkā hoti,
atk-s0402a:1716_1: Tatiye upasaṅkamīti bhuttapātarāso hutvā mālāgandhavilepanaṃ gahetvā bhagavantaṃ vandissāmīti upasaṅkami.
atk-s0402a:1716_2: Mā anussavenātiādīsu anussavavacanena mama kathaṃ mā gaṇhathāti iminā nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a:1716_6: paṭilābhatthāyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Ime cepi, bhaddiya,
atk-s0402a:1716_7: mahāsālāti purato ṭhite sālarukkhe dassento evamāha.
atk-s0402a:1716_8: Sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānatthattā ca suviññeyyameva.
atk-s0402a:1716_9: Satthari pana desanaṃ vinivaṭṭente bhaddiyo sotāpanno jātoti.
atk-s0402a:1718_3: Kolanagarassa hi kolarukkhe hāretvā katattā kolanagaranti ca byagghapathe māpitattā byagghapajjanti ca dve nāmāni.
atk-s0402a:1718_4: Etesañca pubbapurisā tattha vasiṃsūti byagghapajjavāsitāya byagghapajjavāsino byagghapajjāti vuccanti.
atk-s0402a:1718_11: Tattha tattha paññāya anuggahessāmīti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne vipassanāpaññāya anuggahessāmi.
atk-s0402a:1718_12: Yo tattha chandotiādīsu yo tasmiṃ anuggaṇhane kattukāmatāchandoti iminā nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a:1718_13: Satisampajaññaṃ panettha satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā ñāṇena paricchinditvā vīriyapaggahanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1718_14: Rajanīyesu dhammesu cittaṃ virājetīti rāgapaccayesu iṭṭhārammaṇesu yathā cittaṃ virajjati,
atk-s0402a:1718_16: Vimocanīyesu dhammesu cittaṃ vimocetīti yehi ārammaṇehi cittaṃ vimocetabbaṃ,
atk-s0402a:1718_22: Sammāvimuttiṃ phusatīti hetunā nayena arahattaphalavimuttiṃ ñāṇaphassena phusatīti.
atk-s0402a:1720_2: Nigaṇṭhasāvakoti vesāliyaṃ sīhasenāpati viya nāḷandāyaṃ upāligahapati viya ca nigaṇṭhassa nāṭaputtassa upaṭṭhāko.
atk-s0402a:1720_3: Kāyena saṃvutoti kāyadvārassa saṃvutattā pihitattā kāyena saṃvuto nāma.
atk-s0402a:1720_10: Dukkhavedaniyā āsavā assaveyyunti dukkhavedanāya paccayabhūtā kilesā assaveyyuṃ,
atk-s0402a:1720_17: Phussa phussa byantīkarotīti ñāṇavajjhaṃ kammaṃ ñāṇaphassena phusitvā phusitvā khayaṃ gameti,
atk-s0402a:1720_18: vipākavajjhaṃ kammaṃ vipākaphassena phusitvā phusitvā khayaṃ gameti.
atk-s0402a:1720_21: Idha ṭhatvā ayaṃ bhikkhu khīṇāsavo kātabbo,
atk-s0402a:1720_22: cattāri mahābhūtāni nīharitvā catusaccavavatthānaṃ dassetvā yāva arahattaphalaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1721_0: Idāni pana tassa khīṇāsavassa satatavihāre dassetuṃ evaṃ sammā vimuttacittassātiādimāha.
atk-s0402a:1721_1: Tattha sammā vimuttacittassāti hetunā kāraṇena sammā vimuttassa.
atk-s0402a:1721_3: Neva sumano hotīti iṭṭhārammaṇe rāgavasena na somanassajāto hoti.
atk-s0402a:1721_4: Na dummanoti aniṭṭhārammaṇe paṭighavasena na domanassajāto hoti.
atk-s0402a:1721_5: Upekkhako viharati sato sampajānoti satisampajaññapariggahitāya majjhattākāralakkhaṇāya upekkhāya tesu ārammaṇesu upekkhako majjhatto hutvā viharati.
atk-s0402a:1722_6: Tattha pañcadvārikavedanā pacchā uppajjitvā paṭhamaṃ nirujjhati,
atk-s0402a:1722_9: Pañcadvārikā pavatte pañcadvāravasena pavattamānā paṭhamavaye vīsativassakāle rajjanadussanamuyhanavasena adhimattā balavatī hoti,
atk-s0402a:1722_13: Tadā hi sattā “cirarattaṃ ekato nisīdimhā nipajjimhā”ti vadantepi na jānāmāti vadanti.
atk-s0402a:1722_15: sugandhaduggandhaṃ vā sāduasāduṃ vā thaddhamudukaṃ vāti na jānāmātipi vadanti.
atk-s0402a:1722_18: Sāpi anupubbena parihāyamānā maraṇasamaye hadayakoṭiṃyeva nissāya pavattati.
atk-s0402a:1723_1: yathā hi puriso pañcaudakamaggasampannaṃ vāpiṃ kareyya.
atk-s0402a:1723_2: Paṭhamaṃ deve vuṭṭhe pañcahi udakamaggehi udakaṃ pavisitvā antovāpiyaṃ āvāṭe pūreyya.
atk-s0402a:1723_3: Punappunaṃ deve vassante udakamagge pūretvā gāvutaḍḍhayojanamattaṃ ottharitvā udakaṃ tiṭṭheyya tato tato vissandamānaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1723_4: Atha niddhamanatumbe vivaritvā khettesu kamme kayiramāne udakaṃ nikkhamantaṃ,
atk-s0402a:1723_9: tāva mahāvāpiyaṃ udakaṃ atthīti saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0402a:1724_0: Paṭhamaṃ deve vassante pañcahi maggehi udake pavisante āvāṭānaṃ pūraṇakālo viya hi paṭhamameva paṭisandhikkhaṇe
atk-s0402a:1724_2: punappunaṃ deve vassante pañcamaggānaṃ pūraṇakālo viya pavatte pañcadvārikavedanāya pavatti,
atk-s0402a:1724_3: gāvutaḍḍhayojanamattaṃ ajjhottharaṇaṃ viya paṭhamavaye vīsativassakāle rajjanādivasena tassa adhimattabalavabhāvo,
atk-s0402a:1724_5: tāva pūrāya vāpiyā ṭhitakālo viya paññāsavassakāle tassa ṭhitakālo,
atk-s0402a:1724_6: niddhamanatumbesu vivaṭesu kamme kayiramāne udakassa nikkhamanakālo viya saṭṭhivassakālato paṭṭhāya tassa parihāni,
atk-s0402a:1724_7: udake bhaṭṭhe udakamaggesu parittaudakassa ṭhitakālo viya asītinavutikāle pañcadvārikavedanāya mandakālo,
atk-s0402a:1724_8: āvāṭesuyeva udakassa patiṭṭhitakālo viya hadayavatthukoṭiṃ nissāya manodvāre vedanāya pavattikālo,
atk-s0402a:1724_9: āvāṭesu parittepi udake sati “vāpiyaṃ udakaṃ atthī”ti vattabbakālo viya yāva sā pavattati,
atk-s0402a:1724_11: Yathā pana āvāṭesu udake chinne “natthi vāpiyaṃ udaka”nti vuccati,
atk-s0402a:1724_12: evaṃ manodvārikavedanāya appavattamānāya satto matoti vuccati.
atk-s0402a:1725_3: Sītī bhavissantīti pavattivipphandanadaratharahitāni sītāni appavattanadhammāni bhavissanti.
atk-s0402a:1726_1: Kuddālapiṭakaṃ ādāyāti kuddālañca khaṇittiñca pacchiñca gahetvāti attho.
atk-s0402a:1727_2: rukkhaṃ paṭicca chāyā viya kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ,
atk-s0402a:1727_3: chāyaṃ appavattaṃ kātukāmo puriso viya yogāvacaro,
atk-s0402a:1727_7: khaṇittiyā mūlānaṃ palikhaṇanakālo viya arahattamaggena avijjāya chedanakālo,
atk-s0402a:1727_11: vātātapena visosanakālo viya kāyikacetasikassa vīriyassa karaṇakālo,
atk-s0402a:1727_12: agginā ḍahanakālo viya ñāṇena kilesānaṃ ḍahanakālo,
atk-s0402a:1727_15: mahāvāte ophunanakālo viya nadīsote pavāhanakālo viya ca chinnamūlakānaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ appaṭisandhikanirodho,
atk-s0402a:1727_16: ophunanappavāhanehi apaññattikabhāvūpagamo viya punabbhave vipākakkhandhānaṃ anuppādena apaṇṇattikabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0402a:1728_0: Bhagavantaṃ etadavocāti satthari desanaṃ vinivaṭṭente sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā etaṃ “seyyathāpi,
atk-s0402a:1728_3: Assapaṇiyaṃ poseyyāti pañca assapotasatāni kiṇitvā pacchā vikkiṇissāmīti poseyya.
atk-s0402a:1728_4: Sahassagghanakassa assassa pañcasatamattaṃ upakaraṇaṃ gandhamālādivasena posāvanikaṃyeva agamāsi.
atk-s0402a:1728_5: Athassa te assā ekadivaseneva rogaṃ phusitvā sabbe jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇeyyunti iminā adhippāyena evamāha.
atk-s0402a:1728_6: Udayañceva nādhigaccheyyāti vaḍḍhiñca gehato nīharitvā dinnamūlañca kiñci na labheyya.
atk-s0402a:1728_8: Svāhaṃ udayañceva nādhigacchinti so ahaṃ neva udayaṃ na gehato dinnadhanaṃ adhigacchiṃ,
atk-s0402a:1730_5: Aparisuddhakāyasamācārātiādīsu purimehi tīhi padehi kāyikavācasikacetasikasīlānaṃ aparisuddhataṃ dassetvā
atk-s0402a:1731_3: pāraṃ gantukāmapuriso viya dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo gahetvā ṭhitapuriso,
atk-s0402a:1731_4: sālalaṭṭhiyā bahiddhā suparikammakatakālo viya bahiddhā tapacaraṇaṃ gāḷhaṃ katvā gahitakālo,
atk-s0402a:1731_5: anto asuddhakālo viya abbhantare sīlānaṃ aparisuddhakālo,
atk-s0402a:1731_6: sālalaṭṭhiyā saṃsīditvā adhogamanaṃ viya diṭṭhigatikassa saṃsārasote saṃsīdanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1732_5: bahiddhā suparikammakatakālo viya chasu dvāresu saṃvarassa paccupaṭṭhitakālo,
atk-s0402a:1732_8: sotthinā pārimatīragamanaṃ viya anupubbena sīlaṃ pūretvā samādhiṃ pūretvā paññaṃ pūretvā nibbānagamanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1733_1: Atha kho so tīhi ṭhānehīti so evaṃ bahūni kaṇḍacitrakāni jānantopi na rājāraho hoti,
atk-s0402a:1733_3: Sammāsamādhi hotīti maggasamādhinā ca phalasamādhinā ca samāhito hotīti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0402a:1733_5: Idaṃ dukkhantiādīhi catūhi saccehi cattāro maggā tīṇi ca phalāni kathitāni.
atk-s0402a:1733_6: Ayaṃ pana maggeneva avirādhitaṃ vijjhati nāmāti veditabbo.
atk-s0402a:1733_8: Avijjākkhandhaṃ padāletīti arahattamaggena padāleti nāmāti vuccati.
atk-s0402a:1733_9: Iminā hi heṭṭhā arahattamaggena avijjākkhandho padālito,
atk-s0402a:1733_10: idha pana padālitaṃ upādāya padāletīti vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti.
atk-s0402a:1735_2: Yena midhekacco mātugāmoti yena idhekaccā itthī.
atk-s0402a:1736_3: Na dātā hotīti na dāyikā hoti.
atk-s0402a:1738_1: Aṭṭhame attantapādīsu attānaṃ tapati dukkhāpetīti attantapo.
atk-s0402a:1738_9: Anto tāpanakilesānaṃ abhāvā sītalo jātoti sītībhūto.
atk-s0402a:1740_5: Ṭhapetvā hi sappiṃ avaseso yo koci sneho telanti vuccati.
atk-s0402a:1740_6: Kaṇḍuvamānoti nakhānaṃ chinnattā kaṇḍuvitabbakāle tena kaṇḍuvamāno.
atk-s0402a:1740_13: So evamāhāti so rājā evaṃ vadeti.
atk-s0402a:1740_16: Barihisatthāyāti parikkhepakaraṇatthāya ceva yaññabhūmiyaṃ attharaṇatthāya ca.
atk-s0402a:1741_4: Taṃ dhammanti taṃ vuttappakārasampadaṃ dhammaṃ. Suṇāti, gahapati,
atk-s0402a:1741_7: Yebhuyyena hi khattiyakulato pabbajitā jātiṃ nissāya mānaṃ karonti.
atk-s0402a:1741_8: Brāhmaṇakulā pabbajitā mante nissāya mānaṃ karonti,
atk-s0402a:1741_9: hīnajaccakulā pabbajitā attano vijātitāya patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0402a:1741_10: Gahapatidārakā pana kacchehi sedaṃ muñcantehi piṭṭhiyā loṇaṃ pupphamānāya bhūmiṃ kasitvā tādisassa mānassa abhāvato nihatamānadappā honti.
atk-s0402a:1741_11: Te pabbajitvā mānaṃ vā dappaṃ vā akatvā yathābalaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karontā sakkonti arahatte patiṭṭhātuṃ.
atk-s0402a:1741_12: Itarehi ca kulehi nikkhamitvā pabbajitā na bahukā,
atk-s0402a:1741_14: Iti nihatamānattā ussannattā ca paṭhamaṃ gahapatiṃ niddisatīti.
atk-s0402a:1742_0: Aññatarasmiṃ vāti itaresaṃ vā kulānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ.
atk-s0402a:1742_2: Tathāgate saddhaṃ paṭilabhatīti parisuddhaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā dhammasāmimhi tathāgate “sammāsambuddho vata bhagavā”ti saddhaṃ paṭilabhati.
atk-s0402a:1742_4: Sambādho gharāvāsoti sacepi saṭṭhihatthe ghare yojanasatantarepi vā dve jāyampatikā vasanti,
atk-s0402a:1742_9: Pabbajito hi kūṭāgāraratanapāsādadevavimānādīsu pihitadvāravātapānesu paṭicchannesu vasantopi neva laggati na sajjati na bajjhati.
atk-s0402a:1742_12: Apica sambādho gharāvāso kusalakiriyāya yathāsukhaṃ okāsābhāvato,
atk-s0402a:1743_2: yadetaṃ sikkhattayabrahmacariyaṃ ekampi divasaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0402a:1743_3: ekadivasampi ca kilesamalena amalinaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparisuddhaṃ,
atk-s0402a:1743_5: Idaṃ na sukaraṃ agāraṃ ajjhāvasatā agāramajjhe vasantena ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ…pe… carituṃ.
atk-s0402a:1743_6: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ kese ca massuñca ohāretvā kasāyarasapītatāya kāsāyāni brahmacariyaṃ carantānaṃ anucchavikāni
atk-s0402a:1743_7: vatthāni acchādetvā paridahitvā agārasmā nikkhamitvā anagāriyaṃ pabbajeyyanti.
atk-s0402a:1743_8: Ettha ca yasmā agārassa hitaṃ kasivaṇijjādikammaṃ agāriyanti vuccati,
atk-s0402a:1744_0: Appaṃ vāti sahassato heṭṭhā bhogakkhandho appo nāma hoti,
atk-s0402a:1744_3: So vīsatiyā heṭṭhā appo nāma hoti,
atk-s0402a:1744_5: Bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpannoti yā bhikkhūnaṃ adhisīlasaṅkhātā sikkhā, tañca,
atk-s0402a:1744_8: taṃ bhagavatā paññattasikkhāpadasaṅkhātaṃ sājīvañca tattha sikkhanabhāvena samāpannoti bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno.
atk-s0402a:1744_9: Samāpannoti sikkhaṃ paripūrento sājīvañca avītikkamanto hutvā tadubhayaṃ upagatoti attho.
atk-s0402a:1745_1: Imesaṃ bhedāyāti yesaṃ itoti vuttānaṃ santike sutaṃ,
atk-s0402a:1745_3: Bhinnānaṃ vā sandhātāti dvinnaṃ mittānaṃ vā samānupajjhāyakādīnaṃ vā kenacideva kāraṇena bhinnānaṃ ekamekaṃ
atk-s0402a:1745_4: upasaṅkamitvā “tumhākaṃ īdise kule jātānaṃ evaṃ bahussutānaṃ idaṃ na yutta”ntiādīni vatvā sandhānaṃ kattā.
atk-s0402a:1745_6: dve jane samagge disvā “tumhākaṃ evarūpe kule jātānaṃ evarūpehi guṇehi samannāgatānaṃ anucchavikameta”ntiādīni vatvā daḷhīkammaṃ kattāti attho.
atk-s0402a:1745_13: te pahāya aññattha gantuṃ na icchatīti attho.
atk-s0402a:1745_15: Samaggakaraṇiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitāti yā vācā satte samaggeyeva karoti,
atk-s0402a:1746_2: niddosāti attho “nelaṅgo setapacchādo”ti ettha vuttanelaṃ viya.
atk-s0402a:1746_5: Atthamadhuratāya sakalasarīre kopaṃ ajanetvā pemaṃ janetīti pemanīyā.
atk-s0402a:1746_6: Hadayaṃ gacchati appaṭihaññamānā sukhena cittaṃ pavisatīti hadayaṅgamā.
atk-s0402a:1746_14: Evarūpī kathā bahuno janassa kantā hotīti bahujanakantā.
atk-s0402a:1747_9: Kālenāti evarūpiṃ bhāsamānopi ca “ahaṃ nidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsissāmī”ti na akālena bhāsati,
atk-s0402a:1747_16: Atthasaṃhitanti anekehipi nayehi vibhajantena pariyādātuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya atthasampannaṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0402a:1747_17: Yaṃ vā so atthavādī atthaṃ vadati,
atk-s0402a:1747_18: tena atthena saṃhitattā atthasaṃhitaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati,
atk-s0402a:1747_19: na aññaṃ nikkhipitvā aññaṃ bhāsatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a:1748_0: Bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhāti mūlabījaṃ khandhabījaṃ phaḷubījaṃ aggabījaṃ bījabījanti pañcavidhassa bījagāmassa
atk-s0402a:1748_1: ceva yassa kassaci nīlatiṇarukkhādikassa bhūtagāmassa ca samārambhā,
atk-s0402a:1749_3: Tasmā antomajjhanhike dasakkhattuṃ bhuñjamānopi ekabhattikova hoti.
atk-s0402a:1749_7: Atikkante majjhanhike yāva sūriyatthaṅgamanā bhojanaṃ vikālabhojanaṃ nāma,
atk-s0402a:1750_1: Rajatanti kahāpaṇo lohamāsako jatumāsako dārumāsakoti ye vohāraṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0402a:1751_3: Āmakamaṃsapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha aññatra odissa anuññātā āmakamaṃsamacchānaṃ paṭiggahaṇameva bhikkhūnaṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0402a:1752_3: Dāsidāsapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha dāsidāsavaseneva tesaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0402a:1752_5: ārāmikaṃ dammī”ti evaṃ vutte pana vaṭṭati.
atk-s0402a:1752_7: Tattha khettaṃ nāma yasmiṃ pubbaṇṇaṃ ruhati.
atk-s0402a:1753_0: Dūteyyaṃ vuccati dūtakammaṃ gihīnaṃ paṇṇaṃ vā sāsanaṃ vā gahetvā tattha tattha gamanaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1753_1: Pahiṇagamanaṃ vuccati gharā gharaṃ pesitassa khuddakagamanaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1753_3: Tasmā duteyyapahiṇagamanānaṃ anuyogoti evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a:1753_10: Tattha rūpakūṭaṃ nāma dve tulā samarūpā katvā gaṇhanto mahatiyā gaṇhāti,
atk-s0402a:1753_12: Aṅgakūṭaṃ nāma gaṇhanto pacchābhāge hatthena tulaṃ akkamati,
atk-s0402a:1753_14: Gahaṇakūṭaṃ nāma gaṇhanto mūle rajjuṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0402a:1753_16: Paṭicchannakūṭaṃ nāma tulaṃ susiraṃ katvā anto ayacuṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā gaṇhanto taṃ pacchābhāge karoti,
atk-s0402a:1754_2: Ekaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ katvā aññā dve tisso lohapātiyo suvaṇṇavaṇṇā karoti.
atk-s0402a:1754_3: Tato janapadaṃ gantvā kiñcideva aḍḍhakulaṃ pavisitvā “suvaṇṇabhājanāni kiṇathā”ti vatvā agghe pucchite samagghataraṃ dātukāmā honti.
atk-s0402a:1754_4: Tato tehi “kathaṃ imesaṃ suvaṇṇabhāvo jānitabbo”ti vutte “vīmaṃsitvā gaṇhathā”ti suvaṇṇapātiṃ pāsāṇe ghaṃsitvā sabbapātiyo datvā gacchati.
atk-s0402a:1755_4: Tāni hi gaṇhanto heṭṭhāchiddena mānena “saṇikaṃ āsiñcā”ti vatvā attano bhājane bahuṃ paggharāpetvā gaṇhāti,
atk-s0402a:1755_5: dadanto chiddaṃ pidhāya sīghaṃ pūretvā deti.
atk-s0402a:1755_7: Tāni hi gaṇhanto saṇikaṃ sikhaṃ ussāpetvā gaṇhāti,
atk-s0402a:1755_8: dadanto vegena pūretvā sikhaṃ chindanto deti.
atk-s0402a:1755_10: Lañjaṃ alabhantā hi khettaṃ amahantampi mahantaṃ katvā minanti.
atk-s0402a:1756_0: Ukkoṭanādīsu ukkoṭananti sāmike assāmike kātuṃ lañjaggahaṇaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1756_1: Vañcananti tehi tehi upāyehi paresaṃ vañcanaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1756_3: eko kira luddako migañca migapotakañca gahetvā āgacchati.
atk-s0402a:1756_7: migapotako eka”nti ca vutte ekaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ datvā migapotakaṃ gahetvā thokaṃ gantvā nivatto “na me bho migapotakenattho,
atk-s0402a:1756_9: Tena hi dve kahāpaṇe dehīti. So āha –
atk-s0402a:1756_10: “nanu te bho mayā paṭhamaṃ eko kahāpaṇo dinno”ti?
atk-s0402a:1756_13: evaṃ so ca kahāpaṇo ayañca kahāpaṇagghanako migapotako”ti dve kahāpaṇā bhavissantīti.
atk-s0402a:1756_14: So “kāraṇaṃ vadatī”ti sallakkhetvā migapotakaṃ gahetvā migaṃ adāsīti.
atk-s0402a:1756_15: Nikatīti yogavasena vā māyāvasena vā apāmaṅgaṃ pāmaṅganti,
atk-s0402a:1756_20: Tasmā ukkoṭanasāciyogo vañcanasāciyogo nikatisāciyogoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0402a:1756_21: Keci aññaṃ dassetvā aññassa parivattanaṃ sāciyogoti vadanti,
atk-s0402a:1757_5: Yaṃ himapātasamaye himena paṭicchannā hutvā maggappaṭipannaṃ janaṃ musanti,
atk-s0402a:1757_11: gehaṃ pavisitvā manussānaṃ ure satthaṃ ṭhapetvā icchitabhaṇḍaggahaṇaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1758_0: So santuṭṭho hotīti svāyaṃ bhikkhu heṭṭhā vuttena catūsu paccayesu dvādasavidhena itarītarapaccayasantosena samannāgato hoti.
atk-s0402a:1758_1: Iminā pana dvādasavidhena itarītarapaccayasantosena samannāgatassa bhikkhuno aṭṭha parikkhārā vaṭṭanti –
atk-s0402a:1759_0: “Ticīvarañca patto ca, vāsi sūci ca bandhanaṃ;
atk-s0402a:1761_2: Ticīvaraṃ tāva nivāsetvā pārupitvā ca vicaraṇakāle kāyaṃ pariharati posetīti kāyaparihārikaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a:1761_4: khāditabbaphalāphalaṃ gahaṇakāle ca kucchiṃ pariharati posetīti kucchiparihārikaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a:1761_5: Pattopi tena udakaṃ uddharitvā nhānakāle kuṭiparibhaṇḍakaraṇakāle ca kāyaparihāriko hoti,
atk-s0402a:1761_7: Vāsipi tāya dantakaṭṭhacchedanakāle mañcapīṭhānaṃ aṅgapādacīvarakuṭidaṇḍakasajjanakāle ca kāyaparihārikā hoti,
atk-s0402a:1761_10: pūvaṃ vā phalaṃ vā vijjhitvā khādanakāle kucchiparihārikā.
atk-s0402a:1761_13: Parissāvanaṃ tena udakaṃ parissāvetvā nhānakāle senāsanaparibhaṇḍakaraṇakāle ca kāyaparihārikaṃ,
atk-s0402a:1761_14: pānīyapānakaparissāvanakāle teneva tilataṇḍulaputhukādīni gahetvā khādanakāle ca kucchiparihārikaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1762_0: Navaparikkhārikassa pana seyyaṃ pavisantassa tatraṭṭhakapaccattharaṇaṃ vā kuñcikā vā vaṭṭati.
atk-s0402a:1762_1: Dasaparikkhārikassa nisīdanaṃ vā cammakhaṇḍaṃ vā vaṭṭati.
atk-s0402a:1762_2: Ekādasaparikkhārikassa kattarayaṭṭhi vā telanāḷikā vā vaṭṭati.
atk-s0402a:1762_3: Dvādasaparikkhārikassa chattaṃ vā upāhanaṃ vā vaṭṭati.
atk-s0402a:1762_5: itare asantuṭṭhā mahicchā mahābhārāti na vattabbā.
atk-s0402a:1762_7: Bhagavā pana na imaṃ suttaṃ tesaṃ vasena kathesi,
atk-s0402a:1762_9: So hi khuddakavāsiñca sūciñca parissāvane pakkhipitvā pattassa anto ṭhapetvā pattaṃ aṃsakūṭe laggetvā
atk-s0402a:1762_10: ticīvaraṃ kāyappaṭibaddhaṃ katvā yenicchakaṃ sukhaṃ pakkamati,
atk-s0402a:1762_12: Iti imassa bhikkhuno sallahukavuttitaṃ dassento bhagavā santuṭṭho hoti kāyaparihārikena cīvarenātiādimāha.
atk-s0402a:1763_2: Samādāyeva pakkamatīti taṃ aṭṭhaparikkhāramattakaṃ sabbaṃ gahetvāva kāyappaṭibaddhaṃ katvāva gacchati,
atk-s0402a:1763_3: “mama vihāro pariveṇaṃ upaṭṭhāko”tissa saṅgo vā bandho vā na hoti.
atk-s0402a:1763_5: yūthā apakkanto mattahatthī viya icchiticchitaṃ senāsanaṃ,
atk-s0402a:1769_4: sakuṇā nāma “asukasmiṃ padese rukkho paripakkaphalo”ti ñatvā nānādisāhi āgantvā nakhapakkhatuṇḍādīhi tassa phalāni vijjhantā vidhunantā khādanti,
atk-s0402a:1769_6: idaṃ svātanāya bhavissatī”ti nesaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0402a:1769_7: Phale pana khīṇe neva rukkhassa ārakkhaṃ ṭhapenti,
atk-s0402a:1769_8: na tattha pakkhaṃ vā pattaṃ vā nakhaṃ vā tuṇḍaṃ vā ṭhapenti,
atk-s0402a:1769_9: atha kho tasmiṃ rukkhe anapekkhā hutvā yo yaṃ disābhāgaṃ icchati,
atk-s0402a:1769_11: Evameva ayaṃ bhikkhu nissaṅgo nirapekkhoyeva pakkamati,
atk-s0402a:1770_0: So cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti so iminā ariyena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato bhikkhu cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ passitvāti attho.
atk-s0402a:1770_5: Indriyasaṃvarasukhaṃ hi diṭṭhādīsu diṭṭhamattādivasena pavattatāya avikiṇṇaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a:1771_0: So abhikkante paṭikkanteti so manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ saṃvarena samannāgato bhikkhu imesu abhikkantapaṭikkantādīsu
atk-s0402a:1772_3: asammohasampajaññanti imesaṃ catunnaṃ satisampayuttānaṃ sampajaññānaṃ vasena satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā ñāṇena
atk-s0402a:1772_7: vitthāro pana icchantena dīghanikāye sāmaññaphalavaṇṇanāto vā majjhimanikāye satipaṭṭhānavaṇṇanāto vā gahetabbo.
atk-s0402a:1773_2: Yassa hi ime cattāro paccayā natthi,
atk-s0402a:1773_4: tiracchānagatehi vā vanacarakehi vā saddhiṃ vatthabbataṃ āpajjati.
atk-s0402a:1773_5: Araññe adhivatthā devatā “kiṃ evarūpassa pāpabhikkhuno araññavāsenā”ti bheravasaddaṃ sāventi,
atk-s0402a:1773_7: “Asuko bhikkhu araññaṃ pavisitvā idañcidañca pāpakammamakāsī”ti ayaso pattharati.
atk-s0402a:1773_10: So hi attano sīlaṃ paccavekkhanto kiñci kāḷakaṃ vā tilakaṃ vā apassanto pītiṃ uppādetvā taṃ khayato vayato sammasanto ariyabhūmiṃ okkamati.
atk-s0402a:1773_11: Araññe adhivatthā devatā attamanā vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti.
atk-s0402a:1773_12: Itissa udake pakkhittatelabindu viya yaso vitthāriko hoti.
atk-s0402a:1774_3: Etadeva hi sandhāya vibhaṅge “vivittanti santike cepi senāsanaṃ hoti,
atk-s0402a:1774_6: Seti ceva āsati ca etthāti senāsanaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1774_19: guhāti idaṃ vihārasenāsanaṃ nāma. Mañco, pīṭhaṃ, bhisi,
atk-s0402a:1774_24: Yattha vā pana bhikkhū paṭikkamantīti etaṃ okāsasenāsanaṃ nāmāti evaṃ catubbidhaṃ senāsanaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a:1775_0: Imassa pana sakuṇasadisassa cātuddisassa bhikkhuno anucchavikaṃ dassento araññaṃ rukkhamūlantiādimāha.
atk-s0402a:1775_1: Tattha araññanti “nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā sabbametaṃ arañña”nti “idaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ vasena āgataṃ araññaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1775_2: “Āraññakaṃ nāma senāsanaṃ pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchima”nti idaṃ pana imassa bhikkhuno anurūpaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1775_6: Tattha hi udakasoṇḍīsu udakakiccaṃ katvā sītāya rukkhacchāyāya nisinnassa nānādisāsu khāyamānāsu sītena vātena bījiyamānassa cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a:1775_13: Evarūpaṃ kandaraṃ oruyha pānīyaṃ pivitvā gattāni sītāni katvā vālikaṃ ussāpetvā paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ paññāpetvā
atk-s0402a:1775_14: nisinnassa samaṇadhammaṃ karoto cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a:1775_25: Mahāpalālapuñjato hi palālaṃ nikkaḍḍhitvā pabbhāraleṇasadise ālaye karonti,
atk-s0402a:1775_26: gacchagumbādīnampi upari palālaṃ pakkhipitvā heṭṭhā nisinnā samaṇadhammaṃ karonti.
atk-s0402a:1776_4: Ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyāti uparimasarīraṃ ujukaṃ ṭhapetvā aṭṭhārasa piṭṭhikaṇṭake koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭipādetvā.
atk-s0402a:1776_6: Athassa yā tesaṃ paṇamanapaccayā khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjeyyuṃ,
atk-s0402a:1776_8: Tāsu na uppajjamānāsu cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti,
atk-s0402a:1776_11: Parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti kammaṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ satiṃ ṭhapayitvā,
atk-s0402a:1776_14: “ayaṃ sati upaṭṭhitā hoti sūpaṭṭhitā nāsikagge vā mukhanimitte vā.
atk-s0402a:1776_20: ‘parimukhaṃ sati”’nti evaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttanayena panettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0402a:1777_2: Tasmā pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu rāgaṃ pahāya kāmacchandaṃ vikkhambhetvāti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0402a:1777_5: Abhijjhāya cittaṃ parisodhetīti abhijjhāto cittaṃ parimoceti,
atk-s0402a:1777_6: yathā naṃ sā muñcati ceva muñcitvā ca na puna gaṇhāti,
atk-s0402a:1777_9: Byāpajjati iminā cittaṃ pūtikummāsādayo viya purimapakatiṃ pajahatīti byāpādo.
atk-s0402a:1777_16: Ālokasaññīti rattimpi divāpi diṭṭhaālokasañjānanasamatthāya vigatanīvaraṇāya parisuddhāya saññāya samannāgato.
atk-s0402a:1777_17: Sato sampajānoti satiyā ca ñāṇena ca samannāgato.
atk-s0402a:1777_24: kathamime kusalā”ti evaṃ na vicikicchati na kaṅkhatīti attho.
atk-s0402a:1777_26: Imesu pana nīvaraṇesu vacanatthalakkhaṇādibhedato yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā,
atk-s0402a:1777_28: Paññāya dubbalīkaraṇeti yasmā ime pañca nīvaraṇā uppajjamānā anuppannāya lokiyalokuttarāya paññāya uppajjituṃ na denti,
atk-s0402a:1777_29: uppannāpi aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca vā abhiññā ucchinditvā pātenti.
atk-s0402a:1778_0: Ime āsavātiādi aparenāpi pariyāyena catusaccappakāsanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1778_1: Nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānātīti ettāvatā heṭṭhā tīhi aṅgehi bāhirasamayassa nipphalabhāvaṃ dassetvā catutthena
atk-s0402a:1778_2: aṅgena attano sāsanassa gambhīrabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā desanāya arahattena kūṭaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0402a:1780_2: Yathā hi jālaṃ samantato saṃsibbitaṃ ākulabyākulaṃ,
atk-s0402a:1780_4: Tayo vā bhave ajjhottharitvā ṭhitāya etissā tattha tattha attano koṭṭhāsabhūtaṃ jālaṃ atthītipi jālinī.
atk-s0402a:1780_5: Saritanti tattha tattha saritvā saṃsaritvā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1780_7: Visattikanti tattha tattha visattaṃ laggaṃ lagitaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1780_13: Yathā nāma dunnikkhittaṃ mūsikacchinnaṃ pesakārānaṃ tantaṃ tahiṃ tahiṃ ākulaṃ hoti,
atk-s0402a:1780_14: “idaṃ aggaṃ idaṃ mūla”nti aggena vā aggaṃ,
atk-s0402a:1780_15: mūlena vā mūlaṃ samānetuṃ dukkaraṃ hoti,
atk-s0402a:1780_16: evaṃ sattā imāya taṇhāya pariyonaddhā ākulabyākulā na sakkonti attano nissaraṇamaggaṃ ujuṃ kātuṃ.
atk-s0402a:1780_20: Yathā tadubhayampi ākulaṃ aggena vā aggaṃ,
atk-s0402a:1780_21: mūlena vā mūlaṃ samānetuṃ dukkaranti purimanayeneva yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1780_22: Muñjapabbajabhūtoti muñjatiṇaṃ viya pabbajatiṇaṃ viya ca bhūto,
atk-s0402a:1780_24: Yathā tāni tiṇāni koṭṭetvā katarajjuṃ jiṇṇakāle katthaci patitaṃ gahetvā tesaṃ tiṇānaṃ “idaṃ aggaṃ idaṃ mūla”nti aggena vā aggaṃ,
atk-s0402a:1780_26: Tampi ca paccattapurisakāre ṭhatvā sakkā bhaveyya ujuṃ kātuṃ,
atk-s0402a:1780_27: ṭhapetvā pana bodhisatte añño satto attano dhammatāya taṇhājālaṃ padāletvā attano nissaraṇamaggaṃ ujuṃ kātuṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0402a:1780_28: Evamayaṃ loko taṇhājālena pariyonaddho apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ saṃsāraṃ nātivattati.
atk-s0402a:1780_33: Sabbepi hi te vaḍḍhisaṅkhātassa āyassa abhāvato apāyāti vuccanti.
atk-s0402a:1783_1: atha kho cutito paṭisandhiṃ paṭisandhito cutinti evaṃ punappunaṃ cutipaṭisandhiyo gaṇhamāno tīsu bhavesu
atk-s0402a:1783_2: catūsu yonīsu pañcasu gatīsu sattasu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu navasu sattāvāsesu mahāsamudde vātakkhittanāvā viya
atk-s0402a:1784_6: yadetaṃ ajjhattaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ upādāya taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena samūhaggāhato asmīti hoti,
atk-s0402a:1784_8: Itthasmīti hotītiādīsu pana evaṃ samūhato ahanti gahaṇe sati tato anupanidhāya ca upanidhāya cāti dvidhā gahaṇaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a:1784_9: Tattha anupanidhāyāti aññaṃ ākāraṃ anupagamma sakabhāvameva ārammaṇaṃ katvā itthasmīti hoti,
atk-s0402a:1784_10: khattiyādīsu idaṃpakāro ahanti evaṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena hotīti attho.
atk-s0402a:1784_12: Upanidhāya gahaṇaṃ pana duvidhaṃ hoti samato ca asamato ca.
atk-s0402a:1784_13: Taṃ dassetuṃ evaṃsmīti aññathāsmīti ca vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1784_14: Tattha evaṃsmīti idaṃ samato upanidhāya gahaṇaṃ,
atk-s0402a:1785_0: Asasmīti satasmīti imāni pana dve yasmā atthīti asaṃ,
atk-s0402a:1785_5: Ito parāni santi evamādīni cattāri saṃsayaparivitakkavasena vuttāni.
atk-s0402a:1785_6: Santi hotīti evamādīsu ahaṃ siyanti hotīti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a:1785_8: Apihaṃ santiādīni pana cattāri api nāma ahaṃ bhaveyyanti evaṃ patthanākappanavasena vuttāni.
atk-s0402a:1785_11: Tesampi purimacatukke vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo. Evamete –
atk-s0402a:1788_1: satasmīti ete dve diṭṭhisīsā nāma. Asmi, santi,
atk-s0402a:1788_4: Itthasmītiādayo tayo tayoti dvādasa sīsamūlakā nāmāti evamete dve diṭṭhisīsā cattāro suddhasīsā dvādasa
atk-s0402a:1788_6: Imāni tāva ajjhattikassa upādāya aṭṭhārasa taṇhāvicaritāni.
atk-s0402a:1789_0: Iti evarūpāni atītāni chattiṃsāti ekamekassa puggalassa atīte addhani chattiṃsa.
atk-s0402a:1789_1: Anāgatāni chattiṃsāti ekamekasseva puggalassa ca anāgate addhani chattiṃsa.
atk-s0402a:1789_2: Paccuppannāni chattiṃsāti ekassa vā puggalassa yathāsambhavato bahūnaṃ vā paccuppanne addhani chattiṃsāva.
atk-s0402a:1789_3: Sabbasattānaṃ pana niyameneva atīte addhani chattiṃsa,
atk-s0402a:1789_7: Aṭṭhasataṃ taṇhāvicaritaṃ hontīti ettha pana aṭṭhasatasaṅkhātaṃ taṇhāvicaritaṃ hotīti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0402a:1791_1: Dasame na ussenetīti diṭṭhivasena na ukkhipati.
atk-s0402a:1791_2: Na paṭisenetīti paṭiviruddho hutvā kalahabhaṇḍanavasena na ukkhipati.
atk-s0402a:1791_3: Na dhūpāyatīti ajjhattikassa upādāya taṇhāvicaritavasena na dhūpāyati.
atk-s0402a:1791_4: Na pajjalatīti bāhirassa upādāya taṇhāvicaritavasena na pajjalati.
atk-s0402a:1801_1: Pañcamassa paṭhame asappurisanti lāmakapurisaṃ tucchapurisaṃ mūḷhapurisaṃ avijjāya andhīkataṃ bālaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1803_9: Imasmiṃ vagge dasasupi suttesu agāriyappaṭipadā kathitā.
atk-s0402a:1809_0: 211. Dutiyassa paṭhame parisaṃ dūsentīti parisadūsanā. Parisaṃ sobhentīti parisasobhanā.
atk-s0402a:1811_1: Dutiye manoduccarite pariyāpannāpi micchādiṭṭhi mahāsāvajjatāya visuṃ vuttā,
atk-s0402a:1815_1: Catutthaṃ catunnaṃ kammakilesānaṃ tappaṭipakkhassa ca vasena vuttaṃ,
atk-s0402a:1815_2: pañcamaṃ sukkapakkhānaṃ ādito catunnaṃ micchattānaṃ vasena,
atk-s0402a:1815_5: Tathā aṭṭhamanavamadasamāni sappaṭipakkhānaṃ assaddhammānaṃ vasena vuttāni.
atk-s0402a:1815_8: tayo pana maggā tīṇi ca phalāni labbhantiyevāti.
atk-s0402a:1820_8: Yo taṅkhaṇaññeva vaṅgīsatthero viya attano paṭibhānena karoti,
atk-s0402a:1826_7: Missakakammañhi katvā akusalena tiracchānayoniyaṃ maṅgalahatthiṭṭhānādīsu uppanno kusalena pavatte sukhaṃ vediyati.
atk-s0402a:1826_8: Kusalena rājakulepi nibbatto akusalena pavatte dukkhaṃ vediyati.
atk-s0402a:1826_14: Ubhayavipākassa pana appadānato akaṇhaṃ asukkanti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0402a:1828_7: Sabyābajjhaṃ vedanaṃ vediyatīti sābādhaṃ vipākavedanaṃ vediyati.
atk-s0402a:1828_10: Seyyathāpi sattā nerayikāti ettha seyyathāpīti nidassanatthe nipāto.
atk-s0402a:1828_14: Seyyathāpi manussātiādīsu pana manussānaṃ tāva kālena sukhā vedanā uppajjati,
atk-s0402a:1828_16: Ekacce ca devāti ettha pana kāmāvacaradevā daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0402a:1828_17: Tesañhi mahesakkhatarā devatā disvā nisinnāsanato vuṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0402a:1828_21: Ekacce ca vinipātikāti ettha vemānikapetā daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0402a:1828_24: Nāgasupaṇṇahatthiassādayo pana manussā viya vokiṇṇasukhadukkhāva honti.
atk-s0402a:1828_25: Pahānāya yā cetanāti ettha vivaṭṭagāminī maggacetanā veditabbā.
atk-s0402a:1830_1: Tatiye sikhāmoggallānoti sīsamajjhe ṭhitāya mahatiyā sikhāya samannāgato moggallānagotto brāhmaṇo.
atk-s0402a:1830_5: Kammasaccāyaṃ bho lokoti bho ayaṃ loko kammasabhāvo.
atk-s0402a:1832_2: Maggaṅgesu pana yasmā satiyā upaṭṭhapetvā paññāya paricchindati,
atk-s0402a:1832_7: Abhidhamme pana sabbampetaṃ avisesena cetanāsampayuttakammanteva vaṇṇitaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1834_15: pañca diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādāti ime sabbepi brahmajāle āgatadvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhiyo ito bāhirānaṃ paresaṃ pavādā parappavādā nāma.
atk-s0402a:1834_16: Te sabbepi imehi catūhi phalaṭṭhakasamaṇehi suññā.
atk-s0402a:1834_20: catunnaṃ maggānaṃ atthāya āraddhavipassakehipīti dvādasahipi samaṇehi suññā eva.
atk-s0402a:1834_21: Idameva atthaṃ sandhāya bhagavatā mahāparinibbāne vuttaṃ –
atk-s0402a:1841_5: Tasmā sotāpattimaggassa āraddhavipassakaṃ maggaṭṭhaṃ phalaṭṭhanti tayopi ekato katvā “samaṇopi natthī”ti āha,
atk-s0402a:1841_6: sakadāgāmimaggassa āraddhavipassakaṃ maggaṭṭhaṃ phalaṭṭhanti tayopi ekato katvā “dutiyopi samaṇo natthī”ti āha.
atk-s0402a:1847_1: Pañcamassa paṭhame api nu taṃ, ānanda,
atk-s0402a:1847_2: adhikaraṇanti vivādādhikaraṇādīsu aññataraṃ adhikaraṇaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa uppajji,
atk-s0402a:1847_3: satthā tassa vūpasantabhāvaṃ pucchanto evamāha. Kuto taṃ, bhanteti, bhante,
atk-s0402a:1847_4: kuto kinti kena kāraṇena taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamissatīti vadati.
atk-s0402a:1847_6: Saṅghabhedāya ṭhitoti saṅghena saddhiṃ vādatthāya kathitaṃ paṭikathentova ṭhito.
atk-s0402a:1847_7: Tatrāyasmāti tasmiṃ evaṃ ṭhite āyasmā anuruddho.
atk-s0402a:1847_9: saṅghena saddhiṃ evaṃ avacā”ti ekavacanampi vattabbaṃ na maññati.
atk-s0402a:1849_1: Dutiye khuramuṇḍaṃ karitvāti pañca sikhaṇḍake ṭhapetvā khurena muṇḍaṃ karitvā.
atk-s0402a:1849_7: So vatassāhanti so vata ahaṃ assaṃ,
atk-s0402a:1849_8: yaṃ evarūpaṃ pāpaṃ na kareyyanti attho.
atk-s0402a:1849_13: Yathādhammanti idha āpattito vuṭṭhāya suddhante patiṭṭhahanto yathādhammaṃ karoti nāma.
atk-s0402a:1849_16: Yathādhammanti idha āpattiṃ desento yathādhammaṃ paṭikaroti nāma.
atk-s0402a:1849_24: imāni cattāri āpattiṃ nissāya uppajjanakabhayāni nāmāti.
atk-s0402a:1851_5: Etesaṃ hi sikkhādisaṅkhātānaṃ ānisaṃsādīnaṃ atthāya vussatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a:1851_8: Tathā tathā so tassā sikkhāyāti tathā tathā so sikkhākāmo bhikkhu tasmiṃ sikkhāpade.
atk-s0402a:1852_0: Ādibrahmacariyikāti maggabrahmacariyassa ādibhūtānaṃ catunnaṃ mahāsīlānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0402a:1852_3: Paññāya samavekkhitā hontīti sahavipassanāya maggapaññāya sudiṭṭhā honti.
atk-s0402a:1852_4: Vimuttiyā phusitā hontīti arahattaphalavimuttiyā ñāṇaphassena phuṭṭhā honti.
atk-s0402a:1852_5: Ajjhattaṃyeva sati sūpaṭṭhitā hotīti niyakajjhatteyeva sati suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitā hoti.
atk-s0402a:1852_8: Phusitaṃ vā dhammaṃ tattha tattha paññāya anuggahessāmīti ettha pana maggapaññāva adhippetā.
atk-s0402a:1854_2: Uttānā sentīti te yebhuyyena uttānakāva sayanti.
atk-s0402a:1854_3: Atha vā pettivisaye nibbattā petā nāma,
atk-s0402a:1854_4: te appamaṃsalohitattā aṭṭhisaṅghātajaṭitā ekena passena sayituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0402a:1854_6: Anattamano hotīti tejussadattā sīho migarājā dve purimapāde ekasmiṃ,
atk-s0402a:1854_7: pacchimapāde ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapetvā naṅguṭṭhaṃ antarasatthimhi pakkhipitvā purimapādapacchimapādanaṅguṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0402a:1854_8: ṭhitokāsaṃ sallakkhetvā dvinnaṃ purimapādānaṃ matthake sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā sayati.
atk-s0402a:1854_9: Divasampi sayitvā pabujjhamāno na uttasanto pabujjhati,
atk-s0402a:1854_10: sīsaṃ pana ukkhipitvā purimapādādīnaṃ ṭhitokāsaṃ sallakkhetvā sace kiñci ṭhānaṃ vijahitvā ṭhitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0402a:1854_12: na sūrabhāvassa anurūpa”nti anattamano hutvā tattheva sayati,
atk-s0402a:1854_16: Avijahitvā ṭhite pana “tuyhaṃ jātiyā ca sūrabhāvassa ca anurūpamida”nti haṭṭhatuṭṭho uṭṭhāya sīhavijambhanaṃ
atk-s0402a:1854_17: vijambhitvā kesarabhāraṃ vidhunitvā tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ naditvā gocarāya pakkamati.
atk-s0402a:1856_1: Pañcame rājā cakkavattīti ettha kasmā bhagavā agāramajjhe vasitvā kālakatassa rañño thūpakaraṇaṃ anujānāti,
atk-s0402a:1856_4: Puthujjanabhikkhūnañhi thūpe anuññāyamāne tambapaṇṇidīpe tāva thūpānaṃ okāso na bhaveyya,
atk-s0402a:1856_9: Puthujjanasīlavato pana parinibbutabhikkhuno viya mahantampi sakkāraṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-s0402a:1858_0: 250. Aṭṭhame anariyavohārāti anariyānaṃ kathā. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a:1866_2: Samatho ca vipassanā cāti cittekaggatā ca saṅkhārapariggahavipassanāñāṇañca.
atk-s0402a:1866_3: Vijjā ca vimutti cāti maggañāṇavijjā ca sesā sampayuttakadhammā ca.
atk-s0402a:1868_4: Ayaṃ kira daharakāle paccayesu laggo hutvā pacchā mahallakakāle araññavāsaṃ patthento kammaṭṭhānaṃ yācati.
atk-s0402a:1868_6: mālukyaputto viya tumhepi taruṇakāle paccayesu laggitvā mahallakakāle araññaṃ pavisitvā samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0402a:1868_7: kareyyāthā”ti iminā adhippāyena bhaṇanto theraṃ apasādeti nāma.
atk-s0402a:1868_8: Yasmā pana thero mahallakakāleva araññaṃ pavisitvā samaṇadhammaṃ kātukāmo,
atk-s0402a:1868_10: ayaṃ amhākaṃ mālukyaputto mahallakakālepi araññaṃ pavisitvā samaṇadhammaṃ kātukāmo kammaṭṭhānaṃ yācati.
atk-s0402a:1868_11: Tumhe tāva taruṇakālepi vīriyaṃ na karothā”ti iminā adhippāyena bhaṇanto theraṃ ussādeti nāmāti yojanā.
atk-s0402a:1879_0: 274-783. Rāgapeyyālaṃ arahattaṃ pāpetvā kathitaṃ. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
